他向来是个守本分的人，不会做出越轨之事。

遵守法律

守法
shǒufǎ
abide by (or observe) the law; be law-abiding
领导者应该带头遵守法度，以身作则。
Lǐngdǎozhě yīnggāi dàitóu zūnshǒu fǎdù，yǐshēnzuòzé。
Leaders are supposed to set a good example to others in following laws and rules.
人人要养成遵守法度的习惯，处处严格要求自己。
Rénrén yào yǎngchéng zūnshǒu fǎdù de xíguàn，chùchù yángé yàoqiú zìjǐ。
Everybody should conform to norms and be strict with themselves.
他一生守法护法，尽职尽责，鞠躬尽瘁。
Tā yìshēng shǒufǎ hùfǎ，jìnzhí jìnzé，jūgōngjìncuì。
All his life he has been a lawbinding ,and law-defending.  He is in the line of duty, and spares no effort when performing his duty.
他不遵纪守法，终于有一天郎当入狱。

He didn\'t abide by laws, and observed discipline but was chained and put in prison one day.
他们全家都是遵纪守法的好公民。

be entrenched in a beseiged city
要遵守操作规程，不能愣干。
Yào zūnshǒu cāozuò guīchéng，bùnéng lènggàn。
You\'ve got to observe the working regulations. You can\'t do things any way you like.
这个队能攻能守。
Zhège duì nénggōngnéngshǒu。
The team is good at both attack and defence.
守门员这个球救得真漂亮。
Shǒuményuán zhège qiú jiù de zhēn piàoliàng。
The goalie made a beautiful save.
凭险据守
píngxiǎn jūshǒu
hold fast to natural barriers as defences
确守信义
quèshǒu xìnyì
act in strict good faith
日夜警惕地守卫着边疆
rìyè jǐngtì de shǒuwèi zhe biānjiāng
vigilantly guard the borders day and night
这个队的防守弱于对方。
Zhège duì de fángshǒu ruò yú duìfāng。
This team\'s defence is not as good as the opponent\'s.
保守国家机密，慎之又慎。
Bǎoshǒu guójiā jīmì，shènzhīyòushèn。
One cannot be too careful in guarding state secrets.
坚守生产岗位
jiānshǒu shēngchǎn gǎngwèi
stick to one\'s post on the production front
守城
shǒu chéng
defend a city
守球门
shǒu qiúmén
keep goal
守住阵地
shǒuzhù zhèndì
hold the position
守了一夜
shǒu le yí yè
keep watch for the whole night
守着伤员
shǒu zhe shāngyuán
watch over (or look after) the wounded
守纪律
shǒu jìlǜ
observe discipline
守信用
shǒu xìnyòng
keep one\'s promise; be as good as one\'s word
守着老一套
shǒu zhe lǎo yí tào
stick to the old practice
守着水的地方要多养鱼。
Shǒu zhe shuǐ de dìfāng yào duō yǎng yú。
Where there is water nearby, make a special effort to breed fish.
能量守恒
néngliàng shǒuhéng
conservation of energy
动量守恒
dòngliàng shǒuhéng
conservation of momentum
守候着前线的消息
shǒuhòu zhe qiánxiàn de xiāoxi
wait for news from the front
守候在病人身旁
shǒuhòu zài bìngrén shēnpáng
keep watch by the patient\'s bedside
守门人
shǒuménrén
gatekeeper; doorkeeper
采取守势
cǎiqǔ shǒushì
be on the defensive
守土有责
shǒu tǔ yǒu zé
be duty-bound to defend the territory of one\'s country
创业难，守业更难。
Chuàngyè nán，shǒuyè gèng nán。
If it is difficult for a man to set up a business, it is even more so for his heirs to keep it up.
工作守则
gōngzuò shǒuzé
work regulations
疏于职守
shū yú zhíshǒu
negligent of one\'s duties
戍守边疆
shùshǒu biānjiāng
garrison the frontiers
死守阵地
sǐshǒu zhèndì
defend the position to the last
他素来是严格遵守纪律的。
Tā sùlái shì yángé zūnshǒu jìlǜ de。
He always strictly observes discipline.
玩忽职守
wánhūzhíshǒu 
neglect (or dereliction) of duty; be remiss in one\'s duty
与其固守，毋宁出击。
Yǔqí gùshǒu，wúníngchūjī。
Better to strike out than to entrench oneself in defence.
无险可守
wú xiǎn kě shǒu
have no tenable defence position; be strategically indefensible
守门员身手不凡，接连救起了几个险球。
Shǒuményuán shēnshǒu bùfán，jiē lián jiùqǐ le jǐgè xiǎnqiú。
He\'s a very good goalkeeper and made several spectacular saves.
信守协议
xìnshǒu xiéyì
abide by (or stand by) an agreement
信守诺言
xìnshǒu nuòyán
keep a promise; be as good as one\'s word
防守严固。
fánɡshǒu yánɡù。
The defences are strong.
严守纪律
yánshǒu jìlǜ
observe strict discipline
严守合同
yánshǒu hétong
abide by a contract faithfully
保守党政府摇摇欲坠。
Bǎoshǒudǎnɡ zhènɡfǔ yáoyáoyùzhuì。
The Conservative Government was tottering.
为病人保守医密
wéi bìngrén bǎoshǒu yīmì 
patient case histories are confidential
宇称不守恒
yǔchēngbùshǒuhéng
parity nonconservation
宇称守恒
yǔchēngshǒuhéng
parity conservation
远台防守
yuǎntái fángshǒu
long defence; far-from-table defence
遵守约言
zūnshǒu yuēyán
keep one\'s promise (or word)
遵守国法政纪
zūnshǒu guófǎ zhèngjì 
abide by state laws and regulations
他见机房无人值守，就溜了进去。
Tā jiàn jīfángwú rén zhíshǒu，jiù liū le jìnqù。
He sneaked into the engine-room when he found nobody on guard.
忠于职守
zhōnɡyú zhíshǒu 
be faithful in the discharge of one\'s duties; be devoted to one\'s duty
守秩序
shǒu zhìxù 
observe order
守中立
shǒu zhōng lì 
observe neutrality
有重兵把守
yǒu zhòngbīngbǎshǒu 
be heavily guarded
昼夜看守
zhòuyè kānshǒu 
keep watch round the clock
嘱咐他保守秘密
zhǔfù tā bǎoshǒu mìmì 
enjoin him to secrecy
自觉遵守纪律
zìjué zūnshǒu jìlǜ 
conscientiously observe discipline
遵守公共秩序
zūnshǒu ɡōnɡɡònɡ zhìxù 
observe public order
遵守时间
zūnshǒu shíjiān 
be on time; be punctual
遵守法律
zūnshǒu fǎlǜ 
abide by the law
保守思想在他们头脑中作怪。
Bǎoshǒu sīxiǎng zài tāmen tóunǎo zhōng zuòguài。
Conservative ideas are doing mischief in their minds.
守法
shǒufǎ
abide by (or observe) the law; be law-abiding
他一辈子老老实实，安守本分。
Tā yíbèizi lǎolǎoshishí，ānshǒu běnfèn。
Throughout his life he has been straight and innocent, content with being where he is.
医生建议他采取保守疗法。
Yīshēng jiànyì tā cǎiqǔ bǎoshǒu liáofǎ。
The doctor suggested that he take conservative treatment.
新制定的改革措施遭到了保守派的强烈反对。
Xīn zhìdìng de gǎigé cuòshī zāodào le bǎoshǒupài de qiángliè fǎnduì。
The newly-formulated reform measures met with fierce opposition from conservatives.
他们是常年驻守北疆国门的战士。
Tāmen shì chángnián zhùshǒu běijiāng guómén de zhànshì。
These soldiers defend the border area of China\'s North all year round.
逢年过节，那些边防军依然坚守岗位。
Féngnián guòjié，nàxiē biānfángjūn yīrán jiānshǒu gǎngwèi。
The frontier guards stick to their posts even during holidays.
我们应该有最起码的职业操守。
Wǒmen yīnggāi yǒu zuì qǐmǎ de zhíyè cāoshǒu。
We should have basic professional ethics.
为母守孝三年除服，他心情依然悲伤。
Wèi mǔ shǒuxiào sān nián chúfú，tā xīnqíng yīrán bēishāng。
After three years of mourning for his mother he was still in a state of deep sorrow.
今天三年守孝期满，他可以除丧了。
Jīntiān sān nián shǒuxiào qīmǎn，tā kěyǐ chúsàng le。
The three year period of mourning is over today, he no longer has to wear the clothes of the mourning.
共产党员要遵党规，守党纪。
Gòngchǎndǎngyuán yào zūn dǎngguī，shǒu dǎngjì。
The Communists should obey party rules, and disciplines.
他多年来一直笃守着自己的职业道德。
Tā duōnián lái yìzhí dǔshǒu zhe zìjǐ de zhíyèdàodé。
For years, he has remained true to his professional ethics.
他为人端方，诚实守信。
Tā wéirén duānfāng，chéngshí shǒuxìn。
He is an upright man who is honest and credible.
我就在这里长期蹲守了，不信等不到他！
Wǒ jiù zài zhèlǐ chángqī dūnshǒu le，búxìn děng bú dào tā！
I\'ve been on watch here for a long time. I believe that he will show up one day.
领导者应该带头遵守法度，以身作则。
Lǐngdǎozhě yīnggāi dàitóu zūnshǒu fǎdù，yǐshēnzuòzé。
Leaders are supposed to set a good example to others in following laws and rules.
人人要养成遵守法度的习惯，处处严格要求自己。
Rénrén yào yǎngchéng zūnshǒu fǎdù de xíguàn，chùchù yángé yàoqiú zìjǐ。
Everybody should conform to norms and be strict with themselves.
在过去，人们认为喜欢抛头露面的妇女是不守妇道的。
Zài guòqù，rénmen rènwéi xǐhuan pāotóu lòumiàn de fùnǚ shì bùshǒu fùdào de。
In the past, people considered women who appeared in public to be lacking in virtue.
这个岗卡由两名士兵把守。
Zhège gǎngqiǎ yóu liǎng míng shìbīng bǎshǒu。
The pass is guarded by two soldiers.
你的保守观念真是根深柢固！
Nǐ de bǎoshǒu guānniàn zhēnshì gēnshēndǐgù！
How deep-seated your conservative opinions are!
战场上形势巨变，双方攻守易势。
Zhànchǎng shàng xíngshì jùbiàn，shuāngfāng gōngshǒu yìshì。
The situation of the battlefield has changed dramatically and it is easier to defend than to attack for both parties.
这座孤城估计也坚守不了多久了。
Zhèzuò gūchéng gūjì yě jiānshǒu bùliǎo duōjiǔ le。
This isolated city may not remain for too long.
小偷故技重施，被守候在一旁的便衣警察抓了个正着。
Xiǎotōu gùjì chóngshī，bèi shǒuhòu zài yìpáng de biànyī jǐngchá zhuā le gè zhèngzháo。
When trying the same old trick, the thief was caught by the plainclothes policeman waiting at the side.
这座关塞扼守南北交通的咽喉，是兵家必争之地。
Zhèzuò guānsāi èshǒu nánběi jiāotōng de yānhóu，shì bīngjiā bìzhēng zhī dì。
This frontire juncture is also a fort throat of the North-South transportation and all the military strategists are fighting for it.
他已经带着母亲的棺柩回原籍守孝去了。
Tā yǐjing dài zhe mǔqīn de guānjiù huí yuánjí shǒuxiào qù le。
He has returned to his ancestral home with his mother\'s coffin to observe mourning for his mother.
国际间的事务往来要遵守国际法。
Guójì jiān de shìwù wǎnglái yào zūnshǒu guójìfǎ。
International business should be conducted in accordance with the law of nations.
司机开车时要遵守交通规则，做到红灯亮，车辆停。
Sījī kāichē shí yào zūnshǒu jiāotōng guīzé，zuòdào hóngdēng liàng，chēliàng tíng。
Drivers must observe the traffic rules while driving. Once the light turns to red, they must stop the car.
他一生守法护法，尽职尽责，鞠躬尽瘁。
Tā yìshēng shǒufǎ hùfǎ，jìnzhí jìnzé，jūgōngjìncuì。
All his life he has been a lawbinding ,and law-defending.  He is in the line of duty, and spares no effort when performing his duty.
遵守会规是对每个会员最基本的要求。
Zūnshǒu huìguī shì duì měigè huìyuán zuì jīběn de yāoqiú。
It is a basic request for every member to abide by the association rules.
机动车上道一定要遵守交通规则。
Jīdòngchē shàngdào yídìng yào zūnshǒu jiāotōng guīzé。
Motorcars must observe traffic rules on the road.
在冰雪覆盖的边境高原有一支骑兵队日夜巡逻守卫疆陲。
Zài bīngxuě fùgài de biānjìng gāoyuán yǒu yìzhī qíbīngduì rìyè xúnluó shǒuwè jiāngchuí。
There is a troop of cavalry guarding the borders on the ice-capped plateau.
行人也要遵守交通法规。
Xíngrén yěyào zūnshǒu jiāotōng fǎguī。
Pedestrians should also follow traffic regulations.
进了佛门就要遵守佛家的戒规。
Jìn le fómén jiùyào zūnshǒu fójiā de jièguī。
Once you convert to Buddhism, you are supposed to follow e Buddhist rules and regulations.
入了佛门就要遵守佛家的戒条。
Rù le fómén jiùyào zūnshǒu fójiā de jiètiáo。
Once converted to Buddhism, one is supposed to follow Buddhist rules.
这座城池被卫兵把守得固若金汤。
Zhèzuò chéngchí bèi wèbīng bǎshǒu de gùruòjīntāng。
The city is strongly fortified by soldiers.
紫禁城由禁卫们把守，外人不得随意进入。
Zǐjìnchéng yóu jìnwèmen bǎshǒu，wàirén bùdé suíyì jìnrù。
The city of Beijing is guarded by imperial guards and strangers are not allowed in.
这种保守的观点是井蛙之见，不值得提倡。
Zhèzhǒng bǎoshǒu de guāndiǎn shì jǐngwā zhījiàn，bù zhídé tíchàng。
These conservative opinions are shallow and limited, and not worthwhile to promote.
每一个警员都要守国法、遵警纪。
Měi yígè jǐngyuán dōuyào shǒu guófǎ、zūn jǐngjì。
Every policemen should abide by the law and the police regulations.
他刚从看守所出来就旧病复发，又开始偷东西了。
Tā gāng cóng kànshǒusuǒ chūlái jiù jiùbìng fùfā，yòu kāishǐ tōu dōngxi le。
He went back to his old trade of stealing after getting out of jail.
这出《空城计》讲的是诸葛亮拒守空城的故事。
Zhè chū《Kōngchéngjì》jiǎng de shì Zhūgě Liàng jùshǒu kōngchéng de gùshì。
The story of the stratagem of the empty city is about how Zhugeliang defended an empty city in the face of his enemies.
由于敌军据险固守，我军无法向前。
Yóuyú díjūn jùxiǎn gùshǒu，wǒ jūn wúfǎ xiàng qián。
As the enemy is defending strongly; because of their strategic location, we can\'t move forward.
作为一名军人，必须无条件地遵守军规！
Zuòwéi yìmíng jūnrén，bìxū wú tiáojiàn de zūnshǒu jūnguī！
A soldier must follow military regulations with no exceptions.
比利是一条看守军火库的军犬。
Bǐlì shì yìtiáo kānshǒu jūnhuǒkù de jūnquǎn。
Billy is a police dog that guards the arsenal.
那个新发现的汉代古墓，墓主人很可能是个郡守！
Nàge xīn fāxiàn de Hàndài gǔmù，mùzhǔrén hěnkěnéng shì gè jùnshǒu！
That newly found ancient cemetery of the Han Dynasty might have belonged to a county official.
他在工作上始终都是克尽职守。
Tā zài gōngzuò shàng shǐ zhōng dōushì kèjìnzhíshǒu。
He exercises due diligence in performing his work duties.
对待工作，她一贯恪尽职守、认认真真。
Duìdài gōngzuò，tā yíguàn kèjìn zhíshǒu、rènrènzhēnzhēn。
She always fulfills her duties scrupulously at work.
他不遵纪守法，终于有一天郎当入狱。
Tā bùzūnjì shǒufǎ，zhōng yú yǒu yìtiān lángdāng rùyù。
He didn\'t abide by laws, and observed discipline but was chained and put in prison one day.
这位战士驻守在这个雷达站已经有三年的时间了。
Zhèwèi zhànshì zhùshǒu zài zhège léidázhàn yǐjing yǒu sān nián de shíjiān le。
The soldier has been garrisoned at the radar station for more than three years.
礼法要尊重，但不能一味地死守。
Lǐfǎ yào zūnzhòng，dàn bùnéng yíwèi de sǐshǒu。
We should respect ceremonial rites and regulations, but needn\'t blindly cling to them.
这种临时性的法规我们也要严格遵守。
Zhèzhǒng línshíxìng de fǎguī wǒmen yěyào yángé zūnshǒu。
Even though they are provisional rules, they should be observed strictly.
我们必须留置足够的兵力，守卫这个阵地。
Wǒmen bìxū liúzhì zúgòu de bīnglì，shǒuwèi zhège zhèndì。
We must keep enough troops to safeguard this front.
我坚持自己的职业操守，绝不会为美色所诱惑。
Wǒ jiānchí zìjǐ de zhíyè cāoshǒu，jué búhuì wéi měisè suǒ yòuhuò。
I stick to my professional virtues, and will never be allured by beautiful women.
首都马上就要失守了，皇帝只能蒙尘出逃了。
Shǒudū mǎshàng jiùyào shīshǒu le，huángdì zhǐnéng méngchén chūtáo le。
The capital will be captured soon, so the emperor has to go into exile.
请大家遵守剧场秩序，按号入坐。
Qǐng dàjiā zūnshǒu jùchǎng zhìxù，ànhào rùzuò。
Please abide by the rules of the theater. Take your seat according to your seat number.
他向来是个守本分的人，不会做出越轨之事。
Tā xiàng lái shì gè shǒu běnfèn de rén，búhuì zuòchū yuèguǐ zhī shì。
He is always a dutiful person, so will not go off the rails.
这座城池的守兵都被调往前线打仗去了。
Zhèzuò chéngchí de shǒubīng dōu bèi diàowǎng qiánxiàn dǎzhàng qù le。
The armed guards of this city have all been transferred to the front lines to fight.
为表孝心，他要给去世的母亲守服三年。
Wèi biǎo xiàoxīn，tā yào gěi qùshì de mǔqīn shǒufú sān nián。
In order to show his filial love, he decided to stay in mourning for three years.
这个阵地的守将英勇无比，要想攻克，很不容易。
Zhège zhèndì de shǒujiàng yīngyǒng wúbǐ，yào xiǎng gōngkè，hěnbùróngyì。
The garrison general in this position is matchlessly valiant, it will be very difficult to conquer it.
对于顽固的守旧派，我们不能只用言语说服他们，更要以事实证明给他们看。
Duìyú wángù de shǒujiùpài，wǒmen bùnéng zhǐ yòng yányǔ shuìfú tāmen，gèng yào yǐ shìshí zhèngmíng gěi tāmen kàn。
As for those obstinate conservatives, we should not only persuade them with words, but also prove their mistakes with facts.
独守空房很久的她终于盼来了夫妻团聚的这一天。
Dúshǒu kōngfáng hěnjiǔ de tā zhōng yú pànlái le fūqī tuánjù de zhè yì tiān。
Having stayed at home for a long time, she finally saw the day she could reunite with her husband.
根据比赛规则：擂主如果守擂成功，就能获得一万元的奖励。
Gēnjù bǐsài guīzé：lèizhǔ rúguǒ shǒulèi chénggōng，jiù néng huòdé yíwàn yuán de jiǎnglì。
According to the rules of the contest, if the former winner can defeat the challenger, he\'ll get a prize of 10,000 yuan.
听说守墓人的生活不仅清苦寂寞，而且有一定的危险性。
Tīngshuō shǒumù rén de shēnghuó bùjǐn qīngkǔ jìmò，érqiě yǒu yídìng de wēixiǎnxìng。
I heard that a grave-keeper\'s life is not only poor and lonely, but also a bit dangerous.
各个地方的守丧习俗不太相同。
Gè gè dìfāng de shǒusàng xísú bú tài xiāngtóng。
The rites for the dead vary from one place to another.
咱们这些人里除了他能守摊子，别人谁也不能撑起这件事。
Zánmen zhèxiē rén lǐ chú le tā néng shǒutānzi，biérén shéi yě bùnéng chēngqǐ zhèjiàn shì。
None of us can maintain the situation except him.
他是一个严格守制的孝子。
Tā shì yígè yángé shǒuzhì de xiàozǐ。
He is a filial son, strictly observing the rites of the dead.
他俩厮守多年，感情越来越深。
Tā liǎ sīshǒu duōnián，gǎnqíng yuèláiyuè shēn。
They have been together for many years, and are more and more in love with each other.
做一任太守就要造福一方。
Zuò yí rèn tàishǒu jiùyào zàofú yìfāng。
Being a prefect (which was a government position in ancient China), he must try to bring benefit to the people.
他通夜守候在我的病床前，真让我感动。
Tā tōngyè shǒuhòu zài wǒ de bìngchuáng qián，zhēn ràng wǒ gǎndòng。
He stayed beside my bed the whole night, which really moved me.
从今以后同盟者都要遵守共同的行为规范。
Cóngjīn yǐhòu tóngméngzhě dōuyào zūnshǒu gòngtóng de xíngwéi guīfàn。
From now on, all allies should observe a common code of conduct.
遵守团纪是共青团员必须做到的。
Zūnshǒu tuánjì shì gòngqīngtuányuán bìxū zuòdào de。
It is necessary for all the CYL members to observe the league rules.
这名警察因玩忽职守罪被判了刑。
Zhè míng jǐngchá yīn wánhū zhíshǒuzuì bèi pàn le xíng。
This policeman was punished for his dereliction of duty.
长城宛似一条巨龙守护在世界的东方。
Chángchéng wǎnsì yìtiáo jùlóng shǒuhù zài shìjiè de dōngfāng。
Like a huge dragon, the Great Wall guards the east of the world.
五行八作各有各的规矩，不论做哪一行，都要守行规。
Wǔxíng bāzuò gè yǒu gè de guījǔ，bùlùn zuò nǎ yìháng，dōuyào shǒu hángguī。
Each profession has its own rules.  No matter what you do, you must follow them.
小王是个守约的人，就算天上下刀子也不会失约。

Xiao Wang is a person who keeps his promise no matter what happens.
小王是个墨守陈规的人，萧规曹随正是他的行事风格。

这里地势形胜，易守难攻，是个兵家必争之地。
Zhèlǐ dìshì xíngshèng，yìshǒu nángōng，shì gè bīngjiā bìzhēng zhī dì。
It is a crucial battle field wanted by both parties due to its advantageous geographic location, making the place easy to defend and difficult to attack.
她是一个儇薄女子，很不安分守己的。
Tā shì yígè xuānbó nǚzǐ，hěn bùānfèn shǒujǐ de。

因循守旧的人必然适应不了时代的发展。

People who get stuck in a groove aren\'t able to adapt themselves to the times.
一对有情人相爱却不能相守，真是天不从人愿。
Yí duì yǒuqíngrén xiāngài què bùnéng xiāngshǒu，zhēnshì tiān bùcóng rényuàn。
A pair of lovers are deeply in love, but they can\'t stay together forever; what a misfortune that Heaven won\'t grant our wishes.
这里的狱卒总是在看守犯人的时候喝酒。

Warders here always drink when watching the prisoners.
所有在教人员都应该遵守教义。

All members believing in this religion should abide by its doctrine.

He abides by rules and regulations, and has never violated the regulations of the work unit.
在长江对岸坐守关口的将领深受他的喜爱。

There is a great divide between liberals and conservatives in the government.
政府泾渭分明地分为了自由党和保守党两个党派。
She is very firm with her employees and makes sure they follow the rules.
她对雇员非常严格，并要求他们遵守所有条文规定。
The goalkeeper injured his leg in the second half of the match and had to be carried off.
下半场，守门员伤了腿，被抬出了赛场。
Another conservative has a change of heart.
另一个保守派改变主意了。
I stayed close to my husband Charles until his death.
我一直守在丈夫查理的身边，直到他咽下最后一口气。
absent without leave
[军] 擅离职守
to behave oneself
守规矩
He never let his jailers break him.
他是永远不会让他的监狱看守弄垮的。
a closely guarded secret
一个严格保守的秘密
compliance with sth
遵守某事
a closely guarded secret
一个严格保守的秘密
to keep sth under one\'s hat
对某事保守秘密
to keep sth to o.s.
保守秘密
to keep an appointment
守约
can you keep a secret?
你能保守秘密吗？
to break/keep a promise (to do sth)
违背/遵守(做某事的)诺言
to keep quiet about sth/keep sth quiet
保守某事的秘密/将某事保密
can you keep a secret?
你能保守秘密吗？
to be secretive about sth
对某事守口如瓶
The jailers saw through my scheme.
看守们识破了我的计划。
to be/remain silent about sth
对某事守口如瓶
to be sworn to secrecy/silence
发誓保守秘密/保持沉默
to keep one\'s word
遵守诺言
Those who do not conform to the law must bear the consequences.
不守法的人就应承担后果。
Children are taught to observe certain regulations at school.
在学校，老师教育孩子们要遵守一定的规定。
My uncle is a religious man and he has been strictly observing the tithe rule.
我的叔叔是个虔诚的人，他一直严格遵守十一奉制度。
At the birth of son, Tom was there to cut his umbilical cord.
当儿子出生时，汤姆一直守候在产房，亲自为女儿剪断脐带。
I take a vanward attitude in art, but in culture, I prefer a conventional way.
我在艺术方面喜爱创新，但是文化方面倾向于保守。
When the watchkeeper\'s back was turned, he made her escape.
看守人一转过身去，他就把她放走了。
The soldier stands in the watchtower every day.
这个士兵每天都守在了望楼上。
They had built a watchtower to protect the village from robber.
他们建了一个守望台保护村庄不受强盗入侵。
A little boy is standing at the threshold of their tent, pretending that he is a guard.
一个小男孩站在帐篷的门口，假装自己是守卫。
The lawyer must keep the secret of his clients.
律师必须替委托人保守秘密。
It is impossible for me to stick to the Buddhist principles.
对我来说，遵守佛教的戒律是不可能的。
The soliders dispatched him for negligence of duty.
士兵们因为他的玩忽职守把他杀了。
Despite fatigue, he held his position.
尽管很累，他还是坚守岗位。
The explicit use of energy conservation can often save mathematical labor by eliminating one integration.
直接应用能量守恒可以减少一次积分,这就常常能减少数学运算。
The cadre neglected his duty and caused great loss to the country.
这名干部玩忽职守，导致国家遭受了巨大的损失。
All staff have to observe the rules of the factory.
所有人必须遵守工厂的规章制度。
His personality features oddity and reserve.
他的性格古怪保守。
Hunters also possess a primal connection to the beasts of Azeroth, capable of taming and training them to keep as loyal guardians.
同时，猎人还保持着与艾则拉斯野兽的沟通的能力，能驯服和训练它们作为自己最忠实的守卫。
He is very strict in observing the regulations.
他在遵守规章方面很严格。
Her tight-lipped friend had kept it a secret.
她那守口如瓶的朋友对这事一直保密。
Traditional values are the foundation of conservative politics.
传统价值观是保守政治学的思想根源。
In general, John is very punctual. It\'s unusual for him to be late.
约翰总的说来是个很守时的人。他迟到太少见了。

哎，外面天气多好，我却得守在办公室处理这些文件。
The goalie left the cage wide open for an easy goal.
Shǒuményuán ràng qiúmén dòngkāi，yǐbiàn pūqiú。
守门员让球门洞开，以便扑球。
The capture of the village did little to our low morale.
Cūnzhuāng de shīshǒu duì wǒmen dīluò de shìqì yǐngxiǎng bú dà。
村庄的失守对我们低落的士气影响不大。
The capture of the queen has greatly reduced his chance to win.
Huánghòu qízǐ de shīshǒu dàdà jiàngdī tā huòshèng de jīlǜ。

A caretaker boss is expected to be named today.
Yùjì jīntiān yí wèi Kānshǒusuǒ suǒzhǎng jiānghuì shàngrèn。
预计今天一位看守所所长将会上任。

Wǒ yīnggāi ràng nǐ zhīdào，érbúshì duì nǐ bǎoshǒu mìmì。
我应该让你知道，而不是对你保守秘密。

我因为走路不遵守交通规则而被开罚单并被拘留。

詹姆士和一位教授联系了，那教授同意给他博士奖学金。
Curl was awarded the Nobel Prize in Chemistry in 1996.
Kē\'ěr zài yījiǔjiǔliù nián bèishòuyǔ Nuòbèi\'ěr Huàxuéjiǎng。
科尔在1996年被授予诺贝尔化学奖。
The Science Talent Search has given awards to more than two-thousand young Americans.
已经有2000余名美国青年被授予科学人才探索奖。
The scholarships will be awarded noncompetitively.
Jiǎngxuéjīn bìngbúshì yǐ jìngzhēng fāngshì shòuyǔ de。
奖学金并不是以竞争方式授予的。
解放前，有的艺人靠传艺授徒来维持生计。
Jiěfàng qián，yǒu de yìrén kào chuányì shòutú lái wéichí shēngjì。
Some of the artisans made a living by teaching skills.
Before retiring two years ago, I taught mathematics and computer science in London.
我退休两年了，在这之前一直在伦敦教授数学和计算机课。
From 1910 to 1924, he lectured regularly at the school of civic design.
yījiǔyīlíng zhì yījiǔèrsì nián，tā zài chéngshìshèjì xuéyuàn dìngqī shòukè。
1910至1924年，他在城市设计学院定期授课。
Our instruction was carefully programmed.
Wǒmen de shòukè shì jīngguò rènzhēn jìhuà de。
我们的授课是经过认真计划的。
闭幕式后举行了授旗仪式，组委会将奥运会的会旗移授与下届的主办城市。
Bìmùshì hòu jǔxíng le shòuqí yíshì，zǔwěihuì jiāng àoyùnhuì de huìqí yíshòuyǔ xiàjiè de zhǔbàn chéngshì。
After the closing ceremony was the flag-giving ceremony, in which the committee transferred the flag of the Olympic Games to the next host.
张教授在大学里负责教授高等数学。
Zhāng jiàoshòu zài dàxué lǐ fùzé jiàoshòu gāoděng shùxué。
Professor Zhang teaches advanced mathematics in a college.
我很崇敬这位老教授。
Wǒ hěn chóngjìngzhè wèi lǎojiàoshòu。
I have great respect for the old professor.
传授知识
chuánshòu zhīshi
impart knowledge to; teach
向年轻人传授技术
xiàng niánqīngrén chuánshòu jìshù 
teach young people skills; give technical instruction to young people
讲授不甚得法
jiǎngshòu búshèn défǎ 
not teach in the right (or proper) way
函授部
hánshòu bù
correspondence department (of a school)
他讲授哲学。
Tā jiǎnɡshòu zhéxué。 
He teaches philosophy.
讲授提纲
jiǎngshòu tígāng
an outline for a lecture; teaching notes
教授历史
jiàoshòu lìshǐ
teach history
世界语刊授招生。
Shìjièyǔ kānshòu zhāoshēng。
Students will be enrolled to learn Esperanto mainly through publications.
客座教授
kèzuò jiàoshòu
guest professor; visiting professor
每周授课16课时
měi zhōu shòu kè shíliù kèshí
teach 16 periods a week
我国许多地方戏曲都是由民间艺人世代口授而保存下来的。
Wǒ guó xǔduō dìfāngxìqǔ dōushì yóu mínjiān yìrén shìdài kǒushòu ér bǎocún xiàlái de。
Many of our local operas were preserved by folk artists who passed them down from generation to generation by word of mouth.
他写的这封信是他父亲口授的。
Tā xiě de zhè fēngxìn shì tā fùqīn kǒushòu de。
The letter he wrote was dictated by his father.
凭他那块料也想当教授。
Píngtā nà kuài liào yě xiǎngdāngjiàoshòu。
Even an oaf like him thinks he can be a professor.
面授机宜
miànshòu jīyí
personally instruct sb. on the line of action to pursue; give a confidential briefing; brief sb. on how to act
名教授
míngjiàoshòu
a well-known (or prominent) professor
受聘为访问教授
shòupìn wéi fǎngwèn jiàoshòu
be engaged as a visiting professor
评功授奖大会
pínggōngshòujiǎngdàhuì
a meeting to announce commendations and issue awards
这个僻字岂但我们不认识，恐怕连老教授们也未必知道。
Zhège pìzì qǐ dàn wǒmen bú rènshi，kǒngpà lián lǎo jiàoshòumen yě wèibì zhīdào。
Not only we don\'t know this obsolete character, even the old professors may not know it.
热心传授技术
rèxīn chuánshòu jìshù
make earnest efforts to pass on one\'s skill
请李教授审订此稿。
Qǐng Lǐ jiàoshòu shěndìng cǐ gǎo。
Ask Professor Li to make a critical examination of this manuscript (or to revise this manuscript).
升教授
shēng jiàoshòu
get promoted to professor
授旗
shòu qí
present (sb. with) a flag
授以全权
shòu yǐ quánquán
vest sb. with full authority
授奖仪式
shòujiǎng yíshì
prizegiving ceremony; medal-awarding ceremony
授命组阁
shòumìng zǔgé
authorize sb. to form a cabinet
授权新华社发表声明
shòuquán xīnhuáshè fābiǎo shēngmíng
authorize Xinhua News Agency to make a statement
男女授受不亲。
Nánnǚ shòushòubùqīn。
In giving and receiving, man and woman should not touch each other (according to Confucian rules of etiquette).
授位典礼
shòuwèi diǎnlǐ
degree-awarding ceremony
授勋仪式
shòuxūn yíshì
medal-conferring ceremony
他这样干，是谁授意的？
Tā zhèyàng gàn，shì shúi shòuyì de?
Who got him to do that? or Who put him up to it?
授予学位
shòuyǔ xuéwèi
award a degree
拿公家的东西私相授受
ná gōngjia de dōngxi sīxiāngshòushòu
illicit transfer of public property
这一期我们特约钱教授写了一篇书评。
Zhè yì qī wǒmen tèyuē Qián jiàoshòu xiě le yì piān shūpíng。
For this issue we have specially requested Professor Qian to write a book review.
这位老教授态度严肃，令人望而生畏。
Zhèwèi lǎo jiàoshòu tàidu yánsù，lìngrén wàng\'érshēngwèi。
The old professor seemed stern and forbidding.
老教授告诫他要经得住赞谀，架得住批评。
Lǎo jiàoshòu gàojiè tā yào jīng de zhù zànyú，jià de zhù pīpíng。
The old professor cautioned him to hear both lavish praise and criticism with equanimity.
追授一级战斗英雄称号
zhuīshòu yījí zhàndòu yīngxióngchēnghào 
be posthumously awarded the title of Combat Hero Class 1
老郭去世后，被追授为“人民的好医生”的光荣称号。
Lǎo Guō qùshì hòu，bèi zhuīshòu wéi“rénmín de hǎo yī shēng”de guāngróngchēnghào。
Lao Guo was posthumously given the title &quot;People\'s Doctor&quot;.
函授
hánshòu
teach by correspondence; give a correspondence course
她大学的时候一直暗恋一位已婚的教授。
Tā dàxué de shíhou yìzhí ànliàn yíwèi yǐhūn de jiàoshòu。
Throughout her college years she had secret crush on a married professor.
老师派我到车站接李教授出站。
Lǎoshī pài wǒ dào chēzhàn jiē Lǐ jiàoshòu chūzhàn。
The teacher sent me to meet Professor Li at the station.
初识李教授总觉得他难以接近，可后来发现并不是这样。
Chūshí Lǐ jiàoshòu zǒng juédé tā nányǐ jiējìn，kě hòulái fāxiàn bìng búshì zhèyàng。
When I first met professor Li I thought he was difficult to approach, but later I learned he is friendly.
张教授写了一本书《亚健康初探》，还很畅销。
Zhāng jiàoshòu xiě le yìběn shū《Yàjiànkāngchūtàn》，hái hěnchàngxiāo。
Professor Zhang wrote a book titled &quot;Pilot Study on Sub-health&quot;, which sold well.
同学们都在传写教授的笔记。
Tóngxuémen dōu zài chuánxiě jiàoshòu de bǐjì。
All the classmates are making private copies of the professor\'s notes.
解放前，有的艺人靠传艺授徒来维持生计。
Jiěfàng qián，yǒu de yìrén kào chuányì shòutú lái wéichí shēngjì。
Some of the artisans made a living by teaching skills.
对于王教授的创议我们还要进行研究讨论。
Duìyú Wáng jiàoshòu de chuàngyì wǒmen háiyào jìnxíng yánjiū tǎolùn。
We need to discuss and do some research on Professor Wang\'s proposal.
这位教授是辞源学的专家。
Zhèwèi jiàoshòu shì cíyuánxué de zhuānjiā。
This professor is a specialist in the study of the origin of phraseology.
此人就是我之前提起的李教授。
Cǐrén jiùshì wǒ zhīqián tíqǐ de Lǐ jiàoshòu。
This person is Professor Li, who I have mentioned before.
这位教授是位大儒，弟子遍布全国。
Zhèwèi jiàoshòu shì wèi dàrú，dìzǐ biànbùquánguó。
The professor is a famous scholar with students from all over China.
这栋单元楼里住着五名老教授。
Zhè dòng dānyuánlóu lǐ zhù zhe wǔ míng lǎojiàoshòu。
Five elderly professors live in the apartment building.
这套刀法是少林寺的高僧传授的。
Zhètào dāofǎ shì shǎolínsì de gāosēng chuánshòu de。
This swordsmanship set is taught by a senior monk at the Shaolin Temple.
王教授被评为工程院院士。
Wáng jiàoshòu bèi píngwéi gōngchéngyuàn yuànshì。
Professor Wang was appointed academician of the Engineering Academy.
你真够面子，连李教授都来为你捧场。
Nǐ zhēn gòu miànzi，lián Lǐ jiàoshòu dōu lái wèi nǐ pěngchǎng。
You receive such an honor, even professor Li has come here for you.
虽身居海外，张教授情系故园。
Suī shēnjū hǎiwài，Zhāng jiàoshòu qíngxì gùyuán。
Though living abroad, Professor Zhang still thinks about his hometown.
从先秦到近代，老教授经史子集靡不贯通，尤以集部为最精。
Cóng xiānqín dào jìndài，lǎojiàoshòu jīngshǐ zǐjí míbú guàntōng，yóu yǐ jíbùwéi zuìjīng。
The elderly professor knows everything from the early Qin Dynasty to recent times, and from Jing, Shi, Zi to Ji, the last of which is his specialty.
由于工作成绩突出，公司奖授了他一台电脑。
Yóuyú gōngzuò chéngjì tūchū，gōngsī jiǎngshòu le tā yìtái diànnǎo。
He was awarded a computer for his outstanding performance in his work.
她正在传授保持身材姣美的秘诀。
Tā zhèngzài chuánshòu bǎochí shēncái jiāoměi de mìjué。
She is lecturing others about the secrets of keeping a good figure.
他在经学院教授圣经，是个虔诚的基督徒。
Tā zài jīngxuéyuàn jiāoshòu shèngjīng，shì gè qiánchéng de jīdūtú。
He teaches the Bible in theological schools and is a pious Christian.
教授总是一副倨傲的样子，所以我非常不喜欢他。
Jiàoshòu zǒngshì yífù jùào de yàngzi，suǒyǐ wǒ fēicháng bùxǐhuan tā。
The professor is always so arrogant, I don\'t like him very much.
这本《春秋》是由王教授考释的。
Zhèběn《Chūnqiū》 shì yóu Wáng jiàoshòu kǎoshì de。
Professor Wang has made philological studies of the book The Spring and Autumn Annals.
这个年轻小花脸的科白是经过名师传授的。
Zhège niánqīng xiǎohuāliǎn de kēbái shì jīngguò míngshī chuánshòu de。
This young Hualian learned his actions and speaking skills from a famous master.
张老师退休后被多所大学聘为客座教授了。
Zhāng lǎoshī tuìxiū hòu bèi duō suǒ dàxué pìnwéi kèzuò jiàoshòu le。
After retirement, Mr. Zhang was employed as a visiting professor by several universities.
这个课题组的组长是张教授。
Zhège kètízǔ de zǔzhǎng shì Zhāng jiàoshòu。
The leader of the research group is Prof. Zhang.
李教授的离世是学校的巨大损失，也是我们学生的巨大损失。
Lǐ jiàoshòu de líshì shì xuéxiào de jùdà sǔnshī，yě shì wǒmen xuésheng de jùdà sǔnshī。
Professor Li\'s passing was a great loss to the school, and students.
你不要用小学生的水平蠡测教授高深的理论，那样是没法理解的。
Nǐ búyào yòng xiǎoxuésheng de shuǐpíng lícè jiāoshòu gāoshēn de lǐlùn，nàyàng shì méifǎ lǐjiě de。
Don\'t try to understand the profound theories of the professor from the perspective of a pupil. In this way, it is impossible to understand.
他是王教授力荐的课题组长，一定非常优秀。
Tā shì Wáng jiàoshòu lìjiàn de kètí zǔzhǎng，yídìng fēicháng yōuxiù。
He was strongly recommended to be the project leader by Professor Wang. He must be very excellent.
感谢李教授今天能够莅会，我们与会的年轻学者定会有所收获。
Gǎnxiè Lǐ jiàoshòu jīntiān nénggòu lìhuì，wǒmen yùhuì de niánqīng xuézhě dìnghuì yǒusuǒ shōuhuò。
Thank you for your participation in the meeting, Professor Li. We young scholars present will surely gain a lot from you.
解放前的西南联大里聚集着一批国内知名的教授学者。
Jiěfàng qián de xīnán liándà lǐ jùjí zhe yì pī guónèi zhīmíng de jiàoshòu xuézhě。
Before liberation at the Southwest United University, there was a famous group of professors and scholars.
我家邻舍住的是一位大学教授。
Wǒjiā línshè zhù de shì yíwèi dàxué jiàoshòu。
Next to my house lives a university professor.
我在这家私塾一共教授八名蒙童。
Wǒ zài zhè jiā sīshú yígòng jiāoshòu bā míng méngtóng。
I teach a total of ten pupils in this private school.
师傅亲手把这本武林秘笈传授给了我。
Shīfu qīnshǒu bǎ zhèběn wǔlín mìjí chuánshòu gěi le wǒ。
The master handed me the rare and secret book of martial arts.
关于这个问题，还望您面授机宜。
Guānyú zhège wèntí，hái wàng nín miànshòu jīyí。
About this problem, I hope you can instruct me personally on how to pursue action.
自从得到名师亲授，他的技艺进步很快。
Zìcóng dédào míngshī qīnshòu，tā de jìyì jìnbùhěnkuài。
After having had the benefit of guidance by a master, he has made much headway in skill.
这位教授是美术界的翘楚。
Zhèwèi jiàoshòu shì měishùjiè de qiàochǔ。
The professor is an outstanding member of the arts circles.
由于长期不孕，她决定尝试人工授精。
Yóuyú chángqī búyùn，tā juédìng chángshì réngōng shòujīng。
Because she hasn\'t been able to get pregnant for a long time, she has decided to try artificial insemination.
余教授是位儒林名士。
Yú jiàoshòu shì wèi rúlín míngshì。
Professor Yu is famous among Confucian scholars.
我们都为教授这个深层的见解所折服。
Wǒmen dōu wéi jiàoshòu zhège shēncéng de jiànjiě suǒ zhéfú。
We were all filled with admiration at the professor\'s deep insight.
张教授是专门研究诗史的学者，对春秋战国时的古体诗颇有研究。
Zhāng jiàoshòu shì zhuānmén yánjiū shīshǐ de xuézhě，duì Chūnqiūzhànguó shí de gǔtǐshī pōyǒu yánjiū。
Professor Zhang is a scholar specializing in the history of poems, especially the archaic poems in the Warring States Period.
我很喜欢看李教授的史论，从中获益匪浅。
Wǒ hěnxǐhuan kàn Lǐ jiàoshòu de shǐlùn，cóng zhōng huòyì fěiqiǎn。
I like Professor Li\'s historical essays and benefit a lot from them.
教授被人当众辱骂，简直是斯文扫地。
Jiàoshòu bèi rén dāngzhòng rǔmà，jiǎnzhí shì sīwén sǎodì。
The professor was abused in public, his scholarly dignity completely disgraced.
教我们《应用几何学》的是学校的外聘教授。
Jiāo wǒmen《Yìngyòngjǐhéxué》 de shì xuéxiào de wàipìn jiàoshòu。
An external professor employed by our school teaches us Applied Geometry.
小李正在做外植试验，教授要求他及时报告试验结果。
Xiǎo Lǐ zhèngzài zuò wàizhí shìyàn，jiàoshòu yāoqiú tā jíshí bàogào shìyàn jiéguǒ。
Xiao Wang is doing an experiment on external planting, and the professor has asked him to report his results promptly.
教授正在为这段难懂的文字添加尾注。
Jiàoshòu zhèngzài wèi zhè duàn nándǒng de wénzì tiānjiā wěizhù。
The professor is adding endnotes to this difficult paragraph.
在抗击匈奴的战争中立功，他被授予王爷的位号。
Zài kàngjī xiōngnú de zhànzhēng zhōng lìgōng，tā bèi shòuyǔ wángye de wèihào。
He was made a duke for his contribution in fighting against the Huns.
舞蹈学院的教授一直利用业余时间收集中国古代舞谱。
Wǔdǎo xuéyuàn de jiàoshòu yìzhí lìyòng yèyú shíjiān shōují Zhōngguó gǔdài wǔpǔ。
The professors at the dance college always spend their spare time collecting books on ancient Chinese dance.
李教授的著作具有极强的系统性和逻辑性。
Lǐ jiàoshòu de zhùzuò jùyǒu jíqiáng de xìtǒngxìng hé luójíxìng。
Professor Li\'s works are very systematic, and logical.
教授在古代文学研究方面学有专长，我们很敬佩他。
Jiàoshòu zài gǔdài wénxué yánjiū fāngmiàn xuéyǒu zhuāncháng，wǒmen hěn jìngpèi tā。
The professor is a specialist in the research of ancient literature and we all respect him very much.
张教授一直致力于找寻佚诗的工作。
Zhāng jiàoshòu yìzhí zhìlìyú zhǎoxún yìshī de gōngzuò。
Professor Zhang has devoted himself to collecting poems that have disappeared.
老教授近几年来一直忙于收集轶诗。
Lǎo jiàoshòu jìn jǐnián lái yìzhí mángyú shōují yìshī。
The professor has been busy collecting missing poems these years.
老教授发誓要在一年内找到全部逸文。
Lǎo jiàoshòu fāshì yào zài yìnián nèi zhǎodào quánbùyìwén。
The old professor is determined to collect all the anecdotes in a year.
教授正在为教研复习资料编制引得。
Jiàoshòu zhèngzài wèi jiàoyán fùxí zīliào biānzhì yǐndé。
The professor is drawing up an index for the teaching and research review materials.
老教授正在引例说明健康教育的重要性。
Lǎojiàoshòu zhèngzài yǐnlì shuōmíng jiànkāng jiàoyù de zhòngyàoxìng。
The old professor is illustrating the importance of health education.
教授讲得眉飞色舞，学生们却没有太大的反响，只是随声应和。
Jiàoshòu jiǎng de méifēi sèwǔ，xuéshengmen què méiyǒu tài dà de fǎnxiǎng，zhǐshì suíshēng yìnghè。
The professor lectured with a beaming countenance, but the students didn\'t respond much, only agreeing with what he said.
老教授虽然满鬓银发，可眼睛却炯炯有神。
Lǎojiàoshòu suīrán mǎnbìn yínfà，kě yǎnjīng què jiǒngjiǒng yǒushén。
Though the old professor has grey hair at his temples, his eyes are brimming with vigour.
他凭着假教授的身份，到处招摇撞骗。
Tā píng zhe jiǎ jiàoshòu de shēnfèn，dàochù zhāoyáo zhuàngpiàn。
He passed himself off as a professor to go about cheating people.
看着朝气蓬勃的学生们，老教授会心地笑了。
Kàn zhe zhāoqì péngbó de xuéshengmen，lǎojiàoshòu huìxīn de xiào le。
Looking at the spirited students, the old professor shows an understanding smile.
朱教授把诊断书夹到了病历里。
Zhū jiàoshòu bǎ zhěnduànshū jiādào le bìnglì lǐ。
Professor Zhu put the medical certificate into the medical record.
他是我们学校的教授，知识面很广。

Dì-yī cì Bālèsītǎn qǐyì yǐ yījiǔjiǔsān nián Yǐsèliè shòuyǔ Bālèsītǎn mínzú quánlì jīgòu yǒuxiàn zìzhìquán ér jiéshù。

She was diffident when offering a comment on the professor\'s lecture.

在对教授的课进行评论时，她有点不太自信。

The professor combusted when the student didn\'t know the answer to a very elementary question.

The arbitrator\'s authority derived from the consent of the disputants.

仲裁者的职权来自争议双方的认可和授权。
Teaching history gave him a special point of view toward current events.

教授历史使他对当代事件持有独特的观点。

由于长期不孕，她决定尝试人工授精。

Because she hasn\'t been able to get pregnant for a long time, she has decided to try artificial insemination.
面授机宜
miànshòu jīyí
personally instruct sb. on the line of action to pursue; give a confidential briefing; brief sb. on how to act
关于这个问题，还望您面授机宜。
Guānyú zhège wèntí，hái wàng nín miànshòu jīyí。
About this problem, I hope you can instruct me personally on how to pursue action.
你真够面子，连李教授都来为你捧场。

You receive such an honor, even professor Li has come here for you.
他是我们学校的教授，知识面很广。
Tā shì wǒmen xuéxiào de jiàoshòu，zhīshimiàn hěn guǎng。
He is a professor at our school, who has a wide range of knowledge.
教授在古代文学研究方面学有专长，我们很敬佩他。

客座教授
kèzuò jiàoshòu
guest professor; visiting professor
张老师退休后被多所大学聘为客座教授了。
Zhāng lǎoshī tuìxiū hòu bèi duō suǒ dàxué pìnwéi kèzuò jiàoshòu le。
After retirement, Mr. Zhang was employed as a visiting professor by several universities.
他是这所大学的客座教授。
Tā shì zhè suǒ dàxué de kèzuòjiàoshòu.
He\'s a visiting professor at the university.
客座教授
客座教授。
张教授在大学里负责教授高等数学。
Zhāng jiàoshòu zài dàxué lǐ fùzé jiàoshòu gāoděng shùxué。
Professor Zhang teaches advanced mathematics in a college.
教授正在为教研复习资料编制引得。
Jiàoshòu zhèngzài wèi jiàoyán fùxí zīliào biānzhì yǐndé。
The professor is drawing up an index for the teaching and research review materials.
老教授正在引例说明健康教育的重要性。
Lǎojiàoshòu zhèngzài yǐnlì shuōmíng jiànkāng jiàoyù de zhòngyàoxìng。
The old professor is illustrating the importance of health education.
我很崇敬这位老教授。
Wǒ hěn chóngjìngzhè wèi lǎojiàoshòu。
I have great respect for the old professor.

jiàoshòu lìshǐ
teach history

kèzuò jiàoshòu
guest professor; visiting professor

Píngtā nà kuài liào yě xiǎngdāngjiàoshòu。
Even an oaf like him thinks he can be a professor.
名教授
míngjiàoshòu
a well-known (or prominent) professor
受聘为访问教授
shòupìn wéi fǎngwèn jiàoshòu
be engaged as a visiting professor
这个僻字岂但我们不认识，恐怕连老教授们也未必知道。
Zhège pìzì qǐ dàn wǒmen bú rènshi，kǒngpà lián lǎo jiàoshòumen yě wèibì zhīdào。

升教授
shēng jiàoshòu
get promoted to professor
这一期我们特约钱教授写了一篇书评。
Zhè yì qī wǒmen tèyuē Qián jiàoshòu xiě le yì piān shūpíng。

这位老教授态度严肃，令人望而生畏。
Zhèwèi lǎo jiàoshòu tàidu yánsù，lìngrén wàng\'érshēngwèi。
The old professor seemed stern and forbidding.
老教授告诫他要经得住赞谀，架得住批评。
Lǎo jiàoshòu gàojiè tā yào jīng de zhù zànyú，jià de zhù pīpíng。
The old professor cautioned him to hear both lavish praise and criticism with equanimity.
她大学的时候一直暗恋一位已婚的教授。
Tā dàxué de shíhou yìzhí ànliàn yíwèi yǐhūn de jiàoshòu。
Throughout her college years she had secret crush on a married professor.
老师派我到车站接李教授出站。
Lǎoshī pài wǒ dào chēzhàn jiē Lǐ jiàoshòu chūzhàn。
The teacher sent me to meet Professor Li at the station.
初识李教授总觉得他难以接近，可后来发现并不是这样。
Chūshí Lǐ jiàoshòu zǒng juédé tā nányǐ jiējìn，kě hòulái fāxiàn bìng búshì zhèyàng。
When I first met professor Li I thought he was difficult to approach, but later I learned he is friendly.
张教授写了一本书《亚健康初探》，还很畅销。
Zhāng jiàoshòu xiě le yìběn shū《Yàjiànkāngchūtàn》，hái hěnchàngxiāo。
Professor Zhang wrote a book titled &quot;Pilot Study on Sub-health&quot;, which sold well.
同学们都在传写教授的笔记。
Tóngxuémen dōu zài chuánxiě jiàoshòu de bǐjì。
All the classmates are making private copies of the professor\'s notes.
对于王教授的创议我们还要进行研究讨论。
Duìyú Wáng jiàoshòu de chuàngyì wǒmen háiyào jìnxíng yánjiū tǎolùn。
We need to discuss and do some research on Professor Wang\'s proposal.
这位教授是辞源学的专家。
Zhèwèi jiàoshòu shì cíyuánxué de zhuānjiā。
This professor is a specialist in the study of the origin of phraseology.
此人就是我之前提起的李教授。
Cǐrén jiùshì wǒ zhīqián tíqǐ de Lǐ jiàoshòu。
This person is Professor Li, who I have mentioned before.
这位教授是位大儒，弟子遍布全国。
Zhèwèi jiàoshòu shì wèi dàrú，dìzǐ biànbùquánguó。
The professor is a famous scholar with students from all over China.
这栋单元楼里住着五名老教授。
Zhè dòng dānyuánlóu lǐ zhù zhe wǔ míng lǎojiàoshòu。
Five elderly professors live in the apartment building.
王教授被评为工程院院士。
Wáng jiàoshòu bèi píngwéi gōngchéngyuàn yuànshì。
Professor Wang was appointed academician of the Engineering Academy.
你真够面子，连李教授都来为你捧场。
Nǐ zhēn gòu miànzi，lián Lǐ jiàoshòu dōu lái wèi nǐ pěngchǎng。
You receive such an honor, even professor Li has come here for you.
虽身居海外，张教授情系故园。
Suī shēnjū hǎiwài，Zhāng jiàoshòu qíngxì gùyuán。
Though living abroad, Professor Zhang still thinks about his hometown.
从先秦到近代，老教授经史子集靡不贯通，尤以集部为最精。
Cóng xiānqín dào jìndài，lǎojiàoshòu jīngshǐ zǐjí míbú guàntōng，yóu yǐ jíbùwéi zuìjīng。
The elderly professor knows everything from the early Qin Dynasty to recent times, and from Jing, Shi, Zi to Ji, the last of which is his specialty.
他在经学院教授圣经，是个虔诚的基督徒。
Tā zài jīngxuéyuàn jiāoshòu shèngjīng，shì gè qiánchéng de jīdūtú。
He teaches the Bible in theological schools and is a pious Christian.
教授总是一副倨傲的样子，所以我非常不喜欢他。
Jiàoshòu zǒngshì yífù jùào de yàngzi，suǒyǐ wǒ fēicháng bùxǐhuan tā。
The professor is always so arrogant, I don\'t like him very much.
这本《春秋》是由王教授考释的。
Zhèběn《Chūnqiū》 shì yóu Wáng jiàoshòu kǎoshì de。
Professor Wang has made philological studies of the book The Spring and Autumn Annals.
张老师退休后被多所大学聘为客座教授了。
Zhāng lǎoshī tuìxiū hòu bèi duō suǒ dàxué pìnwéi kèzuò jiàoshòu le。
After retirement, Mr. Zhang was employed as a visiting professor by several universities.
这个课题组的组长是张教授。
Zhège kètízǔ de zǔzhǎng shì Zhāng jiàoshòu。
The leader of the research group is Prof. Zhang.
李教授的离世是学校的巨大损失，也是我们学生的巨大损失。
Lǐ jiàoshòu de líshì shì xuéxiào de jùdà sǔnshī，yě shì wǒmen xuésheng de jùdà sǔnshī。
Professor Li\'s passing was a great loss to the school, and students.
你不要用小学生的水平蠡测教授高深的理论，那样是没法理解的。
Nǐ búyào yòng xiǎoxuésheng de shuǐpíng lícè jiāoshòu gāoshēn de lǐlùn，nàyàng shì méifǎ lǐjiě de。
Don\'t try to understand the profound theories of the professor from the perspective of a pupil. In this way, it is impossible to understand.
他是王教授力荐的课题组长，一定非常优秀。
Tā shì Wáng jiàoshòu lìjiàn de kètí zǔzhǎng，yídìng fēicháng yōuxiù。
He was strongly recommended to be the project leader by Professor Wang. He must be very excellent.
感谢李教授今天能够莅会，我们与会的年轻学者定会有所收获。
Gǎnxiè Lǐ jiàoshòu jīntiān nénggòu lìhuì，wǒmen yùhuì de niánqīng xuézhě dìnghuì yǒusuǒ shōuhuò。
Thank you for your participation in the meeting, Professor Li. We young scholars present will surely gain a lot from you.
解放前的西南联大里聚集着一批国内知名的教授学者。
Jiěfàng qián de xīnán liándà lǐ jùjí zhe yì pī guónèi zhīmíng de jiàoshòu xuézhě。
Before liberation at the Southwest United University, there was a famous group of professors and scholars.
我家邻舍住的是一位大学教授。
Wǒjiā línshè zhù de shì yíwèi dàxué jiàoshòu。
Next to my house lives a university professor.
我在这家私塾一共教授八名蒙童。
Wǒ zài zhè jiā sīshú yígòng jiāoshòu bā míng méngtóng。
I teach a total of ten pupils in this private school.
这位教授是美术界的翘楚。
Zhèwèi jiàoshòu shì měishùjiè de qiàochǔ。
The professor is an outstanding member of the arts circles.
余教授是位儒林名士。
Yú jiàoshòu shì wèi rúlín míngshì。
Professor Yu is famous among Confucian scholars.
我们都为教授这个深层的见解所折服。
Wǒmen dōu wéi jiàoshòu zhège shēncéng de jiànjiě suǒ zhéfú。
We were all filled with admiration at the professor\'s deep insight.
张教授是专门研究诗史的学者，对春秋战国时的古体诗颇有研究。
Zhāng jiàoshòu shì zhuānmén yánjiū shīshǐ de xuézhě，duì Chūnqiūzhànguó shí de gǔtǐshī pōyǒu yánjiū。
Professor Zhang is a scholar specializing in the history of poems, especially the archaic poems in the Warring States Period.
我很喜欢看李教授的史论，从中获益匪浅。
Wǒ hěnxǐhuan kàn Lǐ jiàoshòu de shǐlùn，cóng zhōng huòyì fěiqiǎn。
I like Professor Li\'s historical essays and benefit a lot from them.
教授被人当众辱骂，简直是斯文扫地。
Jiàoshòu bèi rén dāngzhòng rǔmà，jiǎnzhí shì sīwén sǎodì。
The professor was abused in public, his scholarly dignity completely disgraced.
教我们《应用几何学》的是学校的外聘教授。
Jiāo wǒmen《Yìngyòngjǐhéxué》 de shì xuéxiào de wàipìn jiàoshòu。
An external professor employed by our school teaches us Applied Geometry.
小李正在做外植试验，教授要求他及时报告试验结果。
Xiǎo Lǐ zhèngzài zuò wàizhí shìyàn，jiàoshòu yāoqiú tā jíshí bàogào shìyàn jiéguǒ。
Xiao Wang is doing an experiment on external planting, and the professor has asked him to report his results promptly.
教授正在为这段难懂的文字添加尾注。
Jiàoshòu zhèngzài wèi zhè duàn nándǒng de wénzì tiānjiā wěizhù。
The professor is adding endnotes to this difficult paragraph.
舞蹈学院的教授一直利用业余时间收集中国古代舞谱。
Wǔdǎo xuéyuàn de jiàoshòu yìzhí lìyòng yèyú shíjiān shōují Zhōngguó gǔdài wǔpǔ。
The professors at the dance college always spend their spare time collecting books on ancient Chinese dance.
李教授的著作具有极强的系统性和逻辑性。
Lǐ jiàoshòu de zhùzuò jùyǒu jíqiáng de xìtǒngxìng hé luójíxìng。
Professor Li\'s works are very systematic, and logical.
教授在古代文学研究方面学有专长，我们很敬佩他。
Jiàoshòu zài gǔdài wénxué yánjiū fāngmiàn xuéyǒu zhuāncháng，wǒmen hěn jìngpèi tā。
The professor is a specialist in the research of ancient literature and we all respect him very much.
张教授一直致力于找寻佚诗的工作。
Zhāng jiàoshòu yìzhí zhìlìyú zhǎoxún yìshī de gōngzuò。
Professor Zhang has devoted himself to collecting poems that have disappeared.
老教授近几年来一直忙于收集轶诗。
Lǎo jiàoshòu jìn jǐnián lái yìzhí mángyú shōují yìshī。
The professor has been busy collecting missing poems these years.
老教授发誓要在一年内找到全部逸文。
Lǎo jiàoshòu fāshì yào zài yìnián nèi zhǎodào quánbùyìwén。
The old professor is determined to collect all the anecdotes in a year.
教授讲得眉飞色舞，学生们却没有太大的反响，只是随声应和。
Jiàoshòu jiǎng de méifēi sèwǔ，xuéshengmen què méiyǒu tài dà de fǎnxiǎng，zhǐshì suíshēng yìnghè。
The professor lectured with a beaming countenance, but the students didn\'t respond much, only agreeing with what he said.
老教授虽然满鬓银发，可眼睛却炯炯有神。
Lǎojiàoshòu suīrán mǎnbìn yínfà，kě yǎnjīng què jiǒngjiǒng yǒushén。
Though the old professor has grey hair at his temples, his eyes are brimming with vigour.
他凭着假教授的身份，到处招摇撞骗。
Tā píng zhe jiǎ jiàoshòu de shēnfèn，dàochù zhāoyáo zhuàngpiàn。
He passed himself off as a professor to go about cheating people.
看着朝气蓬勃的学生们，老教授会心地笑了。
Kàn zhe zhāoqì péngbó de xuéshengmen，lǎojiàoshòu huìxīn de xiào le。
Looking at the spirited students, the old professor shows an understanding smile.
朱教授把诊断书夹到了病历里。
Zhū jiàoshòu bǎ zhěnduànshū jiādào le bìnglì lǐ。
Professor Zhu put the medical certificate into the medical record.
他是我们学校的教授，知识面很广。
Tā shì wǒmen xuéxiào de jiàoshòu，zhīshimiàn hěn guǎng。
He is a professor at our school, who has a wide range of knowledge.
教授讲话时，总是掷地有声。
Jiàoshòu jiǎnghuà shí，zǒngshì zhìdì yǒushēng。
While talking, the professor sounds very sonorous, and forcful.
他在民族大学里教授《周易》这门课。
Tā zài mínzú dàxué lǐ jiàoshòu《Zhōuyì》zhè mén kè。
He teaches the Book of Changes at the University for Nationalities.
教授在做这个实验的时候，得到了助研的帮助。
Jiàoshòu zài zuò zhège shíyàn de shíhou，dédào le zhùyán de bāngzhù。
The professor was helped by his assistant in carrying out the experiment.
许多知名的教授对这个怪现象都著有专论。
Xǔduō zhīmíng de jiàoshòu duì zhège guàixiàn xiàng dōu zhùyǒu zhuānlùn。
Many famous professors have written special discussions on this abnormal phenomenon.
看了易中天教授纵说三国风云后，我对三国的认识又更深一步了。
Kàn le Yì Zhōngtiān jiàoshòu zòngshuō Sānguó fēngyún hòu，wǒ duì Sānguó de rènshi yòu gèngshēn yíbù le。
After hearing professor Yizhongtian talk about the Three Kingdoms, I have a better understanding of it.
药店为了提高知名度，请来了大名鼎鼎的中医教授坐堂。
Yàodiàn wèi le tígāo zhīmíngdù，qǐnglái le dàmíngdǐngdǐng de zhōng yī jiàoshòu zuòtáng。
In order to enhance its popularity, the drugstore invited a famous professor of Chinese medicine to practice medicine there.
中文系教授正准备建一个中文语料库。
Zhōngwénxì jiàoshòu zhèng zhǔnbèi jiàn yígè zhōng wén yǔliàokù。
The Chinese professor is preparing to set up a Chinese database.
这位是我院的中医学教授。
Zhèwèi shì wǒyuàn de zhōng yīxué jiàoshòu。
This is a professor of traditional Chinese pharmacology at our hospital.
张教授撰写的文艺批评在文艺界具有较大的影响力。
Zhāng Jiàoshòu zhuànxiě de wényìpīpíng zài wényìjiè jùyǒu jiàodà de yǐngxiǎnglì。

我自制的面包很快就坏掉了。
这些条件白纸黑字，一清二楚，想抵赖是抵赖不掉的。
Zhèxiē tiáojiàn báizhǐhēizì，yìqīng\'èrchǔ，xiǎng dǐlài shì dǐlài bú diào de。
These terms are clearly written in black and white. You can never deny them.
这朵花儿掉了一个瓣儿。
Zhè duǒ huār diào le yígè bànr。
This flower has lost one petal.
他们祖上传下来的产业早就变卖掉了。

They sold their ancestral estate long ago.

diàozài dìxia
fall on the ground

diàoxià jǐ dī yǎnlèi

Wǒ xiùzi shàng de mòshuǐ bānhén xǐ búdiào le。
The ink mark on my sleeve cannot be washed off.
这本书是残次品，本纪第二已经被人撕掉了。

This book is incomplete, and the secondary one with its second primary chronicle ripped off by someone.
离情惨切，他禁不住掉下泪来。

He couldn\'t help shedding tears at the sad parting scene.
她已经辞掉了工作，一心在家操理家务。
Tā yǐjing cídiào le gōngzuò，yìxīn zài jiā cāolǐ jiāwù。
She quit her job, and now wholeheartedly does housework at home.
将第一杯茶水倒掉，这是我们这里的茶俗。
Jiāng dìyī bēi cháshuǐ dǎodiào，zhè shì wǒmen zhèlǐ de chású。
It is our custom to pour away the first cup of tea.
去掉零头只保留成数就行了。
Qùdiào língtóu zhǐ bǎoliú chéngshù jiùxíng le。
Keep the round number, and take out the remainder.
你如果不改掉这些毛病，早晚是要吃苦头的。
Nǐ rúguǒ bùgǎidiào zhèxiē máobìng，zǎowǎn shì yào chī kǔtóu de。
If you don\'t kick these bad habits, you will pay for them some day.
苹果上有一个虫眼，要把它挖掉再吃。
Píngguǒ shàng yǒu yígè chóngyǎn，yào bǎ tā wādiào zài chī。
There is a hole in the apple, cut it out before you eat it.
你必须除掉心头的仇恨，原谅别人就是原谅自己。
Nǐ bìxū chúdiào xīntóu de chóuhèn，yuánliàng biérén jiùshì yuánliàng zìjǐ。
You must release the hatred in your heart. To forgive others is to forgive yourself.
你应当去掉“穿靴戴帽”的东西，尽量做到语言简洁。
Nǐ yīngdāng qùdiào“chuānxuē dàimào”de dōngxi，jìnliàng zuòdào yǔyán jiǎnjié。
You should get rid of the clichés and try to make it pithy.
他为了抵还贷款，只能把房子卖掉了。
Tā wèi le dǐhuán dàikuǎn，zhǐnéng bǎ fángzi màidiào le。
In order to pay back the loan, he had no choice but to sell the house.
天气转冷，不少绵羊都掉膘了。
Tiānqì zhuǎnlěng，bùshǎo miányáng dōu diàobiāo le。
It is becoming cold. Many sheep are losing weight.
晾晒之后，这些粮食都掉秤了。
Liàngshài zhīhòu，zhèxiē liángshí dōu diàochèng le。
The rice has become lighter after drying in the sun.
要掉点儿了，赶紧把晾晒的衣服收回来。
Yào diào diǎnr le，gǎnjǐn bǎ liàngshài de yīfu shōuhuílái。
It is starting to rain. Bring back those drying clothes.
他打算把书桌和沙发掉过儿。
Tā dǎsuàn bǎ shūzhuō hé shāfā diàoguòr。
He intends to switch the places of the desk and sofa.
车祸就发生在眼前，我吓得都快掉魂儿了。
Chēhuò jiù fāshēng zài yǎnqián，wǒ xià de dōu kuài diàohúnr le。
The car accident happened right in front of my eyes. I was scared out of my wits.
他这个人掉文也不看场合。
Tā zhège rén diàowén yě búkàn chǎnghé。
He is a person who shows off his talents in inappropriate occasions.
他不改掉这种骄傲的态度，早晚要跌跤。
Tā bùgǎidiào zhèzhǒng jiāo\'ào de tàidu，zǎowǎn yào diējiāo。
He will fail in something sooner or later if he doesn\'t lose his pride.
这个赌鬼把自己的财产输掉了一大半。
Zhège dǔguǐ bǎ zìjǐ de cáichǎn shūdiào le yídàbàn。
The addicted gambler lost more than half of his wealth to gambling.
我睹物伤情，不觉掉下泪来。
Wǒ dǔwù shāngqíng，bùjué diào xià lèi lái。
The sight in front of me brought back sad memories and before long, tears came out of my eyes.
妈妈一直教育小明，吃饭不要掉饭粒。

破旧俗，立新风
pò jiùsú, lì xīnfēnɡ
do away with old customs and introduce new ones
破旧立新
破旧立新，兴利除弊。
旧习不破，新风难立。

破旧俗，立新风
pò jiùsú, lì xīnfēnɡ
do away with old customs and introduce new ones

tūpò jiù kuángkuang de xiànzhì
throw convention to the winds

shake off the bonds of old ideas
破旧的家具
pòjiù de jiājù
old, disreputable furniture

破除旧的传统观念

break away from outdated traditional modes of thought

Zài huáijiù de hángyè zhōng，jīngcháng shǐyòng lǎoshì gōnggòngqìchē。
在怀旧的行业中，经常使用老式公共汽车。
Only by rejecting obsolete administrative ideas can we make progress in business.
只有丢弃陈旧的管理观念，我们才能取得新的业务进展。
不少外国人对中国的旧学很感兴趣。
Bùshǎo wàiguórén duì Zhōngguó de jiùxué hěn gǎnxìngqù。
Many foreigners are interested in traditional Chinese culture.
这个老学究只会拘执旧理，一点也不变通。
Zhège lǎoxuéjiū zhǐhuì jūzhí jiùlǐ，yìdiǎn yě bú biàntōng。
This old pedant is so rigid that he refuses to change his ideas.
There is a serious problem of ineffective education in inner city schools due to fearful and unenthusiastic teachers and poorly motivated students.
旧城区的学校教育质量低劣、问题严重，主要是因为教师忧虑忡忡、热情不高，学生积极性也不够高。
铲除封建旧习俗
chǎnchú fēngjiàn jiù xísú 
eradicate old feudal customs
涤除旧习
díchú jiùxí 
do away with old customs
废弃陈规旧习
fèiqì chénguī jiùxí
discard outdated regulations and customs
旧习难改。
Jiùxí nán gǎi。
It\'s difficult to change old habits and customs.
因循旧习
yīnxún jiùxí 
follow the old customs
涤除旧习
改掉旧习
旧习不破，新风难立。
Regional stereotypes have been part of America since its founding.
Zì jiànguó qǐ，dìqūxìng de chénguī jiùxí jiù chéngwéi měiguó de yí bùfēn。
自建国起，地区性的陈规旧习就成为美国的一部分。
They perpetuated the old traditions in new ways.
Tāmen yǐ xīn de fāngshì qù yánxí jiù de xísú。
他们以新的方式去沿袭旧的习俗。
Despite the advent of new information technologies, old political habits are difficult to discard.
Suīrán yǒule xīn de xìnxī jìshù de chūxiàn，dàn jiù de zhèngzhì xíguàn réngrán hěnnán gǎi diào。
虽然有了新的信息技术的出现，但旧的政治习惯仍然很难改掉。
No one believes that there will be any switch away from old voting habits.
Méi rén xiāngxìn jiù de tóupiào xíguàn huì fāshēng gǎibiàn。
没人相信旧的投票习惯会发生改变。
老祖宗留下的旧物我们应当批判地继承。
Lǎozǔzōng liúxià de jiùwù wǒmen yīngdāng pīpàn de jìchéng。
In regard to our ancestors\' old systems, we must inherit critically.
腐败的晚清政府没有能力光复旧物。
Fǔbài de wǎnqīng zhèngfǔ méiyǒu nénglì guāngfù jiùwù。
The corrupt late Qing government was not able to recover lost territories.
这件旧物是他祖爷爷留下来的。
Zhèjiàn jiùwù shì tā zǔyéye liúxiàlái de。
This antique belonged to his great grandfather.
很多废旧物品经过处理可以再利用。
Hěnduō fèijiù wùpǐn jīngguò chǔlǐ kěyǐ zài lìyòng。
Many old and useless stuff can be reused after being processed.
我们要提倡对废旧物品综合利用的做法。
Wǒmen yào tíchàng duì fèijiù wùpǐn zōnghé lìyòng de zuòfǎ。
We should promote the comprehensive utilization of waste materials.
新旧事物的代谢
xīnjiù shìwù de dàixiè 
the supersession of the old by the new
这把石斧是旧石器时代的遗物。
Zhèbǎ shífǔ shì jiùshíqì shídài de yíwù。
This stone axe is a relic of the Old Stone Age.
翻检家里杂物时，偶然找到一张旧照片。
Fānjiǎn jiālǐ záwù shí，ǒurán zhǎo dào yìzhāng jiù zhàopiàn。
I found an old photo when I was looking through my stuff at home.
收购废旧物品。
承袭旧物。
光复旧物。
这对雕花瓷瓶是我家旧物。
光复旧物
废旧物品也可以卖钱嘛！
随着社会的发展，旧事物不断推演出新事物。
风物依旧。
不能用旧眼光看新事物。
Can I keep my old stuffed animals?
Wǒ néng liúxià wǒ zhèxiē jiùshí de tiánchōng dòngwù wánjù ma？
我能留下我这些旧时的填充动物玩具吗？
They have shopping carts full of things: old magazines and books, used clothing, second-hand shoes.
Tāmen de gòuwù chē zhuāng mǎn le dōngxi：jiù zázhì shūjí、chuānguò de yīfu hé èrshǒu xiézǐ。
他们的购物车装满了东西：旧杂志书籍、穿过的衣服和二手鞋子。
The collection seems to have been made up of cuttings from old newspapers, magazines and annuals.
Shōují wù hǎoxiàng shì yóu nàxiē cóng jiù bàozhǐ、jiù zázhì hé jiù niánkān jiǎn xiàlái de nèiróng zǔchéng de。
收集物好像是由那些从旧报纸、旧杂志和旧年刊剪下来的内容组成的。
这本书收录了不少民国年间的旧闻。
Zhèběnshū shōulù le bùshǎo mínguó niánjiān de jiùwén。
This book includes a lot of anecdotes from the age of the Republic of China.
但见新人笑，不闻旧人哭。
Dàn jiàn xīnrén xiào，bùwén jiùrén kū。
All he can see is the smile of the new love, while the old love weeps unheard.
补缀旧闻。
五四以来，从事旧体诗创作的文人越来越少。
Wǔsì yǐlái，cóngshì jiùtǐshī chuàngzuò de wénrén yuèláiyuè shǎo。
Since the May Fourth Movement, fewer and fewer people create traditional poems.
旧体诗。
新旧体制的交替
xīn jiù tǐzhì de jiāotì 
in the transition from the old structure to the new
五四以来，从事旧体诗创作的文人越来越少。
Wǔsì yǐlái，cóngshì jiùtǐshī chuàngzuò de wénrén yuèláiyuè shǎo。
Since the May Fourth Movement, fewer and fewer people create traditional poems.
国企改革不成功和它本身旧的体制有很大关系。
Guóqǐ gǎigé bù chénggōng hé tā běnshēn jiù de tǐzhì yǒu hěn dà guānxi。
陈旧的经济体制必须进行改革，这是市场经济发展的必然结果。
Chénjiù de jīngjì tǐzhì bìxū jìnxíng gǎigé，zhèshì shìchǎng jīngjì fāzhǎn de bìrán jiéguǒ。
The old economic system must be reformed, an inevitable result of the development of the market economy.
修订版体例仍旧。
Xiūdìngbǎn tǐlì réngjiù。
The style will still be the same for the revised edition.
在此辞旧迎新的时候，我们恭祝新老顾客身体健康，财源广进。
Zài cǐ cíjiù yíngxīn de shíhou，wǒmen gōngzhù xīnlǎo gùkè shēntǐjiànkāng，cáiyuán guǎngjìn。
During this time of ringing out the old year and ringing in the new, we wish both our new customers and old customers good health and abundant wealth.
旧体诗。
旧船体经除锈喷漆后，已焕然一新。
The Welsh music scene as a whole was feeling a bit stale.
Zhège wēi\'ěrshì yīnyuè chǎngjǐng zǒngtǐ gǎnjué yǒudiǎn chénjiù le。
这个威尔士音乐场景总体感觉有点陈旧了。
我们对待在工作中犯过错误的人采取规劝态度，使之翻然改进，弃旧图新。
Wǒmen duìdài zài gōngzuò zhōng fànguò cuòwù de rén cǎiqǔ guīquàn tàidu，shǐ zhī fānrán gǎijìn，qìjiùtúxīn。
Our attitude towards any person who has made mistakes in his work should be one of persuasion in order to help him change and start afresh.
收买旧书
shōumǎi jiùshū
buy used books
我把旧书全卖了，一直感到惋惜。
Wǒ bǎ jiùshū quán mài le，yìzhí gǎndào wǎnxī。
I\'ve always regretted selling all my old books.
他在旧书市偶然淘到一部卷轴装的《唐诗选》。
Tā zài jiù shūshì ǒurán táodào yíbù juǎnzhóuzhuāng de《Tángshīxuǎn》。
He found by accident a scroll of A Collection of the Poetry of the Tang Dynasty in a secondhand book market.
他拿出旧日朋友的书信，重新展阅。
Tā náchū jiùrì péngyou de shūxìn，chóngxīn zhǎnyuè。
He took out letters from his old friends and read them again.
他把看过的旧报纸都叠放在书柜里。
Tā bǎ kàn guò de jiù bàozhǐ dōu diéfàng zài shūguì lǐ。
He folded all the old newspapers and put them in the book cabinet.
书房的陈设依旧未变。
Shūfáng de chénshè yījiù wèi biàn。

The tattered old book is valuable and we need to rebind it.

Genesis is the first book of the Torah which consists of the first five books of the Bible.
创世纪是律法书的第一卷书,律法书包括旧约圣经的前五卷书。
Book of Wisdom, or simply Wisdom, is one of the seven sapiential or wisdom books of the Septuagint Old Testament.
《Suǒluómén Zhìhuì》，huò jiǎnchēng《Zhìhuì》，shì《Jiùyuē Shèngjīng》 de qīdà zhìhuì shū zhīyī。
《所罗门智慧》，或简称《智慧》，是《旧约圣经》的七大智慧书之一。
The book is a mirror of his life even though it is not a biography.
这本书虽然不是传记，但仍旧是他生活的写照。
旧式文人
jiùshì wénrén
old-type scholars
旧式婚姻
jiùshì hūnyīn
old-style marriage
垂花门在旧式宅院中是很常见的。
Chuíhuāmén zài jiùshì zháiyuàn zhōng shì hěn chángjiàn de。
Festooned doors are commonly seen in old style courtyards.
在农村桔槔是常用的旧式提水器具。
Zài nóngcūn júgāo shì chángyòng de jiùshì tíshuǐ qìjù。
A well-sweep is an old instrument used for carrying water commonly used in villages.
旧式文人的身上难免有些穷酸气。
Jiùshì wénrén de shēnshàng nánmiǎn yǒuxiē qióngsuānqì。
Old-type intellectuals are inevitably a little poor and pedantic.
现在的军事武器不知要比旧式抬枪的威力大多少倍。

Guǎnlǐ fāngshì chénjiù dānyī。
The methods of management are outdated and simplistic.
那种手机样式太旧，估计你相不上。
Nàzhǒng shǒujī yàngshì tài jiù，gūjì nǐ xiāng bú shàng。
That style of mobile phone is very old. I reckon you won\'t like it.
家里那盏老式玻璃风灯，如今成了怀旧的装饰品。
Jiā lǐ nà zhǎn lǎoshì bōli fēngdēng，rújīn chéng le huáijiù de zhuāngshìpǐn。

Management has realised that workers are still not ready to accept Japanese-style working methods.

旧事重提
jiùshì chóngtí 
bring up an old case; recall past events
新旧事物的代谢
xīnjiù shìwù de dàixiè 
the supersession of the old by the new
多年前的旧事又重现在他的脑海里。
Duō nián qián de jiùshì yòu chóngxiàn zài tā de nǎohǎi lǐ。
Memories of things long past flashed across his mind.
那些垂髫旧事，真让人怀念。
Nàxiē chuítiáo jiùshì，zhēn ràng rén huáiniàn。
I greatly cherish the old stories of my childhood.
关于前朝的旧事，我们就不要再提了。
Guānyú qiáncháo de jiùshì，wǒmen jiù búyào zài tí le。
Let\'s forget about these past events of the preceding dynasty.
五四以来，从事旧体诗创作的文人越来越少。
Wǔsì yǐlái，cóngshì jiùtǐshī chuàngzuò de wénrén yuèláiyuè shǎo。
Since the May Fourth Movement, fewer and fewer people create traditional poems.
旧时办丧事是讲究哭丧的，只有哭得伤心，才能显示出对去世者的怀念和尊敬！
Jiùshí bàn sàngshì shì jiǎngjiū kūsàng de，zhǐyǒu kū de shāngxīn，cáinéng xiǎnshìchū duì qùshìzhě de huáiniàn hé zūnjìng！
In ancient times, wailing was very important at a funeral. Only grief and wailing showed yearning and respect for the dead.
当我又翻弄那些旧照片时，往事又涌上心头。
Dāng wǒ yòu fānnòng nàxiē jiù zhàopiàn shí，wǎngshì yòu yǒngshàng xīntóu。
When I look through my old photos, I am lost in memory.
他总想他年轻时候的事，真是旧梦难忘。
Tā zǒng xiǎng tā niánqīng shíhou de shì，zhēnshì jiùmèng nánwàng。
He is obessed with things that happened when he was young,and can\'t forget his old dreams.
咱们就说今天的事，别总是翻旧账。
Zánmen jiù shuō jīntiān de shì，bié zǒngshì fānjiùzhàng。
Don\'t keep picking over our old quarrels; let\'s stick to today\'s business.
他顾念旧情，没有追究这件事情。
Tā gùniàn jiùqíng，méiyǒu zhuījiū zhèjiàn shìqing。
Thinking about old friendships, he didn\'t investigate this matter.
现在的军事武器不知要比旧式抬枪的威力大多少倍。
Xiànzài de jūnshì wǔqì bùzhī yào bǐ jiùshì táiqiāng de wēilì dà duōshǎo bèi。
Military weapons today are far more powerful than the jingalls of old times.
老夫妻俩回忆起甜蜜的往事，一边赏月一边叙旧。
Lǎofūqī liǎ huíyìqǐ tiánmì de wǎngshì，yìbiān shǎngyuè yìbiān xùjiù。
While appreciating the moon, the couple recounted their happy stories.
对于顽固的守旧派，我们不能只用言语说服他们，更要以事实证明给他们看。
Duìyú wángù de shǒujiùpài，wǒmen bùnéng zhǐ yòng yányǔ shuìfú tāmen，gèng yào yǐ shìshí zhèngmíng gěi tāmen kàn。
As for those obstinate conservatives, we should not only persuade them with words, but also prove their mistakes with facts.

事实上，他们依旧保持联系，很快将要一起度假。
Ticking together old fabrics was an easy task.

把旧的纺织品缝到一起是件容易事。
Adapting current software to older computers is inefficient and time consuming.
Ràng dāngqián de ruǎnjiàn shìyìng jiù diànnǎo shì jiàn xiàolǜ dīxià qiě fēicháng hàoshí de shìqing。
让当前的软件适应旧电脑是件效率低下且非常耗时的事情。
改良派意识到了旧中国的种种弊端。
Gǎiliángpài yìshí dào le jiù Zhōngguó de zhǒng zhǒng bìduān。
The reformists came to realize the disadvantages of the old China.
《儒林外史》里的那些旧知识分子大多带有穷酸气。
Now I had a companion to share everything with, someone I knew of old and with whom there were no constraints.
Xiànzài，wǒ yǒule yí gè kěyǐ fēnxiǎng yíqiè de huǒbàn：tā shì wǒ de jiù xiāngshí，érqiě wǒmen zhī jiān yě méiyǒu jìnjì。
现在，我有了一个可以分享一切的伙伴：他是我的旧相识，而且我们之间也没有禁忌。
I called my friend Joseph using my old SIM card in my new mobile.
我把旧的用户识别卡装进新手机里，然后给我的朋友约瑟夫打了个电话。
Management has realised that workers are still not ready to accept Japanese-style working methods.
Guǎnlǐcéng yǐjīng rènshídào，yuángōng yījiù méiyǒu zhǔnbèi hǎo jiēshòu Rìběn shì de gōngzuò fāngfǎ。
管理层已经认识到，员工依旧没有准备好接受日本式的工作方法。

旧石器时代晚期。
旧时代
jiù shídài
former times
这把石斧是旧石器时代的遗物。
Zhèbǎ shífǔ shì jiùshíqì shídài de yíwù。
This stone axe is a relic of the Old Stone Age.
这些旧章跟不上时代了，应当废除。
Zhèxiē jiùzhāng gēnbúshàng shídài le，yīngdāng fèichú。
These old systems are outdated and should be abolished.
时代变了，这些旧例不再具有适用性。
Shídài biàn le，zhèxiē jiùlì búzài jùyǒu shìyòngxìng。
Time changes and these old regulations are no longer applicable.
你这旧脑筋已经跟不上时代了。
Nǐ zhè jiùnǎojīn yǐjing gēnbúshàng shídài le。
You are far behind the times.
因循守旧的人必然适应不了时代的发展。
Yīnxún shǒujiù de rén bìrán shìyīng bùliǎo shídài de fāzhǎn。
People who get stuck in a groove aren\'t able to adapt themselves to the times.
旧石器时代晚期。
旧时代
jiù shídài
former times
这个词是旧时下对上的称呼。
Zhège cí shìjiù shí xià duì shàng de chēnghū。
This word was used in the old days to address one\'s superiors.
旧时人们在提到自己的字的时候，往往用“草字”两个字表示谦虚。
Jiùshí rénmen zài tídào zìjǐ de zì de shíhou，wǎngwǎng yòng“cǎozì”liǎng gè zì biǎoshì qiānxū。
In ancient times, people often used &quot;Cao Zi&quot;to show their humility when mentioning their names.
他在文章中针砭旧时沉痼，得到了很多人的共鸣。
Tā zài wénzhāng zhōng zhēnbiān jiùshí chéngù，dédào le hěnduōrén de gòngmíng。
His article aroused strong support regarding social chronic problems.
旧时的破落文人大都一幅寒酸相。
Jiùshí de pòluò wénrén dàdōu yìfú hánsuān xiàng。
Scholars in decline in the past looked miserable, and shabby.
旧时办丧事是讲究哭丧的，只有哭得伤心，才能显示出对去世者的怀念和尊敬！
Jiùshí bàn sàngshì shì jiǎngjiū kūsàng de，zhǐyǒu kū de shāngxīn，cáinéng xiǎnshìchū duì qùshìzhě de huáiniàn hé zūnjìng！
In ancient times, wailing was very important at a funeral. Only grief and wailing showed yearning and respect for the dead.
现在的家庭服务员可不是旧时的女仆了。
Xiànzài de jiātíng fúwùyuán kě búshì jiùshí de nǚpú le。
Household maids nowadays are not the servants of ancient times.
旧时统治者把普通百姓视为群氓。
Jiùshí tǒngzhìzhě bǎ pǔtōng bǎixìng shìwéi qúnmáng。
The rulers regarded general civilians as the common herd in ancient times.
十不闲儿莲花落是旧时曲艺的一种，一般在相声之前演唱以招揽生意。
Shíbùxiánr liánhuāluò shì jiùshí qǔyì de yìzhǒng，yìbān zài xiàng shēng zhīqián yǎnchàng yǐ zhāolǎn shēngyì。
&quot;Shibuxianlianhualuo&quot; (a singing form accompanied by music on ten percussion instruments) is an old folk art form, which is generally performed before a comic dialogue to attract attention.
旧时农户每年都要交纳繁重的田赋。
Jiùshí nónghù měinián dōuyào jiāonà fánzhòng de tiánfù。
In the past, all the peasant households had to hand in a lot of land tax every year.
旧时的鸦片馆里，他们用烟灯吸食鸦片。
Jiùshí de yāpiànguǎn lǐ，tāmen yòng yāndēng xīshí yāpiàn。
In old opium dens, people used a smoke lamp to take in the opium.
旧时得瘟疫病逝的人都会被葬在义地。
Jiùshí dé wēnyì bìngshì de rén dōuhuì bèi zàngzài yìdì。
In ancient times, people who died of pestilence would be buried in free burial ground for the destitute.
这把石斧是旧石器时代的遗物。
Zhèbǎ shífǔ shì jiùshíqì shídài de yíwù。
This stone axe is a relic of the Old Stone Age.
当我又翻弄那些旧照片时，往事又涌上心头。
Dāng wǒ yòu fānnòng nàxiē jiù zhàopiàn shí，wǎngshì yòu yǒngshàng xīntóu。
When I look through my old photos, I am lost in memory.
在此辞旧迎新的时候，我们恭祝新老顾客身体健康，财源广进。
Zài cǐ cíjiù yíngxīn de shíhou，wǒmen gōngzhù xīnlǎo gùkè shēntǐjiànkāng，cáiyuán guǎngjìn。
During this time of ringing out the old year and ringing in the new, we wish both our new customers and old customers good health and abundant wealth.
中国人常在新旧年交替时吃饺子。
Zhōngguórén cháng zài xīnjiù nián jiāotì shí chī jiǎozǐ.
Chinese people often eat dumplings to see in the New Year.
这些旧章跟不上时代了，应当废除。
Zhèxiē jiùzhāng gēnbúshàng shídài le，yīngdāng fèichú。
These old systems are outdated and should be abolished.
房子已经破旧不堪，好像随时都会倾塌。
Fángzi yǐjing pòjiù bùkān，hǎo xiàng suíshí dōuhuì qīngtā。
The house is in a dilapidated condition and seems as if it will collapse at any moment.
儿子结婚时，这些老亲旧邻都来贺喜，大家都很高兴。
Érzi jiéhūn shí，zhèxiē lǎoqīn jiùlín dōu lái hèxǐ，dàjiā dōu hěngāoxìng。
When my son got married, old relatives and neighbours all came to congratulate us and we all had a very good time.
时代变了，这些旧例不再具有适用性。
Shídài biàn le，zhèxiē jiùlì búzài jùyǒu shìyòngxìng。
Time changes and these old regulations are no longer applicable.
他总想他年轻时候的事，真是旧梦难忘。
Tā zǒng xiǎng tā niánqīng shíhou de shì，zhēnshì jiùmèng nánwàng。
He is obessed with things that happened when he was young,and can\'t forget his old dreams.
你这旧脑筋已经跟不上时代了。
Nǐ zhè jiùnǎojīn yǐjing gēnbúshàng shídài le。
You are far behind the times.
旧社会，村里的恶霸不时地掀起恶浪。
Jiù shèhuì，cūn lǐ de èbà bùshí de xiān qǐ èlàng。
Before the new China was founded, the evil men in the village made the lives of the locals insufferable.
翻检家里杂物时，偶然找到一张旧照片。
Fānjiǎn jiālǐ záwù shí，ǒurán zhǎo dào yìzhāng jiù zhàopiàn。
I found an old photo when I was looking through my stuff at home.
因循守旧的人必然适应不了时代的发展。
Yīnxún shǒujiù de rén bìrán shìyīng bùliǎo shídài de fāzhǎn。
People who get stuck in a groove aren\'t able to adapt themselves to the times.
这张小影是什么时候拍的？看上去已经很旧了。
Zhèzhāng xiǎoyǐng shì shénme shíhou pāi de？Kànshàngqù yǐjing hěn jiù le。
When was the film made? It looks quite old.

太夫人(旧时对别人母亲的尊称)。
泰西(旧时指西洋)。
旧时在川江上运货的船分好几个船帮

Wǒ néng liúxià wǒ zhèxiē jiùshí de tiánchōng dòngwù wánjù ma？
我能留下我这些旧时的填充动物玩具吗？
The play is very stale and weak dramatic art.
Zhè bù xì fēicháng chénjiù guòshí érqiě nányǐ yǐnrénrùshèng。
这部戏非常陈旧过时而且难以引人入胜。
I still nurse anger and resentment from my childhood.
Wǒ Xīnzhōng yījiù huáiyǒu tóngnián shí jiù yǒude nùqì hé yuànhèn。
我心中依旧怀有童年时就有的怒气和怨恨。
She may be amused to know that I still have two left feet!

当得知我依旧笨手笨脚时，她没准儿觉得好笑。

Movie 6 Channel is a treasure trove of classic and high quality international movies.

Thinking about old friendships, he didn\'t investigate this matter.

Jiùshí nónghù měinián dōuyào jiāonà fánzhòng de tiánfù。
In the past, all the peasant households had to hand in a lot of land tax every year.

It\'s been ten years, and he\'s still all alone.
每到春节，我的那位旧知总要来给我拜年。

My old friend always pays me a visit during Spring Festival.
旧社会，老百姓只有过年才能打牙祭。

Before 1949, ordinary people in China were only able to afford one sumptuous meal a day on spring festival.

年轻人不应该拘于旧说，要勇于创新。
Niánqīngrén bùyīnggāi jūyú jiùshuō，yào yǒngyú chuàngxīn。
Young people should not stick to old ideas and must have the courage to innovate.
这手机用了好几年了，除了壳子有点旧之外，其他都好。
Zhè shǒujī yòng le hǎo jǐn ián le，chú le kézi yǒu diǎn jiù zhīwài，qítā dōu hǎo。
This cell phone has been used for many years, but everything functions well, except that its case is a little old.
他年纪虽大，但却没什么腐旧思想。

He is old but his thoughts are not worn out.

旧例
jiùlì 
an old rule
时代变了，这些旧例不再具有适用性。

Time changes and these old regulations are no longer applicable.
修订版体例仍旧。

The style will still be the same for the revised edition.

xīn jiù tǐzhì de jiāotì 
in the transition from the old structure to the new

old, disreputable furniture

这东西旧是旧，可还能用。
Zhè dōngxi jiùshì jiù，kě hái néng yòng。
Yes, it\'s old, but it can still be used.
俗话说，旧皇历翻不得，你不要再翻旧帐了。
Súhuà shuō，jiùhuánglì fānbùdé，nǐ búyào zài fān jiùzhàng le。
It is said that one can not live according to the old almanac, so forget old debts.
爷爷是走过新旧社会两重天的人，对旧社会的批判最有发言权。
Yéye shì zǒuguò xīnjiù shèhuì liǎngchóngtiān de rén，duì jiùshèhuì de pīpàn zuì yǒu fāyánquán。
My grandpa has lived through the old, and new societies. He is the most suitable person to have the say of the old society.
我们要秉着修旧如旧的原则来修补古籍善本。
Wǒmen yào bǐng zhe xiūjiù rújiù de yuánzé lái xiūbǔ gǔjí shànběn。
We need to repair rare ancient books in accordance with the principle of &quot;mend so as to be the same as before&quot;.
扒了旧房盖新房
bā le jiùfáng gài xīnfáng 
pull down the old house to build a new one in its place
这架机器太旧，快报废了。
Zhè jià jīqì tài jiù，kuài bàofèi le。
This machine is so old it will soon have to be scrapped.
比着旧衣裁新衣
bǐzhe jiùyī cái xīnyī
pattern a new garment on an old one

bìnqì chénjiù de dàodé guānniàn 
cast away antiquated moral values
把旧毛衣拆了重新织一下
bǎ jiù máoyī chāi le chóngxīn zhīyíxià

chǎnchú fēngjiàn jiù xísú

陈旧的观点
chénjiù de guāndiǎn 
an outmoded notion
陈旧的设备
chénjiù de shèbèi

陈旧的词语
chénjiù de cíyǔ

chéngxí jiùzhì

jiùyǒu chóngféng

jiùshì chóngtí

衣服穿旧了。
Yīfu chuān jiù le。
The clothes show signs of wear.
新旧事物的代谢
xīnjiù shìwù de dàixiè 
the supersession of the old by the new
管理方式陈旧单一。
Guǎnlǐ fāngshì chénjiù dānyī。
The methods of management are outdated and simplistic.
他倒腾旧家具。
Tā dǎoteng jiù jiājù。

díchú jiùxí 
do away with old customs

xīn yǔ jiù de dòuzhēng

Jiù dàyī kěyǐ fānxīn。

Tā qì jiā chūzǒu，shì duì jiùshèhuì hūnyīn yāpò de fǎndòng。
He finally left home in an effort to counter the tyranny of arranged marriage in the old society.
废弃陈规旧习
fèiqì chénguī jiùxí
discard outdated regulations and customs
废弃多年的旧机器零件
fèiqì duōnián de jiùjīqì língjiàn

旧病复发
jiùbìng fùfā

gǔ jiù cíyǔ

pòchú jiù de chuántǒngguānniàn
break away from outdated traditional modes of thought
旧社会的痕迹
jiù shèhuì de hénjì
vestiges of the old sociey
旧报纸上满是黄斑。
Jiù bàozhǐ shàngmǎn shì huángbān。
The old newspaper was full of fox marks.
旧唐山在1976年的一场地震中毁灭。
Jiù Tángshān zài yījiǔqīliùnián de yìcháng dìzhèn zhōng huǐmiè。
The old city of Tangshan was destroyed in an earthquake in 1976.
旧社会哪有咱穷人的活路。
Jiù shèhuì nǎ yǒu zán qióngrén de huólù。
What way out was there for us poor folk in the old society?
他们讥笑她穿得破旧。
Tāmen jīxiào tā chuān de pòjiù。

mǎi jiù de

Nǐ de xié jiù le，mǎi yì shuāngxīn de ba。
Your shoes are worn. Buy a new pair.
积年旧案都已经清理完毕。
Jīnián jiù\'àn dōu yǐjing qīnglǐ wánbì。

他发过誓不再偷了，可不久又旧病复发，走上了犯罪道路。
Tā fāguo shì bú zài tōu le，kě bùjiǔ yòu jiùbìngfùfā，zǒushàng le fànzuì dàolù。
He swore that he would never steal again, but soon relapsed into a life of crime.
北京许多古建筑已经修缮一新，恢复了旧观。

我买的是旧货。

jiùyè dàngránwúcún

ɡài yī jiùzhì

kòngsù jiùshèhuì de zuì\'è

wéi jiù sīxiǎng suǒ láolóng

jiù nǎojīn

破旧的家具
pòjiù de jiājù

Zhège dà gōngchǎngshì kào yìtái jiù jīchuángqǐ de jiā。
The big factory has built itself up by starting with an old machine tool.
我们对待在工作中犯过错误的人采取规劝态度，使之翻然改进，弃旧图新。
Wǒmen duìdài zài gōngzuò zhōng fànguò cuòwù de rén cǎiqǔ guīquàn tàidu，shǐ zhī fānrán gǎijìn，qìjiùtúxīn。

qīnpénggùjiù

他虽然遇到许多挫折，可是意志仍旧那样坚强。

His determination remains as strong as ever despite all the setbacks he has encountered.

Tā réngjiùshì shí nián qián de lǎoyàngzi。

The house looks just like new after being painted.
他今天穿了一件半新不旧的上衣。
Tā jīntiān chuān le yíjiàn bànxīn bújiù de shàngyī。

新制度一旦产生，便会推动旧制度的崩解。

旧社会，戏曲艺人被贬称为戏子。
