In the old days, opera artists were looked down as opera jesters.
老屋子里的这把太师椅已经残旧不堪。
Lǎowūzi lǐ de zhè bǎ tàishīyǐ yǐjing cánjiù bùkān。
This armchair in the old house is old and broken.
古代的漕运总督府旧址现在在江苏。
Gǔdài de cáoyùn zǒngdūfǔ jiùzhǐ xiànzài zài Jiāngsū。
The stadholder\'s mansion was originally set in Jiangsu province.
旧时人们在提到自己的字的时候，往往用“草字”两个字表示谦虚。
Jiùshí rénmen zài tídào zìjǐ de zì de shíhou，wǎngwǎng yòng“cǎozì”liǎng gè zì biǎoshì qiānxū。
In ancient times, people often used &quot;Cao Zi&quot;to show their humility when mentioning their names.
他在文章中针砭旧时沉痼，得到了很多人的共鸣。
Tā zài wénzhāng zhōng zhēnbiān jiùshí chéngù，dédào le hěnduōrén de gòngmíng。
His article aroused strong support regarding social chronic problems.
旧社会，曲艺表演者也被称为是吃开口饭的。
Jiù shèhuì，qǔyì biǎoyǎnzhě yě bèi chēngwéi shì chī kāikǒufàn de。
In old society, quyi performers were entertainers who talked or sang.
旧社会，很多人是为了冲喜才结婚的。
Jiù shèhuì，hěnduōrén shì wèi le chōngxǐ cái jiéhūn de。
In the old society, many people went into marriage in order to cure their ill relatives.
两人重修旧好，经常在一起吃饭聊天。
Liǎng rén chóngxiū jiùhǎo，jīngcháng zài yìqǐ chīfàn liáotiān。
The two people have reconciled, and now always eat and talk together.
畴类皆长年，成人旧童子。
Chóulèi jiē zhǎngnián，chéngrén jiù tóngzǐ。
All children eventually become adults, and all adults were once children.
垂花门在旧式宅院中是很常见的。
Chuíhuāmén zài jiùshì zháiyuàn zhōng shì hěn chángjiàn de。
Festooned doors are commonly seen in old style courtyards.
那些垂髫旧事，真让人怀念。
Nàxiē chuítiáo jiùshì，zhēn ràng rén huáiniàn。
I greatly cherish the old stories of my childhood.
这里依旧是黄土一片，寸草不生。
Zhèlǐ yījiùshì huángtǔ yí piàn，cùncǎo bùshēng。
This is still a vast land of yellow sand, without a blade of grass growing on it.
这些旧报纸打趸儿给我吧。
Zhèxiē jiù bàozhǐ dǎdǔnr gěi wǒ ba。
Would you please give me all of these old newspapers at the same time?
旧社会，老百姓只有过年才能打牙祭。
Jiù shèhuì，lǎobǎixìng zhǐyǒu guònián cáinéng dǎ yájì。
Before 1949, ordinary people in China were only able to afford one sumptuous meal a day on spring festival.
但见新人笑，不闻旧人哭。
Dàn jiàn xīnrén xiào，bùwén jiùrén kū。
All he can see is the smile of the new love, while the old love weeps unheard.
他把看过的旧报纸都叠放在书柜里。
Tā bǎ kàn guò de jiù bàozhǐ dōu diéfàng zài shūguì lǐ。
He folded all the old newspapers and put them in the book cabinet.
旧社会，村里的恶霸不时地掀起恶浪。
Jiù shèhuì，cūn lǐ de èbà bùshí de xiān qǐ èlàng。
Before the new China was founded, the evil men in the village made the lives of the locals insufferable.
翻检家里杂物时，偶然找到一张旧照片。
Fānjiǎn jiālǐ záwù shí，ǒurán zhǎo dào yìzhāng jiù zhàopiàn。
I found an old photo when I was looking through my stuff at home.
咱们就说今天的事，别总是翻旧账。
Zánmen jiù shuō jīntiān de shì，bié zǒngshì fānjiùzhàng。
Don\'t keep picking over our old quarrels; let\'s stick to today\'s business.
当我又翻弄那些旧照片时，往事又涌上心头。
Dāng wǒ yòu fānnòng nàxiē jiù zhàopiàn shí，wǎngshì yòu yǒngshàng xīntóu。
When I look through my old photos, I am lost in memory.
她那件凡尔丁的外套，虽然有几分旧了，但还是很漂亮。
Tā nà jiàn fán\'ěrdīng de wàitào，suīrán yǒu jǐ fēn jiù le，dàn háishi hěn piàoliang。
Her old valetin coat still looks good.
他这次回乡访旧，故地重游，感慨万千。
Tā zhècì huíxiāng fǎngjiù，gùdìchóngyóu，gǎnkǎi wànqiān。
He visited old friends and his native places and was filled with strong emotions.
我们楼下有一个收集废旧电池的箱子。
Wǒmen lóu xià yǒu yígè shōují fèijiù diànchí de xiāngzi。
We have a box to collect waste batteries downstairs.
千万不要让旧电池中的废液渗入到水土中！
Qiānwàn búyào ràng jiù diànchí zhōng de fèiyè shènrù dào shuǐtǔ zhōng ！
Do not let waste liquid from the batteries sink into the land or the water.
多年不见，她风采依旧。
Duōnián bújiàn，tā fēngcǎi yījiù。
She looks as charming as ever.
家里那盏老式玻璃风灯，如今成了怀旧的装饰品。
Jiā lǐ nà zhǎn lǎoshì bōli fēngdēng，rújīn chéng le huáijiù de zhuāngshìpǐn。
The old hand-held storm lantern has become a decoration which reminds one of old times.
这个风戽太陈旧了，我们应该尽快买个新的。
Zhè ge fēnghù tài chénjiù le，wǒmen yīnggāi jìnkuài mǎi gè xīn de。
This windmill is too old, we should buy a new one as soon as possible.
这些腐恶的势力依旧横行乡里。
Zhèxiē fǔ\'è de shìlì yījiù héngxíngxiānglǐ。
These evil people are still playing tyrants.
他年纪虽大，但却没什么腐旧思想。
Tā niánjì suī dà，dàn què méishénme fǔjiù sīxiǎng。
He is old but his thoughts are not worn out.
改良派意识到了旧中国的种种弊端。
Gǎiliángpài yìshí dào le jiù Zhōngguó de zhǒng zhǒng bìduān。
The reformists came to realize the disadvantages of the old China.
把不能穿的旧衣服割弃了吧。
Bǎ bùnéng chuān de jiùyīfu gēqì le ba。
Throw away those worn clothes.
这是一部反映旧社会歌女生活的影片。
Zhè shì yíbù fǎnyìng jiù shèhuì gēnǚ shēnghuó de yǐngpiàn。
The film reflects the life of singing girls in the old society.
在此辞旧迎新的时候，我们恭祝新老顾客身体健康，财源广进。
Zài cǐ cíjiù yíngxīn de shíhou，wǒmen gōngzhù xīnlǎo gùkè shēntǐjiànkāng，cáiyuán guǎngjìn。
During this time of ringing out the old year and ringing in the new, we wish both our new customers and old customers good health and abundant wealth.
他顾念旧情，没有追究这件事情。
Tā gùniàn jiùqíng，méiyǒu zhuījiū zhèjiàn shìqing。
Thinking about old friendships, he didn\'t investigate this matter.
旧社会的妇女都用裹脚布缠足。
Jiù shèhuì de fùnǚ dōu yòng guǒjiǎobùchánzú。
Before 1949 women in China had their feet bound as form of beautification.
旧时的破落文人大都一幅寒酸相。
Jiùshí de pòluò wénrén dàdōu yìfú hánsuān xiàng。
Scholars in decline in the past looked miserable, and shabby.
本市最大的旧城改造工程开始还迁。
Běnshì zuìdàde jiùchéng gǎizào gōngchéng kāishǐ huánqiān。
The biggest project for reconstructing old towns in the city begins to move back.
经过我们的共同努力，终于使这间旧房换容了。
Jīngguò wǒmen de gòngtóng nǔlì，zhōng yú shǐ zhè jiān jiùfáng huànróng le。
Through our common efforts, the appearance of the old room have finally changed.
我在寄卖行买了一辆旧自行车。
Wǒ zài jìmàiháng mǎi le yí liàng jiù zìxíngchē。
I bought an old bike at a secondhand store.
老夫妻俩回忆起甜蜜的往事，一边赏月一边叙旧。
Lǎofūqī liǎ huíyìqǐ tiánmì de wǎngshì，yìbiān shǎngyuè yìbiān xùjiù。
While appreciating the moon, the couple recounted their happy stories.
在农村桔槔是常用的旧式提水器具。
Zài nóngcūn júgāo shì chángyòng de jiùshì tíshuǐ qìjù。
A well-sweep is an old instrument used for carrying water commonly used in villages.
由旧城墙可以看出这里曾是隋朝的京畿。
Yóu jiù chéngqiáng kěyǐ kànchū zhèlǐ céngshì Suícháo de jīngjī。
The old city walls show that this area belonged to the captial city and its environs.
陈旧的经济体制必须进行改革，这是市场经济发展的必然结果。
Chénjiù de jīngjì tǐzhì bìxū jìnxíng gǎigé，zhèshì shìchǎng jīngjì fāzhǎn de bìrán jiéguǒ。
The old economic system must be reformed, an inevitable result of the development of the market economy.
他刚从看守所出来就旧病复发，又开始偷东西了。
Tā gāng cóng kànshǒusuǒ chūlái jiù jiùbìng fùfā，yòu kāishǐ tōu dōngxi le。
He went back to his old trade of stealing after getting out of jail.
里约热内卢是巴西的旧国。
Lǐyuērènèilú shì Bāxī de jiùguó。
Rio de Janeiro was the capital of Brazil.
我和他是旧好，现在已经没什么交情了。
Wǒ hé tā shì jiùhǎo，xiànzài yǐjing méishénme jiāoqíng le。
We used to be friends, but have grown apart.
刚给我打电话的是我的旧好。
Gāng gěi wǒ dǎ diànhuà de shì wǒ de jiùhǎo。
An old friend of mine just called.
这是古长城的旧迹，现在很少有人去爬了。
Zhè shì gǔ Chángchéng de jiùjì，xiànzài hěnshǎo yǒurén qù pá le。
This is the remains of the ancient Great Wall, rarely visited by tourists anymore.
苏东坡的旧迹价值连城，被很多人高价收藏。
Sū Dōngpō de jiùjì jiàzhí liánchéng，bèi hěnduōrén gāojià shōucáng。
Su Dongpo\'s writings and paintings are of great value, and collected by many at very high prices.
宗教改革之后新教教派与旧教分庭抗礼。
Zōngjiào gǎigé zhīhòu xīnjiào jiàopài yǔ jiùjiào fēntíng kànglǐ。
After the Reformation, Protestants broke away from Catholicism.
时代变了，这些旧例不再具有适用性。
Shídài biàn le，zhèxiē jiùlì búzài jùyǒu shìyòngxìng。
Time changes and these old regulations are no longer applicable.
改革开放后，这个村庄旧貌换新颜。
Gǎigé kāifàng hòu，zhège cūnzhuāng jiùmào huàn xīnyán。
After reform and opening up, this village totally changed.
他总想他年轻时候的事，真是旧梦难忘。
Tā zǒng xiǎng tā niánqīng shíhou de shì，zhēnshì jiùmèng nánwàng。
He is obessed with things that happened when he was young,and can\'t forget his old dreams.
你这旧脑筋已经跟不上时代了。
Nǐ zhè jiùnǎojīn yǐjing gēnbúshàng shídài le。
You are far behind the times.
年轻人不应该拘于旧说，要勇于创新。
Niánqīngrén bùyīnggāi jūyú jiùshuō，yào yǒngyú chuàngxīn。
Young people should not stick to old ideas and must have the courage to innovate.
五四以来，从事旧体诗创作的文人越来越少。
Wǔsì yǐlái，cóngshì jiùtǐshī chuàngzuò de wénrén yuèláiyuè shǎo。
Since the May Fourth Movement, fewer and fewer people create traditional poems.
这本书收录了不少民国年间的旧闻。
Zhèběnshū shōulù le bùshǎo mínguó niánjiān de jiùwén。
This book includes a lot of anecdotes from the age of the Republic of China.
老祖宗留下的旧物我们应当批判地继承。
Lǎozǔzōng liúxià de jiùwù wǒmen yīngdāng pīpàn de jìchéng。
In regard to our ancestors\' old systems, we must inherit critically.
腐败的晚清政府没有能力光复旧物。
Fǔbài de wǎnqīng zhèngfǔ méiyǒu nénglì guāngfù jiùwù。
The corrupt late Qing government was not able to recover lost territories.
这件旧物是他祖爷爷留下来的。
Zhèjiàn jiùwù shì tā zǔyéye liúxiàlái de。
This antique belonged to his great grandfather.
不少外国人对中国的旧学很感兴趣。
Bùshǎo wàiguórén duì Zhōngguó de jiùxué hěn gǎnxìngqù。
Many foreigners are interested in traditional Chinese culture.
有了新友莫忘旧友，这是我们交友的原则。
Yǒu le xīnyǒu mòwàng jiùyǒu，zhè shì wǒmen jiāoyǒu de yuánzé。
While making new friends,never forget the old ones--this is a basic principle of friendship.
这些旧章跟不上时代了，应当废除。
Zhèxiē jiùzhāng gēnbúshàng shídài le，yīngdāng fèichú。
These old systems are outdated and should be abolished.
每到春节，我的那位旧知总要来给我拜年。
Měidào chūnjié，wǒ de nà wèi jiùzhī zǒng yào lái gěi wǒ bàinián。
My old friend always pays me a visit during Spring Festival.
这个老学究只会拘执旧理，一点也不变通。
Zhège lǎoxuéjiū zhǐhuì jūzhí jiùlǐ，yìdiǎn yě bú biàntōng。
This old pedant is so rigid that he refuses to change his ideas.
随着一声巨响，这座旧楼被成功爆破！
Suí zhe yìshēng jùxiǎng，zhè zuò jiùlóu bèi chénggōng bàopò！
With a huge noise, this old building was successfully blown up.
他在旧书市偶然淘到一部卷轴装的《唐诗选》。
Tā zài jiù shūshì ǒurán táodào yíbù juǎnzhóuzhuāng de《Tángshīxuǎn》。
He found by accident a scroll of A Collection of the Poetry of the Tang Dynasty in a secondhand book market.
这手机用了好几年了，除了壳子有点旧之外，其他都好。
Zhè shǒujī yòng le hǎo jǐn ián le，chú le kézi yǒu diǎn jiù zhīwài，qítā dōu hǎo。
This cell phone has been used for many years, but everything functions well, except that its case is a little old.
旧时办丧事是讲究哭丧的，只有哭得伤心，才能显示出对去世者的怀念和尊敬！
Jiùshí bàn sàngshì shì jiǎngjiū kūsàng de，zhǐyǒu kū de shāngxīn，cáinéng xiǎnshìchū duì qùshìzhě de huáiniàn hé zūnjìng！
In ancient times, wailing was very important at a funeral. Only grief and wailing showed yearning and respect for the dead.
儿子结婚时，这些老亲旧邻都来贺喜，大家都很高兴。
Érzi jiéhūn shí，zhèxiē lǎoqīn jiùlín dōu lái hèxǐ，dàjiā dōu hěngāoxìng。
When my son got married, old relatives and neighbours all came to congratulate us and we all had a very good time.
深夜里，流莺依旧出入各条繁华的街道。
Shēnyè lǐ，liúyīng yījiù chūrù gè tiáo fánhuá de jiēdào。
Prostitutes still appear in all prosperous streets at night.
他的马桶包被塞得满满的，都是一些旧衣服。
Tā de mǎtǒngbāo bèi sāi de mǎnmǎn de，dōushì yìxiē jiù yīfu。
His traveling bag is crammed full of old clothes.
旧社会，门阀世家经常会享受到一些特权。
Jiù shèhuì，ménfá shìjiā jīngcháng huì xiǎngshòudào yìxiē tèquán。
In olden times, influential families enjoyed special privileges.
没想到会在大街上突然遇见分别多年的旧情人，她像泥塑木雕似的呆住了。
Méi xiǎngdào huì zài dàjiē shàng tūrán yùjiàn fēnbié duōnián de jiù qíngrén，tā xiàng nísù mùdiāo sì de dāizhù le。
Never expecting to come across her old lover in the street after many years apart, she was stunned as wooden as a dummy.
历史课后，老师带领我们参观了农会旧址。
Lìshǐkè hòu，lǎoshī dàilǐng wǒmen cānguān le nónghuì jiùzhǐ。
After the history lesson, the teacher led us to look around the former site of a peasant association.
现在的家庭服务员可不是旧时的女仆了。
Xiànzài de jiātíng fúwùyuán kě búshì jiùshí de nǚpú le。
Household maids nowadays are not the servants of ancient times.
老屋的排杈儿用料很好，就是上边的纸太破旧了。
Lǎowū de páichàr yòngliào hěnhǎo，jiùshì shàngbiān de zhǐ tài pòjiù le。
The partitions of the old house are of good quality, but the paper on them is old and worn.
关于前朝的旧事，我们就不要再提了。
Guānyú qiáncháo de jiùshì，wǒmen jiù búyào zài tí le。
Let\'s forget about these past events of the preceding dynasty.
房子已经破旧不堪，好像随时都会倾塌。
Fángzi yǐjing pòjiù bùkān，hǎo xiàng suíshí dōuhuì qīngtā。
The house is in a dilapidated condition and seems as if it will collapse at any moment.
旧式文人的身上难免有些穷酸气。
Jiùshì wénrén de shēnshàng nánmiǎn yǒuxiē qióngsuānqì。
Old-type intellectuals are inevitably a little poor and pedantic.
旧时统治者把普通百姓视为群氓。
Jiùshí tǒngzhìzhě bǎ pǔtōng bǎixìng shìwéi qúnmáng。
The rulers regarded general civilians as the common herd in ancient times.
十不闲儿莲花落是旧时曲艺的一种，一般在相声之前演唱以招揽生意。
Shíbùxiánr liánhuāluò shì jiùshí qǔyì de yìzhǒng，yìbān zài xiàng shēng zhīqián yǎnchàng yǐ zhāolǎn shēngyì。
&quot;Shibuxianlianhualuo&quot; (a singing form accompanied by music on ten percussion instruments) is an old folk art form, which is generally performed before a comic dialogue to attract attention.
我们不能忽视收旧利废工作，开源与节流要并重。
Wǒmen bùnéng hūshì shōujiù lìfèi gōngzuò，kāiyuán yǔ jiéliú yào bìngzhòng。
We can\'t ignore the work of recycling waste, because increasing income is equally as important as decreasing expenditure.
对于顽固的守旧派，我们不能只用言语说服他们，更要以事实证明给他们看。
Duìyú wángù de shǒujiùpài，wǒmen bùnéng zhǐ yòng yányǔ shuìfú tāmen，gèng yào yǐ shìshí zhèngmíng gěi tāmen kàn。
As for those obstinate conservatives, we should not only persuade them with words, but also prove their mistakes with facts.
他的旧伤还没好，一到阴天就会有酸胀的感觉。
Tā de jiùshāng hái méihǎo，yí dào yīntiān jiùhuì yǒu suānzhàng de gǎnjué。
His old wound hasn\'t recovered completely, it aches and swells on rainy days.
现在的军事武器不知要比旧式抬枪的威力大多少倍。
Xiànzài de jūnshì wǔqì bùzhī yào bǐ jiùshì táiqiāng de wēilì dà duōshǎo bèi。
Military weapons today are far more powerful than the jingalls of old times.
旧时农户每年都要交纳繁重的田赋。
Jiùshí nónghù měinián dōuyào jiāonà fánzhòng de tiánfù。
In the past, all the peasant households had to hand in a lot of land tax every year.
所有旧家具通统不要了。
Suǒyǒu jiù jiājù tōngtǒng búyào le。
All the furniture is to be thrown away.
我该买双新袜子了，这双旧袜子的袜底已经磨破了。
Wǒ gāi mǎi shuāng xīn wàzi le，zhè shuāng jiù wàzi de wàdǐ yǐjing mópò le。
I have to buy a new pair of socks, as the soles of this old pair have worn out.
这只万用表已经很旧了。
Zhèzhī wànyòngbiǎo yǐjīng hěnjiù le。
This multiple-use meter is already very old.
小两是旧制的重量单位，现在已经不用了。
Xiǎoliǎng shì jiùzhì de zhòngliàng dānwèi，xiànzài yǐjing búyòng le。
Xiao liang used to be a unit of weight.
这张小影是什么时候拍的？看上去已经很旧了。
Zhèzhāng xiǎoyǐng shì shénme shíhou pāi de？Kànshàngqù yǐjing hěn jiù le。
When was the film made? It looks quite old.
新派与旧派之间斗争激烈。
Xīnpài yǔ jiùpài zhījiān dòuzhēng jīliè。
The new faction is in fierce conflict with the old faction.
家乡真是旧貌换新颜。
Jiāxiāng zhēnshì jiùmào huàn xīnyán。
My hometown has a brand-new image.
旧友新知今天聚会一堂。
Jiùyǒu xīnzhī jīntiān jùhuì yìtáng。
Today, old friends and new ones get together.
在旧社会他做过巡捕，相当于现代的警察。
Zài jiù shèhuì tā zuòguò xúnbǔ，xiāngdāngyú xiàndài de jǐngchá。
What he did in the old society is something like the policeman at modern times.
旧时的鸦片馆里，他们用烟灯吸食鸦片。
Jiùshí de yāpiànguǎn lǐ，tāmen yòng yāndēng xīshí yāpiàn。
In old opium dens, people used a smoke lamp to take in the opium.
旧时得瘟疫病逝的人都会被葬在义地。
Jiùshí dé wēnyì bìngshì de rén dōuhuì bèi zàngzài yìdì。
In ancient times, people who died of pestilence would be buried in free burial ground for the destitute.
因循守旧的人必然适应不了时代的发展。
Yīnxún shǒujiù de rén bìrán shìyīng bùliǎo shídài de fāzhǎn。
People who get stuck in a groove aren\'t able to adapt themselves to the times.
电影主角的一句话引动了她的怀旧情绪。
Diànyǐng zhǔjué de yíjù huà yǐndòng le tā de huáijiù qíngxù。
One of the actor\'s lines aroused his nostalgia.
我好像听妈妈说过父亲和他有旧。
Wǒ hǎo xiàng tīng māma shuōguò fùqīn hé tā yǒujiù。
I have probably heard mother saying that father used to be friends with him in the past.
很多废旧物品经过处理可以再利用。
Hěnduō fèijiù wùpǐn jīngguò chǔlǐ kěyǐ zài lìyòng。
Many old and useless stuff can be reused after being processed.
这种设备的折旧率太高。
Zhèzhǒng shèbèi de shéjiùlǜ tài gāo。
The rate of depreciation of this equipment is too high.
旧社会连年的征发导致民不聊生。
Jiù shèhuì liánnián de zhēngfā dǎozhì mínbùliáoshēng。
In the old society, continuous drafting and acquisition of supplies makes people live in misery.
他买来装饰布把破旧的家布置了一番。
Tā mǎilái zhuāngshìbùbǎ pòjiù de jiā bùzhì le yì fān。
He bought upbolstery fabrics and redecorated his shabby home.
旧社会租种的现象很普遍。
Jiù shèhuì zūzhòng de xiàn xiàng hěn pǔbiàn。
In the old society, the phenomenon of farming on rented land was very common.
国企改革不成功和它本身旧的体制有很大关系。
Guóqǐ gǎigé bù chénggōng hé tā běnshēn jiù de tǐzhì yǒu hěn dà guānxi。
我们要提倡对废旧物品综合利用的做法。
Wǒmen yào tíchàng duì fèijiù wùpǐn zōnghé lìyòng de zuòfǎ。
We should promote the comprehensive utilization of waste materials.
废旧电池即使没有了使用价值也不可随手乱丢，因为它们会污染环境！
Fèijiù diànchí jíshǐ méiyǒule shǐyòng jiàzhí yě bùkě suíshǒu luàn diū，yīnwèi tāmen huì wūrǎn huánjìng！
Old batteries can\'t be discarded casually even when they are no longer useful, because they\'ll pollute the environment!
你这样做简直就是在做旧制度的殉葬品。
Nǐ zhèyàng zuò jiǎnzhí jiùshì zài zuò jiù zhìdù de xùnzàng pǐn。
What you are doing is burying yourself alive with the old system.
半新不旧
bànxīnbújiù
nearly new
话旧
huà jiù
reminisce
旧的工作方法必须加以改进。
Jiù de gōngzuòfāngfǎ bìxū jiāyǐgǎijìn.
The old working methods need to be improved.
让陈旧的传统观念见鬼去吧！
Ràng chénjiù de chuántǒngguānniàn jiànguǐ qù bā！
To hell with those old-fashioned ideas!
中国人常在新旧年交替时吃饺子。
Zhōngguórén cháng zài xīnjiù nián jiāotì shí chī jiǎozǐ.
Chinese people often eat dumplings to see in the New Year.
他爱尽旧衣服穿。
Tā ài jǐn jiù yīfu chuān.
He likes wearing old clothes.
旧观念
jiùguānniàn
old-fashioned idea
旧衣服
jiù yīfu
used clothes
抛弃旧观念
pāoqì jiùguānniàn
give up on one\'s old ideas
此项法规仍旧。
Cǐxiàng fǎguī réngjiù.
This statute will remain as it was before.
我劝了半天，她仍旧不同意。
Wǒ quànle bàntiān，tā réngjiù bù tóngyì.
I spent ages trying to persuade her, but she still wouldn\'t agree.
那种手机样式太旧，估计你相不上。
Nàzhǒng shǒujī yàngshì tài jiù，gūjì nǐ xiāng bú shàng。
That style of mobile phone is very old. I reckon you won\'t like it.
10年了，他依旧孑然一身。
Shínián le，tā yījiù jiérányìshēn。
It\'s been ten years, and he\'s still all alone.
古迹修复要修旧如旧，不能改样。

central rate

Now TV stations often use challenge competitions to increase audience ratings.
虽然理论上利润率的计算方法很简单，但实际操作起来是很复杂的。

In theory it is simple to calculate profit margin, but in reality it is a complex operation.
我这辆自行车的利用率太低，买来到现在就没怎么骑过。
Wǒ zhè liàng zìxíngchē de lìyònglǜ tài dī，mǎilái dào xiànzài jiù méi zěnme qíguò。
I rarely use my bike lately, I have seldom used it since I bought it.
为了保证幼苗的存活率，保持一定的苗距是必要的。
Wèile bǎozhèng yòumiáo de cúnhuólǜ，bǎochí yídìng de miáojù shì bìyào de。
To ensure the survival rate of seedlings, it is necessary to keep a certain distance among them.
这个地区的文化教育普及率较高，所以民智也普遍较高。
Zhège dìqū de wénhuà jiàoyù pǔjílǜ jiàogāo，suǒyǐ mínzhì yě pǔbiàn jiàogāo。
This region has a high popularization of education, so the literacy of people is also relatively high.
射击比赛中，她状态不佳，命中率不高。

我一直在统计普通话的普及率。
Wǒ yìzhí zài tǒngjì pǔtōnghuà de pǔjílǜ。

Wǒjiā wēibōlú de gōnglǜ shì yìqiānwǎ。

Because the World Cup is going to be held in this city, the average occupancy rate of hotels in the city has greatly increased.
今天散座的上座率达到了80%。
Jīntiān sǎnzuò de shàngzuòlǜ dádào le bǎifēnzhī bāshí。

我们学校连年保持了较高的升学率。
Wǒmen xuéxiào liánnián bǎochí le jiàogāo de shēngxuélǜ。
Our school has maintained a comparatively large proportion of students who enter schools of a higher grade after graduation.
我们要通过推行义务教育来不断降低失学率。
Wǒmen yào tōngguò tuīxíng yìwù jiàoyù lái búduàn jiàngdī shīxuélǜ。
We should decrease the drop-out rate at school by promoting compulsory education.
大家都喜欢看这个栏目，所以它的收视率相当不错。
Dàjiā dōu xǐhuan kàn zhège lánmù，suǒyǐ tā de shōushìlǜ xiāngdāng búcuò。
Everyone like this program, so it enjoys a high audience rating.
我命各军率部迎敌、不准后退。
Wǒ mìng gè jūn shuàibùyíngdí、bùzhǔn hòutuì。
I ordered that all the armies should lead their soldiers to charge ahead rather than turn back.
他是个不拘小节的人，时常率性而为。
Tā shì gè bùjū xiǎojié de rén，shícháng shuàixìng ér wéi。
He doesn\'t bother about trifles, and always does things according to his own conscience.
他率性放手一搏，反而取得了很好的成绩。
Tā shuàixìng fàngshǒu yìbó，fǎnér qǔdé le hěnhǎo de chéngjì。
He just fought without any further consideration, and got very good marks, contrary to all expectations.
双铧犁耕地的效率当然要比单铧犁高。
Shuānghuálí gēngdì de xiàolǜ dāngrán yào bǐ dānhuálí gāo。
It is certainly more effective to till land with a double-spade plow than with a one-blade plow.
她最近很顺气，做事也就很有效率。
Tā zuìjìn hěnshùnqì，zuòshì yě jiù hěnyǒu xiàolǜ。
She has been in a good mood recently, and so very effective at work.
使用速凝剂可以加快施工速度、提高我们的工作效率。
Shǐyòng sùníngjì kěyǐ jiākuài shīgōng sùdù、tígāo wǒmen de gōngzuò xiàolǜ。
We can speed up construction and raise our working efficiency with the accelerating agent.
这些单位只会踢皮球，办事效率太低了。
Zhèxiē dānwèi zhǐhuì tī píqiú，bànshì xiàolǜ tài dī le。

Zhè yī tǐzhì cóng jīngjì jiǎodù lái kàn méiyǒu xiàolǜ，zài cóng zhèngzhì jiǎodù lái kàn shì wúzhèngfǔ zhǔyì。
这一体制从经济角度来看没有效率，在从政治角度来看是无政府主义。
Wavelength and frequency are, of course, related reciprocally.
Bōcháng hé pínlǜ dāngrán shì xiāngfǎn de guānxi。
波长和频率当然是相反的关系。

Wǒmen kěyǐ tōngguò gàilǜlùn de fāngfǎ jìsuàn chū lìzǐ de wèizhi。
我们可以通过概率论的方法计算出粒子的位置。
What some people take for rudeness is really straightforwardness.
Yìxiērén suǒ rènwéi de wúlǐ shíjìshàng què shì zhíshuài de biǎoxiàn。
一些人所认为的无礼实际上却是直率的表现。
The faster a jet plane goes the greater its propulsive efficiency.
Pēnqìshìfēijī de sùdù yuè kuài，tāmen de tuījìn xiàolǜ jiù yuè gāo。
喷气式飞机的速度越快，它们的推进效率就越高。
He answered the reporters\' questions flippantly.
Tā qīngshuài de huídále jìzhě de wèntí。
他轻率地回答了记者的问题。
The failure rate on the bar exam is discouragingly high.
Lǜshī kǎoshì de shībàilǜ gāo de ràng rén qìněi。
律师考试的失败率高得让人气馁。
The productive work is done on the shop floor.
Nà xiàng gāoxiàolǜ de gōngzuò shì zài chējiān wánchéng de。
那项高效率的工作是在车间完成的。
A rise in interest rates is often contemporaneous with an increase in inflation.

利率提高往往与通货膨胀相伴随。
The death rate in Russia has been stably high.
Éguó de rénkǒu sǐwánglǜ yìzhí yǐlái dōu gāojūbúxià。
俄国的人口死亡率一直以来都高居不下。
A circle is an ellipse with zero eccentricity.
Yuánxíng shì líng líxiànlǜ de tuǒyuán。
圆形是零离线率的椭圆。

Jìsuànjī yǐ qí wúyǐlúnbǐ de luójì hé xiàolǜ chǔlǐ shìwù。

The salesman\'s batting average was 7 out of 12.

这个推销员推销产品的平均成功率为7比12。

Tā tǎnshuài de shuōchū shí，méirén juéde bùtuǒ。
她坦率地说出时，没人觉得不妥。

Zhè zhǒng yào jiāng jiǎnhuǎn nǐ de xīnlǜ。
这种药将减缓你的心率。
A rise in the cost of living reflects the rate of inflation.

Shuō tā tǎnshuài de shíhou qǐng bié wàngjì tā de nàxiē yōudiǎn。

贷款利率
dàikuǎn lìlǜ 
interest rate on a loan
月利率五厘七
Yuè lìlǜ wǔ lí qī
0.57% monthly interest
年利率七厘二
Nián lìlǜ qī lí èr
7.2% annual interest
年利率
niánlìlǜ
annual interest rate
月利率
yuèlìlǜ
monthly interest rate
存贷利率上调，各方的反应不同。
Cúndài lìlǜ shàngtiáo，gè fāng de fǎnyìng bùtóng。
Different parties respond differently to the raising of the interest rate of deposits and loans.
商业银行的收入主要来源于贷款和存款的利率差。

The earnings of commercial banks are mainly from the balance of the interest rate between loan and deposit.
设备利用率
shèbèi lìyònglǜ
utilization rate of equipment and installations

我这辆自行车的利用率太低，买来到现在就没怎么骑过。

利率。

利率下调。

Triple time has three beats per measure.

Zhèlǐ tài àn le，pāizhào de shíhou yào shǐyòng měiguāngdēng le。
It is too dim here. A magnesium lamp should be used when photographing.
航拍的照片很清晰，能够清楚地看到地球表面的情况。

这么可人的美景，咱们应该多拍几张照片留念啊。

We should take more pictures of this pleasant and beautiful scene.
小张到照相馆拍了张穿着戏衣的艺术照。

Xiao Zhang went to the photo studio, and got dressed in stage costumes to take an artistic picture.
拍摄一张照片
pāishè yì zhāngzhàopiàn
take a photo
今天，我跟她拍了张合照。

I took a photo with her today.
小张一直不喜欢拍摄艺术照，因为感觉不真实。

Xiao Zhang doesn\'t like to take artistic photos, because she thinks that they are unreal.
我拍了十几张照。
Wǒ pāi le shíjǐ zhāngzhào。
I took about a dozen pictures. or I had a dozen pictures taken.
你的这张戏照是在哪家照像馆拍的？

这张照片是我从杂志封面上翻拍下来的。

pāimàishānɡ
auctioneer
拍卖的时候，这件商品的落槌价格是7万元。
Pāimài de shíhou，zhèjiàn shāngpǐn de luòchuí jiàgé shì qīwànyuán。
The closing bid in the auction for the merchandise was 70,000 yuan.
The embroidery was highly prized by the auctioneers.
Zhè jiàn xiùpǐn shòudào pāimàishāngmen de gāodù zhòngshì。
这件绣品受到拍卖商们的高度重视。
The dealer put up three of his most valuable paintings for auction.
Zhè míng shāngrén bǎ tā zuì zhēnguì de huìhuà zhōng de sānfú ná chūlái pāimài。
这名商人把他最珍贵的绘画中的三幅拿出来拍卖。
这次拍卖会上，我拍到了一个精美的彩绘雕花的炕屏。
Zhècì pāimàihuì shàng，wǒ pāidào le yígè jīngměi de cǎihuì diāohuā de kàngpíng。
In this auction, I bought an exquisite screen with colored carvings for the kang.
拍卖会开槌以后，还没拍出一件东西呢。
Pāimàihuì kāichuí yǐhòu，hái méi pāichū yíjiàn dōngxi ne。
Since the beginning of the auction, not a single article has been sold.
这个著名的拍卖行经常举办大型拍卖会。
Zhège zhùmíng de pāimàiháng jīngcháng jǔbàn dàxíng pāimàihuì。
The famous auction house often holds large-scale auctions.
这次拍卖会的主办方会拿出多件珍贵的字画参拍。
Zhècì pāimàihuì de zhǔbànfāng huì náchū duō jiàn zhēnguì de zìhuà cānpāi。
The organizer put many valuable works of calligraphy, and paintings up for auction.
拍卖会上，这幅油画开叫1万元，可是没人应拍。
Pāimàihuì shàng，zhèfú yóuhuà kāijiào yíwànyuán，kěshì méirén yìngpāi。
During the auction, the bid price for this painting was 10,000 yuan, but no one responded to it.
拍卖会上，人们在竞买这个古董。
Pāimàihuì shàng，rénmen zài jìngmǎi zhège gǔdǒng。
People in the auction compete with each other for this antique.
名家书画拍卖会明天举槌。
Míngjiā shūhuà pāimàihuì míngtiān jǔchuí。
The auction of calligraphies and paintings of celebrities will be held tomorrow.
今天下午这个拍卖会就要落槌了。
Jīntiān xiàwǔ zhège pāimàihuì jiùyào luòchuí le。
The auction will wind up this afternoon.
拍卖会上午开槌。
这次文物拍卖会昨日在上海落槌。
向社会公开竞价拍卖。

我们将在拍卖会竞拍二手汽车。
The old print fetched a high price at the auction.
Zhè bù jiù yìnshuāpǐn zài pāimàihuì shàng pāichūle hǎo jiàqián。
这部旧印刷品在拍卖会上拍出了好价钱。

你估计那幅画在拍卖会上能卖多少钱？

She got a bargain at the auction.

拍卖商
pāimàishānɡ
auctioneer

拍电影
pāi diànyǐnɡ
shoot (or make) a film
这部小说已拍成电影了。
Zhèbù xiǎoshuō yǐ pāichéngdiànyǐng le。
This novel has been made into a film.

bǎ wǔjù pāishè chéng diànyǐng
film a dance drama

为了拍电影，我们租用了个房子。

on location
[电影] 外景拍摄

The film was shot on location.

那部电影是在外景地拍摄的。

一小节四拍
yì xiǎojié sìpāi
four beats in (or to) a bar
小节(节拍的段落)
Just as it is important to find the right pulse for a piece of music, so you must find the right rhythm by which to live your life.
Zhèngrú yào wèi yì shǒu yīnyuè zhǎodào zhèngquè de jiépāi yíyàng，nǐ yěyào zhǎodào shìhé zìjǐ shēnghuó de jiépāi。
正如要为一首音乐找到正确的节拍一样，你也要找到适合自己生活的节拍。
an even tempo
均匀的节拍
Waltz time
华尔兹圆舞曲节拍
march time
进行曲节拍
Stress is the rhythm constituting the basic element of music melody.
有韵律的节拍是组成乐律的基本要素。
Rave music is defined as anything with a repetitive beat.
Ruìwǔ yīnyuè de dìngyì shì yì zhǒng chóngfù jiépāi。
锐舞音乐的定义是一种重复节拍。
The tenor drum is the &quot;time-keeper &quot;,announcing the basic meter of the song.
Gāoyīngǔ jiùshì“jìshíyuán”，fùzé yùgào gēqǔ de jīběn jiépāi。
高音鼓就是“计时员”，负责预告歌曲的基本节拍。
He was beating out funky rhythms on an oil can.
Tā zài yí gè yóuguàn shàng qiāochū jiézòugǎn shízú de jiépāi。
他在一个油罐上敲出节奏感十足的节拍。
Many musicians keep time by tapping their feet on the ground.
Yìxiē yīnyuèjiā yòng jiǎo zài dìbǎn shàng dǎzhe jiépāi chànggē。
一些音乐家用脚在地板上打着节拍唱歌。
The conductor set the beat.
Nà wèi zhǐhuījiā shèzhìle jiépāi。
那位指挥家设置了节拍。
The singer held the note too long.
Nà wèi gēshǒu bǎ nàgè jiépāi lā de tàicháng le。
那位歌手把那个节拍拉得太长了。
The rotation of the dancer kept time with the music.
Nàgè wǔzhě gēnsuí yīnyuè de jiépāi xuánzhuǎn shēntǐ。
那个舞者跟随音乐的节拍旋转身体。
Triple time has three beats per measure.
Sān pāizi shì měi xiǎojié sān pāi。
三拍子是每小节三拍。
Quadruple rhythm has four beats per measure.
Sì pāizi shì měi xiǎojié sì pāi。
四拍子是每小节四拍。
They were singing and clapping to the rhythm.
Tāmen yìbiān chànggē，yìbiān suízhe jiézòu pāishǒu。
他们一边唱歌，一边随着节奏拍手。
four beats to a measure
四拍成一小节
We were taught to clap out the rhythm of several songs.
Wǒmen bèi chuánshòule rúhé yòng shǒu pāichū jǐ shǒu gē de jiézòu。
我们被传授了如何用手拍出几首歌的节奏。
与时代潮流合拍
yǔ shídài cháoliú hépāi
in step with the trend of the times
他的生活方式与时代不太合拍。
Tāde shēnghuófāngshì yǔ shídài bútàihépāi。
His lifestyle is not really in step with the times.
今天，我跟她拍了张合照。
Jīntiān，wǒ gēn tā pāi le zhāng hézhào。
I took a photo with her today.
合拍。
这部电影是中日两国合拍的。
两人合拍了几张照片。
舞步要跟乐曲合拍。
跟时代的脉搏不合拍。
拍张合照。
old methods not attuned to the times
与时代不合拍的老方法
treading the measures gaily
欢乐地合拍跳舞
to be in time
[音] [singers，dancers etc+] 合拍
It is unadvisable to have picture albums  taken by the other party or jointly taken by both parties.
画册不宜采取由对方派人拍摄或双方合拍的方式。
The kids in the band didn\'t keep time with the conductor.
Yuèduì de háizǐmen bùnéng tóng zhǐhuī hépāi。
乐队的孩子们不能同指挥合拍。
Bach\'s music is almost always at the pulse of a heartbeat.
Bāhè de yīnyuè jīhū shì yǔ xīnzàng tiàodòng hépāi de。
巴赫的音乐几乎是与心脏跳动合拍的。
He cannot sing in tune.
Tā de gēchàng bù hépāi。
他的歌唱不合拍。
The musicians were playing in beat.
Gè wèi yīnyuèjiā zhèng hézhe pāizi yǎnzòu。
各位音乐家正合着拍子演奏。
Just as it is important to find the right pulse for a piece of music, so you must find the right rhythm by which to live your life.

正如要为一首音乐找到正确的节拍一样，你也要找到适合自己生活的节拍。
The dancers were on the beat with the music.
Wǔdǎojiā héshàngle yīnyuè de pāizi。
舞蹈家合上了音乐的拍子。

他们结合以后，避免一起拍照。

gěi hēibǎnbào xiě gǎozi
write sth. for the blackboard newspaper
这篇稿子是谁写的？
Zhèpiān gǎozi shì shuí xiě de?
Who wrote this article?
我心里还没个准稿子。
Wǒ xīnlǐ hái méi gè zhǔn gǎozi。
I haven\'t got any definite plan yet.
咱们把这篇稿子再过一遍。
Zánmen bǎ zhèpiān gǎozi zài guò yí biàn。
Let\'s go over the draft once again.
截稿日期
jiégǎo rìqī 
closing date; deadline for contributions
这篇稿子太长，得砍去一半。
Zhèpiān gǎozi tài cháng，děi kǎnqù yíbàn。
The manuscript is too long and should be cut down by half.
扣压稿件
kòuyā gǎojiàn
withhold a manuscript from publication
此稿留存
cǐ ɡǎo liúcún 
keep this copy on file

Nǐ zhèpiān wénzhāngnǎhuìr cái néngtuōgǎo?
When can you get the draft ready?
这一套规章是校长亲自拟的稿。
Zhè yítào guīzhāngshì xiàozhǎngqīnzì nǐ de gǎo。
The principal himself drafted this set of rules.
征稿启事
zhēnɡɡǎo qǐshì
a notice inviting contributions (to a magazine, newspaper, etc.)
起稿子
qǐ gǎozi
work out (or make) a draft
报告是他起的稿。
Bàogào shì tā qǐ de gǎo。
He\'s the one who drafted the report.
稿子几经删改才定下来。
Gǎozi jǐ jīngshāngǎi cái dìngxiàlái。
The draft was revised several times before it was finalized.
审稿
shěn gǎo
go over a manuscript or draft and give comments
请李教授审订此稿。
Qǐng Lǐ jiàoshòu shěndìng cǐ gǎo。
Ask Professor Li to make a critical examination of this manuscript (or to revise this manuscript).
拼版样已经审稿人审读通过。
Pīnbǎnyàng yǐ jīng shěngǎorén shěndú tōngguò。
The page proofs have been read and approved by the responsible reader.
聘请专家审阅稿件并提出意见
pìnqǐng zhuānjiā shěnyuè gǎojiàn bìng tíchū yìjiàn
get some specialists to go over the manuscript and give comments and criticisms

Shǒugǎo de hòu yíbù fen shīsàn le。
The last part of the manuscript is lost.
稿子经过这样一改，念起来就顺口多了。
Gǎozi jīngguò zhèyàng yì gǎi，niàn qǐlái jiù shùnkǒu duō le。
After being touched up, the essay reads more smoothly.
这稿子太乱，要誊一遍。
Zhè gǎozi tài luàn，yào téngyí biàn。
This draft is too messy. It must be recopied.

zhào dǐgǎo téngyífèn

ténɡlù wénɡǎo

The two dogs are staring angrily at each other, but their masters don\'t know why.
跟朋友吵了几句，他就怒气冲冲地走了。

After a quarrel with his friend, he left in a towering rage.
他怒冲冲地闯进门来，一脸煞气。
Tā nùchōngchōng de chuǎngjìn mén lái，yì liǎn shàqì。
He burst into the room furiously with a fierce look.
他的狂妄肆行激怒了在场的所有人。
Tā de kuángwàng sìxíng jīnù le zài chǎng de suǒyǒurén。
His conceited behavior triggered the anger of all the people present.
他十分愤怒，额头上的青筋都凸出了。
Tā shífēn fènnù，étóu shàng de qīngjīn dōu tūchū le。
He was so infuriated that the blue veins on his forehead protruded out.

他怒不可遏地掀掉了桌子。
Tā nùbùkěè de xiāndiào le zhuōzi。

A group of country folks rushed into the yard of the government building in anger.
这两个人是多年的宿敌，一见面就怒目相视。

Those two are old enemies who stare at each other in anger whenever they meet.
经过几番劝说，他的怒气才算是消歇了。
Jīngguò jǐ fān quànshuō，tā de nùqì cái suànshì xiāoxiē le。
He was persuaded to calm down at last.
经过几番劝说，他的怒气才算是销歇了。
Jīngguò jǐ fān quànshuō，tā de nùqì cái suànshì xiāoxiē le。

Zhècì shìgù lìng tā gèngjiā nǎonù le。
这次事故令他更加恼怒了。
His voice was rough with barely suppressed fury.
Tā shēngyīn shāyǎ dàizhe miǎnqiǎng yāyì zhe de fènnù。
他声音沙哑带着勉强压抑着的愤怒。

Tā néng gǎnjué dào nàgè rén qiángliè de fènnù。

Anger simmered inside her.
Tā de nùhuǒ yíchùjífā。
她的怒火一触即发。

Zuìhòu nàxiē huà jiǎnzhí jiùxiàng nùhǒu。
最后那些话简直就像怒吼。
Shamlou snarled, clearly controlling his anger with difficulty.
Shāmǔlóu dàshēng hǒuzhe，míngxiǎn tā hěnnán kòngzhìzhù tā de fènnù。

没有任何道歉可以平息我的怒火，没有人和我现在的感觉一样糟糕。

他们在勃然大怒的女王前瑟瑟发抖。
He looked at her, not wrathfully now, but quizzically.
Tā kànzhe tā，rújīn bú zài shì fènnù，érshì kùnhuò。
他看着她，如今不再是愤怒，而是困惑。

“chūqù，”tā fènnù de hǎndào。

勃然大怒

Tā bórándànù，jùbùhuídá。
她勃然大怒，拒不回答。
The account of his speech that was given on the evening news made the governor furious.
Wǎnjiānxīnwén zhōng tā de jiǎnghuà lìng zhōuzhǎng bórándànù。
晚间新闻中他的讲话令州长勃然大怒。

Tāmen zài bórándànù de nǚwáng qián sèsèfādǒu。
他们在勃然大怒的女王前瑟瑟发抖。
She threw a tantrum.
Tā bórándànù。
她勃然大怒。
An army of young women were on the street, marching and screaming out angry slogans.
一群年轻的女人在大街上，一边走一边愤怒地大声喊着口号。
The frenzied elephant was in musth.
Bèi jīnù de dàxiàng chǔyú fēngkuáng zhuàngtài。
被激怒的大象处于疯狂状态。
She\'s very angry about her handicap, and her biggest whish is to be able to see and be normal.
Duìyú zìjǐ de shēntǐ quēxiàn tā gǎndào fēicháng fènnù，tā zuìdà de xīnyuàn jiùshì nénggòu hé zhèngchángrén yíyàng chóng jiàn guāngmíng。
对于自己的身体缺陷她感到非常愤怒，她最大的心愿就是能够和正常人一样重见光明。
Great sorrow and anger did not change his intellectual way of tackling problems.
巨大的背痛和愤怒没有改变他理智地处理问题的方法。
I would get very irritable and scream at my children.
Wǒ huì nǎonù de cháo háizi dàjiào。
我会恼怒地朝孩子大叫。
The cow went rigid and let forth a resounding bellow.
Nà tóu mǔniú fānùle，fāchūle jùdà de jiàoshēng。
那头母牛发怒了，发出了巨大的叫声。

珍妮以身犯险，不肯上大学，所以不得不面对父亲的盛怒。

Wǒ suǒ mùjī de dàduōshù jīliè de chōngtū dōu láizìyú yì nù de niánzhǎng háizi hé chéngrén。

Shamlou snarled, clearly controlling his anger with difficulty.
Shāmǔlóu dàshēng hǒuzhe，míngxiǎn tā hěnnán kòngzhìzhù tā de fènnù。

His action incensed his wife who came out of the house, shouting abuse.

Jack stormed across the floor, his face a mask of rage.

A courtesy title is a form of address in systems of nobility used by children, formal wives, and other close relatives of a peer.
敬语是贵族系统中贵族的子女、妻子和其他亲属使用的称呼。
nobly born
出身贵族的
of an aristocratic cast
具有贵族的气质
untitled nobility
无爵位的贵族
He behaves as if he is a noble.
他行为处事就像个贵族似的。
Princess Diana was not from a noble family.
戴安娜王妃并非来自一个贵族家庭。
Someone told me that she has royal blood.
有人告诉我她有贵族血统。
Families from these upper classes became the nobility or aristocracy.
这些来自上流社会的家族后来就成了贵族阶级。
The queen created him as a peer of Great Britain.
女王封他为大不列颠的贵族。
The extravagant life of the lord makes a good contrast to the suffering life of the peasants.
贵族的奢华生活和农民的困苦形成了极为巨大的反差。
Her aunt of noble blood cultured her into a princess.
她那有贵族血统的阿姨把她培养成了公主。
Some nobles of the Middle Ages often leave devices with their name on the sword.
相当多的中世纪贵族常常在佩剑上留下带有自己名字的纹章。
Due to his noble origin, he was granted an easy life.
他出身贵族，生活优渥。
Had they been born with blue blood, would their experience have been any different?
Rúguǒ tāmen chūshēn guìzú jiātíng，nàme tāmen de jīnglì shìfǒu jiù huì bùtóng？
如果他们出身贵族家庭，那么他们的经历是否就会不同？
They are a bunch of stuffy aristocrats who are unbelievably wealthy.
Tāmen shì yì qún fáwèi de guìzú，qí fùyǒu chéngdù lìng rén nányǐzhìxìn。
他们是一群乏味的贵族，其富有程度令人难以置信。
One group was working class and one was upper class.
Yì zǔ shì gōngrén jiējí，lìng yī zǔ shì guìzú jiējí。
一组是工人阶级，另一组是贵族阶级。
He was created a peer of the UK in 2005.
Tā zài èrlínglíngwǔ nián bèi fēng wéi Yīngguó de guìzú。
他在2005年被封为英国的贵族。
After his creation as a peer he became a politician.
Zài tā chéngwéi guìzú zhīhòu，tā yòu chéngle yì míng zhèngzhìjiā。
在他成为贵族之后，他又成了一名政治家。
Her parents plighted her to the son of a Lord.
Tā de fùmǔ bǎ tā xǔpèi gěi le yí gè guìzú jiātíng de gōngzǐ。
她的父母把她许配给了一个贵族家庭的公子。
She was critical of the nobility and showed great sympathy for the lower classes.
Tā pīpàn guìzú，zhànzài dī céng jiējí yì fāng。
她批判贵族，站在低层阶级一方。
A quaint pre-war tradition at Lord\'s was `the monarch\'s wicket\'.
Guìzú qítè de zhànqián chuántǒng shì jūnzhǔ de sānzhùmén。
贵族奇特的战前传统是君主的三柱门。
His family on both sides descended from nobility.
Tā fùmǔ liǎng biān de jiāzú dōushì guìzú de hòuyì。
他父母两边的家族都是贵族的后裔。
A deadly disease swept through the noble houses of Europe.
Yì zhǒng zhìmìng de jíbìng xùnsù zài ōuzhōu guìzú chuánbō kāilái。
一种致命的疾病迅速在欧洲贵族传播开来。
Many of these hardy adventurers were minor noblemen.
Zhèxiē yǒnggǎn de tànxiǎnjiā yǒu xǔduō chūshēn yú dīcéng guìzú。
这些勇敢的探险家有许多出身于低层贵族。
She was descended from an old Italian noble family.
Tā chūshēn yú yí gè gǔlǎo de Yìdàlì guìzú jiātíng。
她出身于一个古老的意大利贵族家庭。
The local gentry and professional classes had held aloof for the school had accepted their sons readily enough.
Yīnwèi xuéxiào fēicháng lèyì de jiēshōule tāmen de háizi，suǒyǐ dāngdì de guìzú hé zhíyè jiēcéng dōu bǎochízhe lěngmò chāorán de tàidù。
因为学校非常乐意地接收了他们的孩子，所以当地的贵族和职业阶层都保持着冷漠超然的态度。
Oldline aristocratic diplomats underhandedly undermined the attempt...to align Germany with the western democracies.
Lǎopái de guìzú wàijiāojiā yīnxiǎn de pòhuàile wèi Déguó yǔ xīfāng mínzhǔ guójiā liánméng suǒ zuòchū de nǔlì。
老牌的贵族外交家阴险地破坏了为德国与西方民主国家联盟所做出的努力。
The grammar schools were assuredly not intended for the gentry alone.
Zhè suǒ yǔfǎ xuéxiào míngquè biǎoshì búhuì zhǐ zhāo guìzú xuésheng。
这所语法学校明确表示不会只招贵族学生。
In colonial America left-handed marriages between Frenchmen and Indians were frequent.
Zài dāngshí de zhímíndì Měizhōu，zài Fǎguórén hé Yìndì\'ānrén zhī jiān，guìzú nánzǐ hé píngmín tōnghūn shì shícháng fāshēng de。
在当时的殖民地美洲，在法国人和印第安人之间，贵族男子和平民通婚是时常发生的。
They behaved aristocratically.
Tāmen xíngwéi jǔzhǐ dàizhe guìzú qìxī。
他们行为举止带着贵族气息。
After the revolution the aristocracy was finished.
Gémìng zhīhòu，guìzú tǒngzhì wǎjiě le。
革命之后，贵族统治瓦解了。
The tyranny of a scoundrelly aristocracy.
Ègùn guìzú de bàozhèng。
恶棍贵族的暴政。
Congreve draws a debauched aristocratic society.
Kānggélǐfū miáohuìle yí gè duòluò de guìzú shèhuì。
康格里夫描绘了一个堕落的贵族社会。
This census is an invaluable resource for tracing family history.
Rénkǒupǔchá shì zhuīchá jiāzúshǐ de yì zhǒng bǎoguì zīyuán。
人口普查是追查家族史的一种宝贵资源。
彝族主要分布在云南、四川、贵州三省。
Yízú zhǔyào fēnbùzài Yúnnán、Sìchuān、Guìzhōu sān shěng。
The Yis are distributed mainly over Yunnan, Sichuan and Guizhou Provinces.
彝族主要分布在云南、四川、贵州三省。
Yízú zhǔyào fēnbùzài Yúnnán、Sìchuān、Guìzhōu sān shěng。
The Yis are distributed mainly over Yunnan, Sichuan and Guizhou Provinces.
在贵州一带，居住着很多侗族人民。
Zài Guìzhōu yídài，jūzhù zhe hěnduō dòngzú rénmín。
Many Dong minority people live in Guizhou, the southwest of China.
他想用这些从贵州买回的傩戏面具装饰书房。
Tā xiǎng yòng zhèxiē cóng Guìzhōu mǎihuí de nuóxì miànjù zhuāngshì shūfáng。
He wants to decorate the study with Nuo opera masks bought in Guizhou province.
黔剧唱腔是用贵州方言演唱的。

Guizhou opera arias are sung in Guizhou dialect.
牂牁这个地方在贵州。

Zhangke is in Guizhou province.

贵重物品
guìzhòngwùpǐn 
valuables
贵重药品
guìzhòngyàopǐn
costly (or expensive) medicines
他送了一份儿贵重的礼物。
Tā sòng le yí fènr guìzhòng de lǐwù。
He gave a valuable present.
回收贵重金属
huíshōu guìzhòngjīnshǔ 
retrieve rare metals
貂皮是一种极贵重的皮毛。
Diāopí shì yì zhǒng jí guìzhòng de pímáo。
Marten is one of the most expensive furs.
这礼物太贵重了，我只能拜辞。
Zhè lǐwù tài guìzhòng le，wǒ zhǐnéng bàicí。
I have to refuse your present because it is too expensive.
这些承典的物品都很贵重，大家一定要小心。
Zhèxiē chéngdiǎn de wùpǐn dōu hěnguìzhòng，dàjiā yídìng yào xiǎoxīn。
These mortgaged items are valuable, please be careful with them.
在封装贵重易碎品时，应有抗震填充物。
Zài fēngzhuāng guìzhòng yìsuìpǐn shí，yīng yǒu kàngzhèn tiánchōngwù。
When packing valuable and fragile items, we should put anti-earthquake filling materials inside.
仓库里存着贵重货物，咱们晚上睡觉要警醒些。
Cāngkù lǐ cúnzhe guìzhòng huòwù，zánmen wǎnshàng shuìjiào yào jǐngxǐng xiē。
We must be alert when we sleep and watch over the valuable goods in the garage.
朋友之间互相馈送的礼物，用不着太过贵重。
Péngyou zhījiān hùxiāng kuìsòng de lǐwù，yòngbùzháo tài guò guìzhòng。
Gifts exchanged between friends need not be too expensive.
那个王冠上嵌镶着贵重的宝石。
Nàge wángguān shàng qiànxiāng zhe guìzhòng de bǎoshí。
A precious diamond is mounted in that crown.
这块寿山石的章料太贵重了，我根本买不起。
Zhèkuài shòushānshí de zhāngliào tài guìzhòng le，wǒ gēnběn mǎibùqǐ。
This piece of serpentine for making seals is too expensive for me to afford.
你的好意我心领了，但这么贵重的礼物我不能接受。
Nǐ de hǎoyì wǒ xīnlǐng le，dàn zhème guìzhòng de lǐwù wǒ bùnéng jiēshòu。
I thank you for you kindness, but I can\'t accept such expensive gifts.
西洋参非常贵重，有益身体健康。
Xīyángsēn fēicháng guìzhòng，yǒuyì shēntǐjiànkāng。
American ginseng is very precious, and is good for one\'s health.
把贵重物品安放好。
Bǎ guìzhòngwùpǐn ānfànghǎo。
Put your valuables in a safe place.
贵重物品应封装邮寄。

a rich prize
贵重的奖品

先生，请勿将贵重物品留在包内，谢谢。

当心别把那个贵重的花瓶打碎了。

我送了母亲一块贵重的金表。
You have deprived Khasinau of a valuable prize.
你们夺走了卡辛努的一件贵重的战利品
There is a cabinet to store your valuables in every room.

每个房间都有一个贮藏柜，用于放置您的贵重物品。
In antiquity all metal was a valuable commodity and rarely wasted.
Zài gǔdài，suǒyǒu de jīnshǔ dōushì guìzhòng wùpǐn，hěn shǎo bèi làngfèi。
在古代，所有的金属都是贵重物品，很少被浪费。
Stolen valuables ranging from jewellery to model trains have been put on display by police.
Jǐngchá zhǎnshìle bèi dào de guìzhòngwùpǐn，cóng zhūbǎo dào móxíng huǒchē dōu yǒu。
警察展示了被盗的贵重物品，从珠宝到模型火车都有。
He kept his insurance in his travel bag with his valuables.
Tā jiāng bǎoxiǎndān yǔ lǚxíngxiāng lǐ de guìzhòng wùpǐn fàngzài yìqǐ。
他将保险单与旅行箱里的贵重物品放在一起。
Put any valuables out of sight, preferably in a strong locker with a secure padlock.
Jiāng rènhé guìzhòng wùpǐn shōucáng qǐlái，zuìhǎo fàngzài yí gè láogù de dài bǎoxiǎn guàsuǒ de jìcúnguì zhōng。
将任何贵重物品收藏起来，最好放在一个牢固的带保险挂锁的寄存柜中。
He handed the precious necklace to Mary.
Tā bǎ guìzhòng de xiàngliàn dìgěi Mǎlì。
他把贵重的项链递给玛丽。
The expensive vases were to be placed on a flat surface.
Zhèxiē guìzhòng de huāpíng yīng bèi fàngzhì dào píngdì shàng。
这些贵重的花瓶应被放置到平地上。
We decided against buying our son an expensive birthday present.
Wǒmen juédìng bù gěi érzi mǎi guìzhòng de shēngrì lǐwù。
我们决定不给儿子买贵重的生日礼物。
Don\'t leave valuables with hotel porters for safe keeping.
Búyào bǎ guìzhòng wùpǐn liúgěi Jiǔdiàn méntóngmen bǎoguǎn。
不要把贵重物品留给酒店门童们保管。
She had hidden away her valuables under the bed.
Tā yǐ bǎ tā de guìzhòng wùpǐn cáng zài chuáng xià。
她已把她的贵重物品藏在床下。
The valuables were kept in a safe.
Guìzhòng wùpǐn bèi fàng zài bǎoxiǎnguì lǐ。
贵重物品被放在保险柜里。
It only takes a moment\'s carelessness to make a present of your valuables to a thief.
Zhǐxū yìshí shūhu，jiù huì bǎ nǐ de guìzhòngwùpǐn sònggěi xiǎotōu。
只需一时疏忽，就会把你的贵重物品送给小偷。
The little boy was swung for breaking an expensive vase.
Nàgè xiǎonánhái yīnwèi dǎsuìle yí gè guìzhòng de huāpíng ér shòudàole chéngfá。
那个小男孩因为打碎了一个贵重的花瓶而受到了惩罚。
The frame was much more valuable than the miror it held.
Nàgè jìngkuàng bǐ jìngzi běnshēn guìzhòng de duō。
那个镜框比镜子本身贵重得多。
Heavy-coated policemen astride noble horses.
Chóngzhuāng de jǐngchá qízhe míngguì de mǎpǐ。
重装的警察骑着名贵的马匹。
您贵姓？
Nín ɡuìxìnɡ?
May I ask your name? or What\'s your name, please?
您贵姓？ —敝姓陈。
Nín ɡuì xìnɡ? —Bì xìnɡ Chén。
May I know your surname? —(My surname is) Chen.
请问您贵姓？
Qǐngwèn nín guìxìng？
Could you please tell me your surname?
此人善于阿附权贵，从来不为百姓办事。
Cǐ rén shànyú ēfù quánguì，cónglái bùwéi bǎixìng bànshì。
He is the kind of official that pander to the rich and famous, and never does anything practical for ordinary people.
贵姓
&quot;您贵姓？&quot;&quot;贱姓赵。&quot;
贵姓。
先生贵姓？
我已将简历函寄给贵校，请查收。
Wǒ yǐ jiāng jiǎnlì hánjì gěi guìxiào，qǐng cháshōu。
I have sent my resume to your university by mail, please accept my submission.
他的儿子在一所私立学校就学，学费很贵。
Tā de érzi zài yìsuǒ sīlì xuéxiào jiùxué，xuéfèi hěnguì。
His son studies in a very expensive private school.
贵校
The director of the school was a dignified white-haired gentleman.
Zhè suǒ xuéxiào de xiàozhǎng shì yí gè wēiyán gāoguì yǒu mǎntóu báifà de shēnshì。
这所学校的校长是一个威严高贵有满头白发的绅士。
The grammar schools were assuredly not intended for the gentry alone.
Zhè suǒ yǔfǎ xuéxiào míngquè biǎoshì búhuì zhǐ zhāo guìzú xuésheng。
这所语法学校明确表示不会只招贵族学生。
The local gentry and professional classes had held aloof for the school had accepted their sons readily enough.
Yīnwèi xuéxiào fēicháng lèyì de jiēshōule tāmen de háizi，suǒyǐ dāngdì de guìzú hé zhíyè jiēcéng dōu bǎochízhe lěngmò chāorán de tàidù。
因为学校非常乐意地接收了他们的孩子，所以当地的贵族和职业阶层都保持着冷漠超然的态度。
周旋于达官贵人之间
zhōuxuán yú dáguānguìrén zhījiān 
move in high society
富贵人家
fùguì rénjiā
a rich and powerful family
你是“贵人多忘事”，哪里还能记得我呀？
Nǐ shì“guìrénduōwàngshì”，nǎlǐ hái néngjìde wǒ ya?
The higher the rank, the worse the memory. How could you remember me?
达官贵人
dáguānguìrén
high officials and noble lords; VIPs
深圳是我的福地，在那里总能得到贵人的帮助。
Shēnzhèn shì wǒ de fúdì，zài nàlǐ zǒng néng dédào guìrén de bāngzhù。
Shenzhen is a lucky place for me, I always get help from others there.
他并不甘心一辈子给富贵人家当清客。
Tā bìngbùgānxīn yíbèizi gěi fùguì rénjiā dāng qīngkè。
He is not willing to be a hanger-on of rich and powerful families.
循例你是要坐牢的，算你幸运，遇到贵人了，可以躲过此劫。
Xúnlì nǐ shì yào zuòláo de，suàn nǐ xìngyùn，yùdào guìrén le，kěyǐ duǒguò cǐjié。
You were suppose to go to prison, according to past experience, but it is very lucky for you that someone helped you to dodge this misfortune.
贵妇人
ɡuìfùrén
a noble lady
我们亲眼看到了贵国人民对中国人民的友好情谊。
Wǒmen qīnyǎn kàndào le guì guó rénmín duì Zhōngguó rénmín de yǒuhǎo qíngyì。
We have seen for ourselves how friendly the people of your country are towards the people of China.
在这个贵妇人身边的那个俊俏小伙子原来是个面首。
Zài zhège guìfùrén shēnbiān de nàge jùnqiào xiǎohuǒzi yuánlái shì gè miànshǒu。
The handsome guy beside the noble lady turned out to be her gigolo.
从生相看他应该是大富大贵之人。
Cóng shēng xiàng kàn tā yīnggāi shì dàfù dàguì zhī rén。
Judging from his appearance, he will make a huge fortune in the future.
成亲王算得上是当时朝延里最显贵的人。
Chéngqīnwáng suàndeshàng shì dāngshí cháoyán lǐ zuì xiǎnguì de rén。
The Duke of Chengqingwang can be counted as the most prestigious person in court at that time.
他通身的罗琦，一看就是个富贵的人。
Tā tōngshēn de luóqí，yí kàn jiùshì gè fùguì de rén。
He wears silk clothes, and can be seen as a wealthy person at first sight.
人贵有自知之明。
Rén guì yǒu zìzhīzhīmíng。
It is important to know one\'s own limitations. or Self-knowledge is wisdom.
尊贵的客人
zūnguì de kèrén 
an honoured guest
他的滑雪板很贵，一般人买不起。
Tā de huáxuěbǎn hěnguì，yìbān rén mǎibùqǐ。
His skis are very expensive. Common people can not afford them.
小刚父亲是朝延里的显贵，好多人都来巴结他。
Xiǎo Gāng fùqīn shì cháoyán lǐ de xiǎnguì，hǎoduōrén dōu lái bājie tā。
Xiao Gang\'s father is a high official in the court, so many people try to flatter him.
男尊女卑是封建社会遗留下来的思想观念，它错误地认为男人比女人高贵。
Nánzūn nǚbēi shì fēngjiànshèhuì yíliú xiàlái de sīxiǎng guānniàn，tā cuòwù de rènwéi nánrén bǐ nǚrén gāoguì。
The ideology of male domination, and female subordination is handed down from feudal society. It wrongly holds that males are nobler than females.
这么宏伟的城堡彰显主人的贵族气派。
Zhème hóngwěi de chéngbǎo zhāngxiǎn zhǔrén de guìzú qìpài。
This magnificent castle demonstrates clearly the royal manner of its owner.
主人引导贵宾们参观了车间。
Zhǔrén yǐndǎo guìbīnmen cānguān le chējiān。
The hosts showed the distinguished guests around the workshops.
这个人总是贵耳贱目，应该改一改了。
Zhègerén zǒngshì guìěr jiànmù，yīnggāi gǎiyigǎi le。
He should give up his bad habit of treasuring what he hears, and belittling what he sees.
祝贵国繁荣昌盛，人民幸福。
Zhù guìguó fánróng chāngshèng，rénmín xìngfú。
We wish your country prosperity and her people happiness.
这是一种鲜为人知的名贵花草。
Zhèshì yìzhǒng xiǎnwéirénzhī de míngguì huācǎo。
This is a precious plant which is little known.

Time is of the essence.
这房子太贵，况且地点也不适中。
Zhè fángzi tài guì，kuàngqiě dìdiǎn yě bú shì zhōng。
The price is too high, and moreover, the house isn\'t in a suitable position.
贵客临门。
Guìkè línmén。 
A distinguished guest came to the house.
我国许多珍贵文物被帝国主义者掠走了。
Wǒ guó xǔduō zhēnguì wénwù bèi dìguózhǔyìzhě lüèzǒu le。
Many of our cultural treasures have been plundered by imperialists.
太贵了，买不起。
Tài guì le，mǎi bu qǐ。
It\'s too expensive. I can\'t afford it.

mínɡɡuì yàocái

名贵的字画
míngguì de zìhuà

pānfù quánɡuì

Diāopí shì yì zhǒng jí guìzhòng de pímáo。

那东西相当贵，没个千儿八百是买不回来的。
Nà dōngxi xiāngdāngguì，méi gè qiānrbābǎi shì mǎi bùhuílái de。
It\'s quite expensive. You can\'t buy it for less than a thousand.
这次上山考察熊猫生活，他抢下了很多珍贵的镜头。

我们亲眼看到了贵国人民对中国人民的友好情谊。
Wǒmen qīnyǎn kàndào le guì guó rénmín duì Zhōngguó rénmín de yǒuhǎo qíngyì。

趋附权贵
qūfù quánguì

热切希望各位提出宝贵意见。
Rèqiè xīwàng gè wèi tíchū bǎoguì yìjiàn。
We earnestly hope that you will give us your valuable criticisms and suggestions.
这东西一定得买，价钱贵一点我也认了。
Zhè dōngxi yídìng děi mǎi，jiàqián guì yìdiǎn wǒ yě rèn le。
I simply must buy it, even if I have to pay a little more for it.
享不尽的荣华富贵
xiǎngbújìn de rónghuáfùguì

我们应邀访问贵国，感到非常荣幸。

shèxià jǐgè zhēnguì de jìngtóu

Shíjiān bǐ shénme dōu bǎoguì。

shífēn bǎoguì

tàshàng guìguó de tǔdì

wánggōngguìzú

物以稀为贵
wùyǐxīwéiguì
When a thing is scarce, it is precious.
这位兄弟，请问您贵庚？
Zhèwèi xiōngdì，qǐngwèn nín guìgēng？
我喜欢这只白玉的手镯，可它太贵了。
Wǒ xǐhuan zhèzhī báiyù de shǒuzhuó，kě tā tài guì le。
I like this jade bracelet very much, but it\'s too expensive.
这礼物太贵重了，我只能拜辞。
Zhè lǐwù tài guìzhòng le，wǒ zhǐnéng bàicí。

用宝珠串成的项链价值昂贵。

碑碣上的文字是研究祖国历史的宝贵资料。

这些写在贝多叶上的经文十分珍贵。
Zhèxiē xiězài bèiduōyè shàng de jīngwén shífēn zhēnguì。

这次拍卖会的主办方会拿出多件珍贵的字画参拍。

珍本残卷十分珍贵，有很高的文物价值。

这件玉器真是难得一见的珍贵藏品呀！

这双长筒靴太贵了，我舍不得买。

这些承典的物品都很贵重，大家一定要小心。

这顿用来招待那些贵宾的翅席价格不菲啊。

The expensive reception dinner for the honored guests featured shark\'s fin.
翅子是招待贵宾时才选用的菜肴。
Chìzi shì zhāodài guìbīn shí cái xuǎnyòng de càiyáo。
Shark fin is only served when dining with honored guests.
杨贵妃的体态充盈，是个唐代的美人。
Yáng guìfēi de tǐtài chōngyíng，shì gè Tángdài de měirén。

广告创意贵在出新，只有出新才能有价值。
Guǎnggào chuàngyì guì zài chūxīn，zhǐyǒu chūxīn cáinéng yǒu jiàzhí。

Chūzū qìchē hěnfāngbiàn jiùshì jiàgé tài guì。

Zhè duǒ huā shì mùguā de chūhuā，fēicháng zhēnguì。

Chūxīn xiàng fó，guì zài chéngxīn。

我辞聘贵公司是因为我觉得自己不能胜任这份工作。

这些珍贵的大器将在国家博物馆展出。

他可是我们的贵客，要好好待承。

她俩用自己的名贵首饰暗中斗富。

此人善于阿附权贵，从来不为百姓办事。

深圳是我的福地，在那里总能得到贵人的帮助。

Qǐngwèn guìgēng duōshǎo？

男尊女卑是封建社会遗留下来的思想观念，它错误地认为男人比女人高贵。
Nánzūn nǚbēi shì fēngjiànshèhuì yíliú xiàlái de sīxiǎng guānniàn，tā cuòwù de rènwéi nánrén bǐ nǚrén gāoguì。
The ideology of male domination, and female subordination is handed down from feudal society. It wrongly holds that males are nobler than females.
他想用这些从贵州买回的傩戏面具装饰书房。
Tā xiǎng yòng zhèxiē cóng Guìzhōu mǎihuí de nuóxì miànjù zhuāngshì shūfáng。
He wants to decorate the study with Nuo opera masks bought in Guizhou province.
她喜欢买超市的盘儿菜，但她的妈妈总说太贵了，不如去菜市场买菜。
Tā xǐhuan mǎi chāoshì de pánr cài，dàn tā de māma zǒng shuō tài guì le，bùrú qù càishìchǎng mǎicài。
She likes to buy ready-to-cook dishes from the supermarket, but her mom always says they are too expensive, she would rather buy them in the food market.
古代的贵族们都地位显赫，妻妾成群。
Gǔdài de guìzúmen dōu dìwèi xiǎnhè，qīqiè chéngqún。
The gentry in ancient times were eminent, with a wife and many concubines.
这么贵的商品，岂知质量竟然这么不好？
Zhème guì de shāngpǐn，qǐzhī zhìliàng jìngrán zhème bùhǎo？
How could I have known that such an expensive commodity was of such poor quality?
他在起居室里摆了一盆富贵竹。
Tā zài qǐjūshì lǐ bǎi le yì pén fùguìzhú。
He laid a pot of bamboo in the living room.
黔剧唱腔是用贵州方言演唱的。
Qiánjù chàngqiāng shì yòng Guìzhōu fāngyán yǎnchàng de。
Guizhou opera arias are sung in Guizhou dialect.
那个王冠上嵌镶着贵重的宝石。
Nàge wángguān shàng qiànxiāng zhe guìzhòng de bǎoshí。

与贵族相比，青衣的身份实在太低。
Yǔ guìzú xiāngbǐ，qīngyī de shēnfèn shízai tài dī。
The status of a housemaid is much too low compared with an aristocrat.
他并不甘心一辈子给富贵人家当清客。
Tā bìngbùgānxīn yíbèizi gěi fùguì rénjiā dāng qīngkè。
He is not willing to be a hanger-on of rich and powerful families.
这件衣服很贵，你这穷鬼根本买不起！
Zhèjiàn yīfu hěnguì，nǐ zhè qióngguǐ gēnběn mǎibùqǐ！
The garment is expensive, paupers like you could never afford it!
这个球台是进口的，很昂贵。

The ancient book is still valuable, although it lacks a few pages.
他希望这辈子能有享不尽的荣华富贵。

He hopes that he can enjoy unlimited wealth and honor.
她的容止优雅得体，不愧是出自贵族名门。

She bears herself elegantly and decently, showing herself to be from a distinguished family.
贵公司能给舍弟这样一份工作，我真是不胜感激。

I am very thankful that your company can provide such a job for my younger brother.
从生相看他应该是大富大贵之人。
Cóng shēng xiàng kàn tā yīnggāi shì dàfù dàguì zhī rén。
Judging from his appearance, he will make a huge fortune in the future.
贵宾们出席了当晚的盛筵。
Guìbīnmen chūxí le dāngwǎn de shèngyàn。
Distinguished guests attended the grand reception that night.

Zhè shì wǒmen de shìyòngpǐn，huānyíng dàjiā shìyòng，bìng tíchū fùguì de yìjiàn hé jiànyì！
This is our trial product, you are welcome to try it and give us your valuable opinions and suggestions!
这种花很娇贵，适应性极弱，种植有些难度。
Zhèzhǒng huā hěnjiāoguì，shìyīngxìng jíruò，zhòngzhí yǒuxiē nándù。
This flower is very fragile and not adaptable, so it\'s a bit difficult to grow it.

The sky-high price of houses forced many buyers to stint on food and clothes.

In researching dialects, he has accumulated a great number of valuable words and expressions.

我父亲在经营贵金属的生意。
Might I ask how old you are?
请问您贵庚？
She acts like a little madam.
她举手投足就像个爱支使人的贵妇。
He behaves as if he is a noble.
他行为处事就像个贵族似的。
That breed of dog is very noble.
那只狗的品种非常名贵。
Princess Diana was not from a noble family.
戴安娜王妃并非来自一个贵族家庭。

博物馆里一些昂贵的藏品失窃了。
He received a precious gift.
他收到了一份珍贵的礼物。
A lot of people start, but precious few finish.
做事贵在有始有终。

小时候父亲送我的手表，是我最珍贵的财富。
Whatever made him buy this expensive car?
他到底为什么要买这么贵的车？
The minerals are precious components.
矿物质是非常珍贵的元素。

他们给了我一张演唱会的贵宾通行证。

我致电以表达我的赞赏，并向贵方总裁致以敬意。
The simple fact is that the price is so high because their rent is very expensive.
纯粹是因为租金太贵，所以他们的售价才会那么高。
I would have bought the car, except that it was too expensive.
要不是太贵，我已经把这车买下了。
Someone told me that she has royal blood.
有人告诉我她有贵族血统。
Be careful not to damage the priceless vase.
当心别把那个贵重的花瓶打碎了。
I gave an expensive gold watch to my mother.
我送了母亲一块贵重的金表。
There is no need to buy the most expensive clothes to make a good impression.
没必要为了留下一个好印象而去买最贵的衣服。
the dentist said that the only solution is to create a bridge but it will be a little expensive.
牙医说唯一的解决办法就是做一个假牙齿桥，但是有点儿贵。
The upper class comprised two interrelated groups, the traditional landed elite and the new rich.
上层社会包括两类利益相关的人群，一种是传统意义上的地主，一种是财富新贵。
Families from these upper classes became the nobility or aristocracy.
这些来自上流社会的家族后来就成了贵族阶级。
New designer clothes are often too pricey for most consumers.
对大多数顾客来说，新款品牌服装太贵了。
Brown, for instance, used to be a simple earth color, but now it\'s perceived as more elegant.
比如说棕色，过去被看作是土地的颜色，现在表示的却是高贵。
It costs a lot to buy a house in this part of the city.
在城市这个地段买房很贵。
Young drivers face costly car insurance.
年轻的司机们要面对昂贵的车险。
At the full price it\'s far too dear.
全价太贵了。
These TV dinners are outrageously priced.
这些冷冻快餐贵得令人发指。

低音提琴的琴弦要远比吉他、电贝司或是小提琴的琴弦贵得多。
In this place they offer weddings that don\'t cost the earth.
在这个地方举行婚礼不贵。

比我们预料得更贵

这件衣服出自一位著名设计师，所以很昂贵。

自然界中可能不存在纯铱,通常和其它贵金属共生于天然合金中。

她穿着昂贵但过时的衣服。

追逐潮流的年轻消费者不再一味追求首饰的昂贵材质。

她那有贵族血统的阿姨把她培养成了公主。

相当多的中世纪贵族常常在佩剑上留下带有自己名字的纹章。

通常情况下，越贵的产品质量越好。

这座宫殿是无比珍贵的历史遗产。

他出身贵族，生活优渥。

你们夺走了卡辛努的一件贵重的战利品

这位高贵的人必须在原始装置上冒险。

国王命令他的随从照顾这位贵宾。
There is a cabinet to store your valuables in every room.

Hànyǔ yīnxì shì gè hěn fùzá de xìtǒng，yìbān rén hěnnán nòngdǒng。
The Chinese phonemic system is complicated, only a few people can fully understand it.

Windows has complicated architecture whereas Linux has simple architecture.
Windows系统的结构复杂，而Linux系统的结构简单。

Zhège shuǐ yǐjīng tōngguò yí gè fùzá de guòlǜ xìtǒng ér biàn de qīngchè le。
这个水已经通过一个复杂的过滤系统而变得清澈了。
他总喜欢把简单的事情复杂化。
Tā zǒng xǐhuan bǎ jiǎndān de shìqing fùzáhuà。
He always likes to complicate simple matters.

The international situation is complex and changeable.
不要把问题复杂化了。
to perplex an issue
使问题复杂化
Don\'t make the issue unnecessarily complicated.
不要将问题复杂化，没有必要。

méi bì yào qiān shè nà me duō rén shǐ àn qíng fù zá huà。
没必要牵涉那么多人使案情复杂化。
His change of job caused unexpected complications for the relationship.
Tā biànhuàn gōngzuò jiāng zhè céng guānxi chūhūyìliào de fùzáhuà le。
他变换工作将这层关系出乎意料地复杂化了。
Her attendance at the party certainly perplexed the fragile situation.
Tā chūxiànzài wǎnhuì shàng wúyí shǐde cuìruò de júmiàn gèngjiā fùzáhuà le。
她出现在晚会上无疑使得脆弱的局面更加复杂化了。
Identification by retinal scanning is complicated by eye movements.
Yǎnqiú yùndòng shǐde tōngguò shìwǎngmó sǎomiáo jìnxíng shēnfènshíbié fùzáhuà le。

氯化钠的原子结构很复杂。

美国文化的构成因素十分复杂。

案情相当复杂。
Ànqíng xiāngdāng fùzá。
The case is quite complicated.
这事太复杂，一时很难裁处。
Zhè shì tài fùzá，yìshí hěn nán cáichǔ。
This is too complicated a matter to be settled right away.
妥善地处置各种复杂情况
tuǒshàn de chǔzhì gè zhǒng fùzá qíngkuàng
handle complex situations aptly
这部小说的情节错综复杂，引人入胜。
Zhèbù xiǎoshuō de qíngjié cuòzōngfùzá，yǐnrénrùshèng。

情况复杂。

故事情节复杂。

This form of superstition has existed for ages and is deeply rooted, so it\'s not so easy to bring about reform.

nénggòu jiàyù fùzá de júshì 
be able to cope with complicated situations

a trouble-shooter

Bié zhǐwàng fùzá wèntí huì yǒu jiǎndān huò quèqiè de dá\'àn。
别指望复杂问题会有简单或确切的答案。
Her attendance at the party certainly perplexed the fragile situation.

This may sound complicated, but it is simplicity itself.
Zhè kěnéng tīng qǐlái yǒudiǎn fùzá，dàn tā běnshēn hěn jiǎndān。
这可能听起来有点复杂，但它本身很简单。

Wǒ jiāng tā lǐngdào gōnggòngqìchē tíngkào de nàgè jiǎoluò。
我将他领到公共汽车停靠的那个角落。
The two ships were anchored aboard one another when the enemy struck.
Dāng dírén gōngjī shí，zhè liǎngsōu chuán pāomáo bìngpái tíngkào zài le yìqǐ。

Jǐ liàng zìxíngchē tíngkào zài shāngdiàn wài。
几辆自行车停靠在商店外。

明天船将在檀香山停靠。

Hādexùn jiāng tā de chuán tíngkào zài xīn fāxiàn de hǎi\'àn páng。

Guǎnggào lǐ de huà néng yǒu duōshǎo kěkàoxìng ne？
How much can we rely on advertisements?
可靠性
Kěkàoxìng
reliability
The latest dispatch proved the credibility of the gossip.
最新的通讯证实了绯闻的可靠性。
It is difficult to document the credibility of the statement.
很难找到材料证明这个声明的可靠性。
When confronted with any evidence, the historian has to establish its reliability.

当遇到证据的时候，历史学家需要确立它的可靠性。
The reliability of supplies has been maintained at a high level.
Gōngjǐ de kěkàoxìng yǐjīng bèi bǎochí zài le yí gè hěn gāo de shuǐpíng。
供给的可靠性已经被保持在了一个很高的水平。
诚实可靠
chéngshí kěkào 
honest and dependable
我们有充分理由相信这消息是可靠的。
Wǒmen yǒu chōngfèn lǐyóu xiāngxìn zhè xiāoxi shì kěkào de。
We have every reason to believe that the news is true.
这个人反复无常，很不可靠。
Zhè gè rén fǎnfùwúcháng，hěn bùkěkào。
This fellow is always chopping and changing; he\'s very unreliable.
绝对可靠
juéduì kěkào
absolutely reliable
你看她这个人可靠吗？
Nǐ kàn tā zhège rén kěkào ma?
Do you think she\'s reliable?
可靠消息
kěkào xiāoxi
reliable information
这个人很可靠。
Zhègerén hěn kěkào。
This person is reliable (or trustworthy).
消息恐不可靠。
Xiāoxi kǒngbùkěkào。
I\'m afraid the information is not reliable.
可靠
kěkào
reliable; dependable; trustworthy
质量可靠的产品总能有畅旺的销路。
Zhìliàng kěkào de chǎnpǐn zǒng néng yǒu chàngwàng de xiāolù。
Quality-reliable products will always sell well.

The company manufactures petrol engines of reliable quality.
这种新的外存设备十分安全可靠。
Zhèzhǒng xīn de wàicún shèbèi shífēn ānquán kěkào。
This new external memory equipment is very safe and reliable.
你的这些小道儿消息都是不可靠的。

她很可靠，表里如一。

此人恐不可靠。
Cǐrén kǒng bù kěkào.

Kěkàoxìng
reliability

数据可靠

zìshì yǒu kàoshān

Liǎngrén zuò de shífēn kàojìn。
The two of them sat quite close together.

Lúnchuán mànmàn de kàojìn mǎtóu。

靠近些。
Kàojìn xiē。
Come closer.
向前靠拢！
Xiànɡ qián kàolǒnɡ!
(word of command) Close ranks!
可靠消息
kěkào xiāoxi
reliable information
这个人很可靠。
Zhègerén hěn kěkào。
This person is reliable (or trustworthy).
消息恐不可靠。
Xiāoxi kǒngbùkěkào。
I\'m afraid the information is not reliable.
这堵墙不太牢靠。
Zhè dǔ qiángbú tài láokào。
This wall is not very strong.
办事牢靠
bànshì láokào
dependable (or reliable) in handling matters
梯子靠这儿比较牢稳。
Tīzi kào zhèr bǐjiào láowěn。
The ladder will be more secure here.
不要只靠少数人冷冷清清地做工作。
Búyào zhǐ kào shǎoshù rén lěnglěngqīngqīng de zuò gōngzuò。
Do not rely on a mere handful of people working in quiet isolation.
我有什么能耐呀，全靠各位撑腰呢！
Wǒ yǒu shénme néngnài ya，quán kào gè wèi chēngyāo ne！
What could I do without you people backing me up?
这马欺生，我一靠近它就尥蹶子。
Zhè mǎ qīshēng，wǒ yí kàojìn tā jiù liàojuézi。
This horse refuses to behave for strangers; he kicks at me whenever I approach him.
这个大工厂是靠一台旧机床起的家。
Zhège dà gōngchǎngshì kào yìtái jiù jīchuángqǐ de jiā。
The big factory has built itself up by starting with an old machine tool.
这几课书我并没弄懂，考试全得靠强记。
Zhè jǐ kè shū wǒ bìngméi nòngdǒng，kǎoshì quán děi kào qiángjì。
I didn\'t understand these lessons, so I had to rely on sheer memorization to pass the exam.
不能光靠傻劲儿，得找窍门。
Bùnéng guāng kào shǎjìnr，děI zhǎo qiàomén。

靠别人施舍过日子
kào biérén shīshě guòrìzi
survive on handouts
六艘万吨货轮可以同时在这个码头停靠。
Liù sōu wàndūn huòlún kěyǐ tóngshí zài zhège mǎtou tíngkào。
Six 10,000-ton freighters can berth at this dock.
投靠亲友
tóukào qīnyǒu

投亲靠友
tóuqīn kàoyǒu 
go and seek refuge with one\'s relatives and friends

wúyīwúkào de gū\'ér

这艘客轮沿途停靠五个码头。
Zhè sōu kèlún yántú tíngkào wǔ gè mǎtou。

yīkào zìjǐ de lìliang

shēnghuó yǒu yīkào

kào xiū xié yíngshēng

靠右走
kào yòu zǒu 
keep to the right

这件事我们就指靠你了。
Zhèjiànshì wǒmen jiù zhǐkào nǐ le。

zìshì yǒu kàoshān 
count on sb.\'s backing
可靠
kěkào
reliable; dependable; trustworthy
依靠
yīkào
rely on; depend on
他们村的人都是靠饲养安哥拉兔致富的。
Tāmen cūn de rén dōushì kào sìyǎng Āngēlātù zhìfù de。

Zhè piàn tiándì háiyào yīkào chēshuǐ lái guàngài。

他这人成事不足败事有余，不能依靠。

人民政府就在城关镇靠西的那个街上。

这些问题不是靠吃吃喝喝就能解决的。

他早已经不上班了，靠吃瓦片儿过日子。

He hasn\'t worked for a long time, but lived on rent.
她失去了工作只能靠吃租生活了。

我都这么大了，怎么还好意思靠家里搭补过日子。

Being so old, how can I still live on the financial support of my family?
他们哥几个都是靠打把式卖艺为生。
Tāmen gē jǐgè dōushì kào dǎbǎshì màiyì wéishēng。

这款新飞机具有流线型的前端，是一架美观的单翼机。
The cannon can be glued to the front of the model airplane.
Zhè méi pàodàn kěyǐ guàzài fēijī móxíng de qiánduān。
这枚炮弹可以挂在飞机模型的前端。
The toe on the club was cracked.
Qiúbàng de qiánduān yǐjīng lièkāi le。
球棒的前端已经裂开了。
Pine tree needles are thin and end in an acute point.
Sōngzhēn fēicháng xì，érqiě qiánduān fēicháng jiān。
松针非常细，而且前端非常尖。
The nose of the rocket heated up on reentry.
Huǒjiàn zài chóngfǎn dàqìcéng shí qiánduān de wēndù shēnggāo。
火箭在重返大气层时前端的温度升高。
Her foot pointed artfully toward tapering toes.
Tā de jiǎo qiǎomiào de shēn xiàng le qiánduān jiān xì de xiézǐ lǐ。
她的脚巧妙地伸向了前端尖细的鞋子里。
Her shoes had acutely pointed toes.
Tā de xiézǐ qiánduān fēicháng jiānr。
她的鞋子前端非常尖儿。
She placed the food on the table in front of them.
Tā bǎ shíwù duānshàng zhuō，bǎizài tāmen miànqián。
她把食物端上桌，摆在他们面前。
A possible disadvantage is that you must pay for it in advance.
Qiánzài de bìduān kěnéng shì nín bìxū tíqián fùkuǎn。
潜在的弊端可能是您必须提前付款。
The child cannot sit up or bend his head forward.
Zhège háizi bù néng duānzuò huòzhě bǎ tā de tóu xiàng qián shēn。
这个孩子不能端坐或者把他的头向前伸。

the southern tip (or end) of the island

熔炼坚强意志。
他的最大特点是意志坚强。
苍松象征坚强。
调集精兵强将，坚决攻下这个课题。
起头他坚决反对，后来才勉强同意了。
坚持自愿原则，不搞强迫。
The resolute but unbroken Germany, grievously wounded but far from destruction, was able to lay the firm foundations for military revival.
Jiānqiángbùqū de Déguórén suīrán yánzhòng shòucuò dàn què yuǎn méiyǒu bèi dǎkuǎ，tāmen réngrán nénggòu wèi jūnshì fùxīng dǎxià jiānshí de jīchǔ。
坚强不屈的德国人虽然严重受挫但却远没有被打垮，他们仍然能够为军事复兴打下坚实的基础。
a man of strong moral fiber
品性坚强的人
hard-bitten soldiers
坚强的战士
steady nerves
坚强的神经
You must be strong to face the days still to come.
你必须坚强地面对接下来的日子。
All the bitter experiences he has had in his life helped him become the strong person he is today.
他曾经所经历的一切苦难都成就了今天的他，使他成为了一个坚强的人。
I can\'t put on a brave face if something bad happens.
如果发生不幸，我不可能假装坚强。
strength of mind/character
充足的信心/坚强的性格
Believers believe, as long as they have Jesus\' words embedded in them, they can stand strong and not be shaken.
信徒们相信，只要牢记基督的教导，他们就能坚强地站起来，不被动摇。
I am strong and you cannot bend my purpose.
我是个坚强的人，你动摇不了我的决心。
Constant hardship and suffering have turned him into a tough man.
持续的艰苦磨难使他变成了坚强的人。
She has a strong will hidden within her fragile body.
她柔弱的外表下是一颗坚强的心灵。
There is no such thing as a great talent without great willpower.
没有坚强的意志力就谈不上有伟大的才华。
The parents hoped that their son would develop into a strong man.
Fùmǔ xīwàng tāmen de érzi huì chéngzhǎng wéi yí gè jiānqiáng de rén。
父母希望他们的儿子会成长为一个坚强的人。
Do not worry, he has a strong and able mind.
Búyòng dānxīn，tā yìzhì jiānqiáng，yǒu tóunǎo。
不用担心，他意志坚强，有头脑。
He thought he would have to help, but she was strong and sure.

他本想应该要提供帮助，但是她很坚强，也很稳妥。
People of moral fiber are difficult to come by.
Pǐnxíng jiānqiáng de rén hěn nán bèi zhànshèng。
品行坚强的人很难被战胜。
Women there had to fight harder to be heard by the government.

我哥哥自认为是很坚强的人，但那天我看见他哭了。

This trip will season even the hardiest traveller.

坚决支持
jiānjué zhīchí 
firmly support; stand firmly by
坚决反对
jiānjué fǎnduì 
resolutely oppose
态度坚决
tàidu jiānjué 
a determined attitude; a firm position
坚决消灭敢于来犯之敌。
Jiānjué xiāomiè ɡǎnyú láifàn zhī dí。

我们坚决打击地痞霸市！
Wǒmen jiānjué dǎjī de pǐbàshì！

这是常委会作出的决定，你要坚决执行。

to hold to a resolution
坚持某项决定

jiānchí xiàqù

chángnián jiānchí tǐyù duànliàn

Tā dài bìng jiānchí gōngzuò。

坚持进步，反对倒退
jiānchí jìnbù，fǎnduì dàotuì
persist in progress and oppose retrogression

However cold it was, he never stopped taking outdoor exercise.
苟能坚持，必将胜利。
Gǒu néng jiānchí，bì jiāng shènglì。
If you can persist, you are sure to win. or Given persistence, victory is certain.
坚持原则
jiānchí yuánzé 
adhere (or stick) to principle
坚持己见
jiānchí jǐjiàn 
hold on to one\'s own views
坚持错误
jiānchí cuòwù 
persist in one\'s errors
作坚持不懈的努力
zuò jiānchíbúxiè de nǔlì 
make unremitting efforts
他坚持锻炼，几年来从不间断。
Tā jiānchí duànliàn，jǐ nián lái cóngbùjiànduàn。
He has kept up physical training for several years without interruption.
他尽管身体不好，仍然坚持工作。
Tā jǐnguǎn shēntǐ bùhǎo，réngrán jiānchí gōngzuò。
Though he\'s not in good health, he still keeps on working.
她的可贵之处在于坚持真理。
Tā de kěguì zhī chù zàiyú jiānchí zhēnlǐ。
Her finest quality lies in upholding the truth.
论理她早可以退休了，可是她仍然坚持工作。
Lùnlǐ tā zǎo kěyǐ tuìxiū le，kěshì tā réngrán jiānchí gōngzuò。
She really ought to have retired long ago, but she\'s still working.
我们必须坚持真理，而真理必须旗帜鲜明。
Wǒmen bìxū jiānchí zhēnlǐ，ér zhēnlǐ bìxū qízhì xiānmíng。
We must firmly uphold the truth, and truth requires a clear-cut stand.
他们坚持科学实验的精神令人钦佩。
Tāmen jiānchí kēxué shíyàn de jīngshén lìng rén qīnpèi。
Their persistence in scientific experiment commands admiration.
任凭江水冷得钻心，工人们仍然坚持下水操作。
Rènpíng jiāngshuǐ lěng de zuānxīn，gōngrénmen réngrán jiānchí xiàshuǐ cāozuò。
The workers still kept on working in the river even though the water was icy cold.
坚持学习，始能不断进步。
Jiānchí xuéxí，shǐ néng búduàn jìnbù。
Steady progress can only be the result of persistent study. or Only persistent study yields steady progress.
顽固地坚持错误立场
wángù de jiānchí cuòwù lìchǎng
stubbornly cling to one\'s wrong position
坚持户外锻炼，寒暑无间
Jiānchí hù wài duànliàn，hánshǔ wújiàn 
keep on doing outdoor exercise all the year round
坚持下去
jiānchí xiàqù
stick it out
坚持真理，修正错误
jiānchí zhēnlǐ，xiūzhèngcuòwù 
uphold the truth and correct one\'s mistakes
刮风也罢，下雪也罢，他都坚持跑步。
Guāfēngyěbà，xiàxuě yěbà，tā dōu jiānchí pǎobù。
He keeps up his jogging whether it\'s blowing or snowing.
她坚持要单独去，我只好依从她了。
Tā jiānchí yào dāndú qù，wǒ zhǐ hǎo yīcóngtā le。
Since she insisted on going alone, I had to comply.
坚持战位
jiānchí zhànwèi 
hold one\'s battle station
他拖着病弱之躯还坚持帮助别人。
Tā tuō zhe bìngruò zhī qū hái jiānchí bāngzhù biérén。
Although he is sick, he still insists on helping others.
他拖着病体坚持给我们上课。
Tā tuō zhe bìngtǐ jiānchí gěi wǒmen shàngkè。
Though ill, he insisted to give us class.
在进行驳论时，要坚持以理服人。
Zài jìnxíng bólùn shí，yào jiānchí yǐlǐ fúrén。
When debating, one must use reasoning to convince others.
重病缠身的他依然坚持工作。
Zhòngbìng chánshēn de tā yīrán jiānchí gōngzuò。
He kept on working despite his serious illness.
医生说这种药比较迟效，让我坚持服用。
Yīshēng shuō zhèzhǒng yào bǐjiào chíxiào，ràng wǒ jiānchí fúyòng。
The doctor said the medicine was slow-acting and suggested that I take it persistently.
法律工作者一定要坚持文明持法。
Fǎlǜ gōngzuòzhě yídìng yào jiānchí wénmíng chífǎ。
Lawyers must  stick to civilized application of the law.
肾脏病人应该坚持淡食。
Shènzàng bìngrén yīnggāi jiānchí dànshí。
Kidney patients should go on a salt-free diet.
在医生的建议下，他开始坚持食用低钠盐。
Zài yīshēng de jiànyì xià，tā kāishǐ jiānchí shíyòng dīnàyán。
Taking the doctor\'s advice, he started to use low-sodium salt.
病后，他坚持食用低糖食品。
Bìng hòu，tā jiānchí shíyòng dītáng shípǐn。
He persisted in eating low-sugar food after the illness.
他常年坚持锻炼，冬练三九，夏练三伏。
Tā chángnián jiānchí duànliàn,dōng liàn sānjiǔ,xià liàn sānfú.
He keeps exercising all year around, even in the hottest days in summer and the coldest days in winter.
只有坚持不断的勾描临画，才可能有所成就。
Zhǐyǒu jiānchí búduàn de gōumiáo línhuà，cái kěnéng yǒusuǒ chéngjiù。
Only by continuously sketching and copying can great achievements be made.
他这人没有恒性，做事情总坚持不下来。
Tā zhè rén méiyǒu héngxìng，zuòshìqing zǒng jiānchí búxiàlái。
He has no perseverance, and can not see things to the end.
他坚持去敬老院照顾那些无儿无女的老人，大家都说他是活雷锋。
Tā jiānchí qù jìnglǎoyuàn zhàogù nàxiē wúér wúnǚ de lǎorén，dàjiā dōu shuō tā shì huóléifēng。
He perseveres in taking care of elderly people without any children. We all regard him as a living Lei Feng.
为了保持体形优美，她多年来一直坚持做健身操。
Wèile bǎochí tǐxíng yōuměi，tā duōniánlái yìzhí jiānchí zuò jiànshēncāo。
In order to keep an elegant figure, she has been doing body-shaping exercises for many years.
疾风吹劲草，越是困难的环境，我们越要坚持。
Jífēng chuī jìncǎo，yuèshì kùnnan de huánjìng，wǒmen yuèyào jiānchí。
Strength of character is tested in a crisis; the harder the environment is, the more determined we are.
若非朋友们患难匡扶，我的公司怎么能坚持得下来呢？
Ruòfēi péngyoumen huànnàn kuāngfú，wǒ de gōngsī zěnme néng jiānchí de xiàlái ne？
If not for the assistance of friends, how could my company have endured the hard times?
老爷子今年已经80了，还是坚持每天去遛早。
Lǎoyézi jīnnián yǐjing bāshí le，háishi jiānchí měitiān qù liùzǎo。
My father is already 80 years old this year, but he persists in taking a walk outside in the morning.
坚持四项基本原则是我国的立国之本。
Jiānchí sì xiàng jīběnyuánzé shì wǒguó de lìguó zhī běn。
Persisting in the four basic principles is the root of building our country.
我坚持自己的职业操守，绝不会为美色所诱惑。
Wǒ jiānchí zìjǐ de zhíyè cāoshǒu，jué búhuì wéi měisè suǒ yòuhuò。
I stick to my professional virtues, and will never be allured by beautiful women.
如果现在不能坚持下去，你岂不是前功尽弃了？
Rúguǒ xiànzài bùnéng jiānchí xiàqù，nǐ qǐbúshì qiángōng-jìnqì le？
Don\'t you waste all your previous efforts if you don\'t stick to it?
他虽屡次受挫，但宿志不改，始终坚持自己的信仰。
Tā suī lǚcì shòucuò，dàn sùzhì bùgǎi，shǐ zhōng jiānchí zìjǐ de xìnyǎng。
Despite continuous setbacks, he didn\'t change his long-cherished ambition, and stuck to his faith.
她反对缠脚，坚持要留天足。
Tā fǎnduì chánjiǎo，jiānchí yào liú tiānzú。
She is an opponent of bound feet and believes that women should not have their feet bound.
由于长期坚持体育锻炼，他看起来鹤发童颜。
Yóuyú chángqī jiānchí tǐyù duànliàn，tā kànqǐlái hèfātóngyán。
Thanks to his persistent physical exercise, he looks healthy, with white hair and a ruddy complexion.
为了减肥，她每天晚上都坚持只喝稀粥而不吃脂肪含量高的食物。
Wèile jiǎnféi，tā měitiān wǎnshàng dōu jiānchí zhǐ hē xīzhōu ér bùchī zhīfáng hánliàng gāo de shíwù。
She persists in having gruel for supper instead of rich food in an attempt to lose weight.
就算再冷的天，姐姐都坚持不穿线裤。
Jiùsuàn zài lěng de tiān，jiějie dōu jiānchí bùchuān xiànkù。
No matter how cold it is, my sister will not wear woolen trousers.
鲍勃写文章时总是坚持做到首尾相顾。
Bàobó xiěwénzhāng shí zǒngshì jiānchí zuòdào shǒuwěi xiānggù。
Bob finds it difficult to be consistent in his writing.
父亲很舍不得张叔叔离开，坚持要去车站相送。
Fùqīn hěn shěbùdé Zhāng shūshu líkāi，jiānchí yào qù chēzhàn xiāngsòng。
My father is reluctant to let Uncle Zhang leave and insists on seeing him off at the train station.
寻找佚文的工作很困难，但我们会坚持做下去。
Xúnzhǎo yìwén de gōngzuò hěn kùnnan，dàn wǒmen huì jiānchí zuò xiàqù。
It\'s hard to collect anecdotes, but we will persist in doing it.
尤为可贵的是，他不畏强权，坚持自己的观点。
Yóuwéi kěguì de shì，tā búwèi qiángquán，jiānchí zìjǐ de guāndiǎn。
What is even more precious is that he is not afraid of larger powers and sticks to his opinions.
为了减肥，姐姐五年来一直在坚持练瑜珈。
Wèile jiǎnféi，jiějie wǔnián lái yìzhí zài jiānchí liàn yújiā。
In order to lose weight, my sister practiced yoga for five years.
鼻窦炎不是什么大病，只要坚持治疗就很容易康复。
Bídòuyán búshì shénme dà bìng，zhǐyào jiānchí zhìliáo jiù hěnróngyì kāngfù。
Paranasal sinus is not a serious disease, and can be cured with systematic treatment.
一些关乎国家经济命脉的行业还是应该坚持国有化。
Yìxiē guānhū guójiā jīngjì mìngmài de hángyè háishi yīnggāi jiānchí guóyǒuhuà。
Those industries that suuport the lifeblood of the country should be nationalized.
他一直坚持用物理疗法治疗中风后遗症。
Tā yìzhí jiānchí yòng wùlǐliáofǎ zhìliáo zhòngfēng hòuyízhèng。
He always uses physical therapy to treat the after-effects of a stroke.
我们要坚持物质文明和精神文明同步发展。
Wǒmen yào jiānchí wùzhì wénmíng hé jīngshén wénmíng tóngbù fāzhǎn。
We must develop material, ideological, and spiritual culture at the same time.
我们一定要坚持到底，不能半途而废。
Wǒmen yídìngyào jiānchídàodǐ，bùnéng bàntú\'érfèi。
We must persevere – we can\'t give up halfway.
不管有多少人反对，他们都坚持原计划。
Bùguǎn yǒu duōshǎorén fǎnduì，tāmendōu jiānchí yuánjìhuà。
It doesn\'t matter how many people disagree, they insist on implementing the original plan.
坚持
jiānchí
maintain
工作很忙，但是她还坚持锻炼。
Gōngzuò hěnmáng，dànshì tā hái jiānchí duànliàn。
She was very busy at work, but she managed to stick to her exercise regime.
坚持到底
jiānchídàodǐ
keep going until the end
我们应该坚持锻炼以增强对疾病的抵抗力。
Wǒmen yīnggāi jiānchíduànliàn yǐ zēngqiáng duì jíbìngde dǐkànglì。
We should take exercise to build up resistance to disease.
不管天气多么寒冷，我们都要坚持锻炼。
Bùguǎn tiānqì duōmehánlěng，wǒmen dōuyào jiānchí duànliàn。
No matter how cold it gets, we must all stick to our exercise routine.
你应该坚持锻炼身体。
Nǐ yīnggāi jiānchí duànliàn shēntǐ.
You should go on taking exercise.
他坚持要我参加。
Tā jiānchí yào wǒ cānjiā.
He insisted that I take part.
系主任一向坚持原则。
Xìzhǔrèn yíxiàng jiānchí yuánzé.
The head of department sticks to his principles.
哪怕有再多的困难，我也要坚持到底。
Nǎpà yǒu zài duō de kùnnán，wǒ yěyào jiānchí dàodǐ.
No matter how many difficulties remain, I will hold fast till the end.
只要坚持锻炼，日久天长就会有效果。
Zhǐyào jiānchí duànliàn，rìjiǔtiāncháng jiù huì yǒu xiàoguǒ.
You just have to keep on with the exercise – you\'ll see the results over time.
她之所以成功，是因为坚持不懈。
Tā zhīsuǒyǐ chénggōng，shì yīnwèi jiānchíbúxiè。
The reason for her success is her unremitting effort.
我一再坚持，妈妈终于无可奈何地同意让我出国读书。
Wǒ yízài jiānchí，māma zhōngyú wúkěnàihé de tóngyì ràng wǒ chūguó dúshū。
I persevered and persevered, and in the end my mother had no alternative but to agree to let me study abroad.
学习非常艰难，但他坚持下来了。
Xuéxí fēicháng jiānnán，dàn tā jiānchíxiàláile。
Studying was arduous, but he persisted.

坚持到最后。
群众的支持，更加坚定了我们的决心。
Their star pitcher was a holdout for six weeks.
Tāmen de míngxīng tóushǒu shì gè jiānchíxíng dàibiǎo，yǐ jiānchí liù gè xīngqī le。
他们的明星投手是个坚持型代表，已坚持六个星期了。
We may diligently observe the lord\'s supper on the first day of the week, diligently preach the gospel, or minister to the saint.
Měi zhōu de dì-yī tiān，wǒmen yào jiānchí zhùfú shèngcān，jiānchí qíqiú fúyīn huòzhě shìfèng shèngzhě。
每周的第一天，我们要坚持祝福圣餐，坚持祈求福音或者侍奉圣者。

sit tight
坐稳；屹然不动；坚持主张
Though dying of cancer, he painted every day.
虽然身患癌症已经奄奄一息，他还是坚持每天画画。
Please, I insist, after you!
请，我坚持让您先走！
Speaking as his doctor, I confirm that my patient can\'t leave the hospital.
作为他的医生，我坚持认为我的病人还不能出院。
I constantly conduct market research to monitor our competitors.
我一直坚持做市场调研，来防范我们的竞争对手。
I insist that you give me another chance.
我坚持要求您再给我一次机会。
She insisted on working late.
她坚持要工作到很晚。
I need vacations, I can\'t stand another normal working day.
我需要休假，一天这样的例行工作也坚持不了了。
But, perhaps should I insist?
但是，我是不是应该坚持一下？
A person with diabetes should follow a low-carbohydrates diet.
糖尿病人应坚持低碳水化合物的饮食习惯。
Her daily run keeps her slim.
她每天坚持跑步，这使她一直保持苗条的身材。
I will keep my end of the negotiation.
我会在谈判中坚持我的底线。
He studies Chinese characters every day without fail.
他每天都坚持不懈地学习汉字。
He keeps up running every day to be fit.
为了保持身材，他每天坚持跑步。
I am very tired and can\'t go on.
我很累，坚持不下去了。
He carried through with the restructuring of the institution.
他坚持进行结构重组。

to persist with sth
执意坚持某事
to persist in doing sth
坚持不懈地做某事
Some experts insist that government land assignments should be forbidden.
一些专家坚持禁止政府分配土地。
This professor insist on viewing a biological association as a system.
这个教授坚持要将生物群丛看作一个系统。
We must insist on strict compliance with the regulations.
我们必须坚持不违反规定。
My wife insists that we hire a babysitter.
我妻子坚持要雇一个保姆。
My brother insists on going on the voyage alone.
我哥哥坚持要独自去航海。
Despite great oppositons, he insists on going through with the deal.
尽管有重重反对，他仍坚持履行合约。
You must stick to the diet they gave you so you are thin enough for your next film.
你必须坚持按他们给的食谱进食，这样你才能在下部电影中足够苗条。
We will stick to our obligation.
我们将坚持我们的诺言。
He insisted on work despite physical discomfort.
尽管身体不舒服，他还是坚持工作。
I must carry on regardless.
不管怎样我都要坚持下去。
The emperor rejects the people\'s hatred of war and persists in making war on his neighbor.
皇帝不理人民对战争的憎恶，坚持对邻国发动战争。
He stayed three months beneath the ruins before the rescue team found him.
他在废墟下坚持了三个月才被救援队找到。
He stayed the whole distance of the race.
他坚持跑完了比赛全程。
You can keep your theory, but you should follow the order of the team leader.
你可以坚持自己的想法，但是要服从我们组长的要求。
He holds a theory that drinking alcohol before sleep can replace brushing his teeth.
他坚持睡前喝酒可以代替刷牙。
Will you confirm your point?
你还坚持你的观点吗？
The defense held on and won the game.
Shǒufāng jiānchíbúxiè，yíngdéle bǐsài。
守方坚持不懈，赢得了比赛。
Job maintained his faith in God through hardships.

坚称
jiān chēng
state insistently; insist
to maintain that...
坚称…
Sophie insisted that nobody told her about the application deadline.
苏菲坚称没人告诉她申请的截止日期。
The defendant insisted that he was innocent.
被告坚称自己是无辜的。
If what you assert is true, then we need to question the information source\'s creditability.
如果你所坚称的是真的，那么我们就必须质疑这消息来源的可信性了。
He maintained his innocence.
Tā jiān chēng，tā shì wúgū de。
他坚称，他是无辜的。
But Ms Kotanchek insists these efforts are paying off.
dàn gāo tián shā jiān chēng，zhèxiē nǔlì shì zhídé de。
但高恬莎坚称，这些努力是值得的。
The hard outer shell of sea urchins are commonly called tests.
Hǎidǎn de jiānyìng wàiké tōngcháng bèi chēngwéi jiǎqiào。
海胆的坚硬外壳通常被称为甲壳。
改革必须坚持到底，不能半途而废。
Gǎigé bìxū jiānchídàodǐ，bùnéng bàntú\'érfèi。
Reforms must be carried through to the end and not abandoned halfway.
他看见没有人帮腔，也就不再坚持了。
Tā kànjiàn méiyǒu rén bāngqiāng，yě jiù búzài jiānchí le。
When he saw nobody supporting him, he no longer insisted.
坚强不屈
jiānqiángbùqū 
iron-willed and unyielding
干部坚持查铺制度。
Gànbùjiānchí chápù zhìdù。
The officers make it a regular practice to go the rounds of the men\'s beds at night.
常年坚持体育锻炼
chángnián jiānchí tǐyù duànliàn 
persist in physical training all the year round
他那坚强的毅力使人吃惊。
Tā nà jiānqiáng de yìlì shǐ rén chījīng。
His will power is amazing.
大凡坚持锻炼的，身体抵抗力都比较强。
Dàfán jiānchí duànliàn de，shēntǐ dǐkànglì dōu bǐjiào qiáng。
Generally those who exercise regularly have high resistance to disease.
他带病坚持工作。
Tā dài bìng jiānchí gōngzuò。
He went on working in spite of his illness.
坚持进步，反对倒退
jiānchí jìnbù，fǎnduì dàotuì
persist in progress and oppose retrogression
不管天多么冷，他都坚持户外锻炼。
Bùguǎn tiān duōme lěng，tā dōu jiānchí hùwài duànliàn。
However cold it was, he never stopped taking outdoor exercise.
坚守岗位
jiānshǒu gǎngwèi 
stand fast at one\'s post; stick to one\'s guns
攻坚部队
gōngjiān bùduì
assault troops
苟能坚持，必将胜利。
Gǒu néng jiānchí，bì jiāng shènglì。
If you can persist, you are sure to win. or Given persistence, victory is certain.
坚强的后盾
jiānqiáng de hòudùn
powerful backing
他既如此坚决，我也不便多说。
Tā jì rúcǐ jiānjué，wǒ yě búbiàn duō shuō。
Since he is so determined, I consider it wise not to say any more.
坚冰
jiānbīnɡ 
solid ice; hard ice
身残志坚
shēn cán zhì jiān 
broken in body but firm in spirit
坚拒
jiān jù 
flatly refuse
坚称
jiān chēng
state insistently; insist

jiānbùkěcuī de bǎolěi 
an indestructible bulwark
坚持原则
jiānchí yuánzé

坚持己见
jiānchí jǐjiàn 
hold on to one\'s own views
坚持错误
jiānchí cuòwù 
persist in one\'s errors

zuò jiānchíbúxiè de nǔlì
