jiāndìng de lìchǎng
a firm stand
坚定的意志
jiāndìng de yìzhì 
constancy of purpose
坚定了攀登科学技术新高峰的决心
jiāndìng le pāndēngkēxué jìshù xīn gāofēng de juéxīn 
strengthen one\'s resolve to scale new heights of science and technology
坚定不移的信念
jiāndìngbùyí de xìnniàn 
an impregnable belief; an unshakable faith
坚固耐用
jiānɡù nàiyònɡ 
sturdy and durable
坚固的家具
jiāngù de jiājù 
solid furniture
坚决支持
jiānjué zhīchí 
firmly support; stand firmly by
坚决反对
jiānjué fǎnduì 
resolutely oppose
态度坚决
tàidu jiānjué 
a determined attitude; a firm position
坚苦卓绝的斗争
jiānkǔzhuójué de dòuzhēng
an extremely hard and bitter struggle; a most arduous struggle
坚苦卓绝的战斗
jiānkǔzhuójué de zhàndòu
a hard-fought battle
耐日光坚牢度
nài rìguāngjiānláodù 
fastness to sunlight; sunfastness
耐洗坚牢度
nài xǐ jiānláodù 
washfastness
坚强的意志
jiānqiáng de yìzhì 
strong will
坚强的领导
jiānqiáng de lǐngdǎo 
firm leadership
一个性格坚强的人
yígè xìnggé jiānqiáng de rén 
a person of strong character
运动员在比赛中表现出坚韧的斗志。
Yùndòngyuán zài bǐsài zhōng biǎoxiàn chū jiānrèn de dòuzhì。
The athletes displayed great tenacity throughout the contest.
坚韧不拔的革命精神
jiānrènbùbá de gémìngjīngshén 
indomitable revolutionary spirit
坚韧不拔的毅力
jiānrènbùbá de yìlì 
an inflexible will
他做的家具相当坚实。
Tā zuò de jiājù xiāngdāngjiānshí。
The furniture he made is quite sturdy.
坚实的基础
jiānshí de jīchǔ 
a solid foundation
坚实的年轻人
jiānshí de niánqīngrén 
a robust young man

jiānshǒu zhèndì

他们坚信一定能获得胜利。
Tāmen jiānxìn yídìngnénghuòdé shènglì。
They are fully confident that they will win.
坚硬的岩石
jiānyìng de yánshí 
solid rock
他坚持锻炼，几年来从不间断。
Tā jiānchí duànliàn，jǐ nián lái cóngbùjiànduàn。
He has kept up physical training for several years without interruption.
他尽管身体不好，仍然坚持工作。
Tā jǐnguǎn shēntǐ bùhǎo，réngrán jiānchí gōngzuò。
Though he\'s not in good health, he still keeps on working.
坚冰已经打破，航道已经开通。
Jiān bīng yǐjing dǎpò，hángdào yǐjing kāitōng。
The ice has been broken and the river route is open.
她的可贵之处在于坚持真理。
Tā de kěguì zhī chù zàiyú jiānchí zhēnlǐ。
Her finest quality lies in upholding the truth.
坚决消灭敢于来犯之敌。
Jiānjué xiāomiè ɡǎnyú láifàn zhī dí。
Resolutely wipe out any enemy that dares to invade our territory.
立场坚定
lìchǎngjiāndìng
be steadfast in one\'s stand; take a firm stand
论理她早可以退休了，可是她仍然坚持工作。
Lùnlǐ tā zǎo kěyǐ tuìxiū le，kěshì tā réngrán jiānchí gōngzuò。
She really ought to have retired long ago, but she\'s still working.
我们必须坚持真理，而真理必须旗帜鲜明。
Wǒmen bìxū jiānchí zhēnlǐ，ér zhēnlǐ bìxū qízhì xiānmíng。
We must firmly uphold the truth, and truth requires a clear-cut stand.
革命者坚贞不屈的气节
gémìngzhě jiānzhēnbùqū de qìjié
the unyielding integrity of a revolutionary
在艰苦环境中工作，经过千锤百炼，他意志越来越坚强了。
Zài jiānkǔ huánjìng zhōng gōngzuò，jīngguò qiānchuíbǎiliàn，tā yìzhì yuèláiyuè jiānqiáng le。
Toughened by working under difficult conditions, his will-power became stronger.
他们坚持科学实验的精神令人钦佩。
Tāmen jiānchí kēxué shíyàn de jīngshén lìng rén qīnpèi。
Their persistence in scientific experiment commands admiration.
坚果的仁儿多半可以吃。
Jiānguǒ de rénr duōbàn kěyǐ chī。
The kernel of a nut is usually eatable.
任凭江水冷得钻心，工人们仍然坚持下水操作。
Rènpíng jiāngshuǐ lěng de zuānxīn，gōngrénmen réngrán jiānchí xiàshuǐ cāozuò。
The workers still kept on working in the river even though the water was icy cold.
他虽然遇到许多挫折，可是意志仍旧那样坚强。
Tā suīrán yùdào xǔduō cuòzhé，kěshì yìzhì réngjiù nàyàng jiānqiáng。
His determination remains as strong as ever despite all the setbacks he has encountered.
神经坚强
shénjīng jiānqiáng
have strong nerves; have iron nerves
坚守生产岗位
jiānshǒu shēngchǎn gǎngwèi
stick to one\'s post on the production front
他觉得他的队伍实力坚强，声势浩大。
Tā jué de tā de duìwu shílì jiānqiáng，shēngshì hàodà。
He was confident of the unyielding strength and formidable superiority of his troops.
坚持学习，始能不断进步。
Jiānchí xuéxí，shǐ néng búduàn jìnbù。
Steady progress can only be the result of persistent study. or Only persistent study yields steady progress.
坚硬是金刚钻的特性。
Jiānyìngshì jīngāngzuàn de tèxìng。
Hardness is a property of diamonds.
顽固地坚持错误立场
wángù de jiānchí cuòwù lìchǎng
stubbornly cling to one\'s wrong position
坚持户外锻炼，寒暑无间

keep on doing outdoor exercise all the year round
坚持下去
jiānchí xiàqù
stick it out
坚定的信念
jiāndìng de xìnniàn
a firm conviction
坚持真理，修正错误
jiānchí zhēnlǐ，xiūzhèngcuòwù 
uphold the truth and correct one\'s mistakes
刮风也罢，下雪也罢，他都坚持跑步。
Guāfēngyěbà，xiàxuě yěbà，tā dōu jiānchí pǎobù。
He keeps up his jogging whether it\'s blowing or snowing.
她坚持要单独去，我只好依从她了。
Tā jiānchí yào dāndú qù，wǒ zhǐ hǎo yīcóngtā le。
Since she insisted on going alone, I had to comply.
坚持战位
jiānchí zhànwèi 
hold one\'s battle station

zhì jiān rú gāng

shèhuìzhōngjiān

Such products tend to be expensive.
坚不可摧
jiānbùkěcuī
indestructible; impregnable; indomitable

gōngjiān

jiānzhēn

Wǒmen jiānjué dǎjī de pǐbàshì！

Tā bǎizhébùhuí de jiānqiáng yìzhì zhídé wǒmen xuéxí。

我拜服于他的勇气和坚强。
Wǒ bàifúyú tā de yǒngqì hé jiānqiáng。
I admire his courage and strong character.
周恩来曾会见班禅额尔德尼·确吉坚赞。
Zhōu Ēnlái céng huìjiàn bānchán Éěrdéní·Quèjíjiānzàn。
Premier Zhou Enlai once met Panchen Erdeni Chosgyi Gyantsen.
逢年过节，那些边防军依然坚守岗位。
Féngnián guòjié，nàxiē biānfángjūn yīrán jiānshǒu gǎngwèi。
The frontier guards stick to their posts even during holidays.
他拖着病弱之躯还坚持帮助别人。
Tā tuō zhe bìngruò zhī qū hái jiānchí bāngzhù biérén。
Although he is sick, he still insists on helping others.
他拖着病体坚持给我们上课。
Tā tuō zhe bìngtǐ jiānchí gěi wǒmen shàngkè。
Though ill, he insisted to give us class.
在进行驳论时，要坚持以理服人。
Zài jìnxíng bólùn shí，yào jiānchí yǐlǐ fúrén。
When debating, one must use reasoning to convince others.
重病缠身的他依然坚持工作。
Zhòngbìng chánshēn de tā yīrán jiānchí gōngzuò。
He kept on working despite his serious illness.
这是常委会作出的决定，你要坚决执行。
Zhè shì chángwěihuì zuòchū de juédìng，nǐ yào jiānjué zhíxíng。
This has been decided by the standing committee. You should carry it out without any hesitation.
众臣僚坚决反对再次增加百姓的赋税。
Zhòngchénliáo jiānjué fǎnduì zàicì zēngjiā bǎixìng de fùshuì。
All court officials firmly opposed an additional increase in taxes.
医生说这种药比较迟效，让我坚持服用。
Yīshēng shuō zhèzhǒng yào bǐjiào chíxiào，ràng wǒ jiānchí fúyòng。
The doctor said the medicine was slow-acting and suggested that I take it persistently.
法律工作者一定要坚持文明持法。
Fǎlǜ gōngzuòzhě yídìng yào jiānchí wénmíng chífǎ。
Lawyers must  stick to civilized application of the law.
遭逢大故，他变得坚强了。
Zāoféng dàgù，tā biàn de jiānqiáng le。
He developed a strong character after his parents\' death.
肾脏病人应该坚持淡食。
Shènzàng bìngrén yīnggāi jiānchí dànshí。
Kidney patients should go on a salt-free diet.
在医生的建议下，他开始坚持食用低钠盐。
Zài yīshēng de jiànyì xià，tā kāishǐ jiānchí shíyòng dīnàyán。
Taking the doctor\'s advice, he started to use low-sodium salt.
病后，他坚持食用低糖食品。
Bìng hòu，tā jiānchí shíyòng dītáng shípǐn。
He persisted in eating low-sugar food after the illness.
他常年坚持锻炼，冬练三九，夏练三伏。
Tā chángnián jiānchí duànliàn,dōng liàn sānjiǔ,xià liàn sānfú.
He keeps exercising all year around, even in the hottest days in summer and the coldest days in winter.
这些都是豆猪，坚决不能卖杀。
Zhèxiē dōushì dòuzhū，jiānjué bùnéng mài shā。
These pigs have bean-sized cysts inside their bodies, so they cannot be sold.
我们要坚决扑灭这些犯罪分子的毒焰。
Wǒmen yào jiānjué pūmiè zhèxiē fànzuìfènzǐ de dúyàn。
We have to be determined to reduce the criminals\' aggressiveness.
你要摆脱这种情绪的恶性循环，做一个坚强乐观的人。
Nǐ yào bǎituō zhèzhǒng qíngxù de èxìng xúnhuán，zuò yígè jiānqiáng lèguān de rén。
You should get yourself out of this vicious circle of emotions and become strong and optimistic.
小明坚信没有什么仙家法旨，并劝奶奶也不要相信。
Xiǎo Míng jiānxìn méiyǒu shénme xiānjiā fǎzhǐ，bìng quàn nǎinai yě búyào xiāngxìn。
Xiao Ming doesn’t believe in the power of Buddha and tries to dissuade his grandma from that belief.
只有坚强和努力才是疗救苦难的诺亚方舟。
Zhǐyǒu jiānqiáng hé nǔlì cáishì liáo jiù kǔnàn de nuòyà fāngzhōu。
Strong will and hard work are like a Noah\'s Ark which saves people from their sufferings.
为了坚决打击偷渡犯罪，警方建立了严密的海上封锁线。
Wèile jiānjué dǎjī tōudù fànzuì，jǐngfāng jiànlì le yánmì de hǎishàng fēngsuǒ xiàn。
In order to strike a blow at the smugglers, the police established a naval blockade.
只有坚持不断的勾描临画，才可能有所成就。
Zhǐyǒu jiānchí búduàn de gōumiáo línhuà，cái kěnéng yǒusuǒ chéngjiù。
Only by continuously sketching and copying can great achievements be made.
这座孤城估计也坚守不了多久了。
Zhèzuò gūchéng gūjì yě jiānshǒu bùliǎo duōjiǔ le。
This isolated city may not remain for too long.
他这人没有恒性，做事情总坚持不下来。
Tā zhè rén méiyǒu héngxìng，zuòshìqing zǒng jiānchí búxiàlái。
He has no perseverance, and can not see things to the end.
家里人坚决不同意他娶一个后婚做媳妇。
Jiā lǐ rén jiānjué bùtóngyì tā qǔ yígè hòuhūn zuò xífù。
His family firmly disapproved of his marrying a digamous wife.
过节时爸爸收到了别人送的坚果，其中有很多胡桃。
Guòjié shí bàba shōudào le biérén sòng de jiānguǒ，qí zhōng yǒu hěnduō hútáo。
On the festival father received many nuts, including walnuts.
花岗石多数用于外墙装修，很坚固耐用。
Huāgǎngshí duōshù yòngyú wàiqiáng zhuāngxiū，hěnjiāngù nàiyòng。
Granite is mainly used in decoration of exterior walls. It is very stout and enduring.
认定了这条路就要坚定地走下去，遇到什么艰难险阻也绝不回还。
Rèndìng le zhètiáo lù jiùyào jiāndìng de zǒu xiàqù，yùdào shénme jiānnán xiǎnzǔ yě juébùhuíhuán。
Once you have decided the way to go, you should move forward without hesitation. Whatever hardship you may be confronted with, you should never return to the starting point.
他坚持去敬老院照顾那些无儿无女的老人，大家都说他是活雷锋。
Tā jiānchí qù jìnglǎoyuàn zhàogù nàxiē wúér wúnǚ de lǎorén，dàjiā dōu shuō tā shì huóléifēng。
He perseveres in taking care of elderly people without any children. We all regard him as a living Lei Feng.
疾风劲草，越是危难时刻，我们越需要坚强。
Jífēng jìncǎo，yuè shì wēinàn shíkè，wǒmen yuè xūyào jiānqiáng。
The strength of character is tested in a crisis. The more difficult the situation is, the more brave we should be.
我们要坚决打击假冒伪劣产品，保护消费者权益。
Wǒmen yào jiānjué dǎjī jiǎmào wěiliè chǎnpǐn，bǎohù xiāofèizhě quányì。
We are determined to fight against counterfeit goods to protect consumers\' rights.
我们要及时坚壁以防敌人侵入。
Wǒmen yào jíshí jiānbì yǐ fáng dírén qīnrù。
We should enhance our defenses to keep off the invading enemy.
我们要把粮食都坚壁起来，绝不能让粮食落在敌人手里。
Wǒmen yào bǎ liángshí dōu jiānbì qǐlái，jué bùnéng ràng liángshí luòzài dírén shǒulǐ。
We shall place food in a cache to prevent  the enemy seizing it.
我们要打破国际贸易坚冰，争取贸易平等。
Wǒmen yào dǎpò guójì màoyì jiānbīng，zhēngqǔ màoyì píngděng。
International trade barriers should be removed to ensure equality between any two parties involved.
拥有了坚甲利兵，我们就胜利了一半。
Yōngyǒu le jiānjiǎ lìbīng，wǒmen jiù shènglì le yíbàn。
Once equipped with strong armor and sharp weapons, we will have won half the battle.
越王勾践十年坚苦，终于洗刷了耻辱。
Yuèwáng Gōujiàn shí nián jiānkǔ，zhōng yú xǐshuā le chǐrǔ。
Gou Jian, the King of Yue, worked steadfastly and assiduously for ten years, and then finally took his vengeance.
虽然已经70岁了，但是他依然身材坚俉。
Suīrán yǐjing qīshísuì le，dànshì tā yīrán shēncái jiānwù。
He is still in good condition, even though he is already seventy years old.
春节期间菜价一直坚俉，实在不是好事情。
Chūnjié qījiān càijià yìzhí jiānwù，shízai búshì hǎo shìqing。
The price of food stayed high all through Spring Festival, which is by no means good news.
为了保持体形优美，她多年来一直坚持做健身操。
Wèile bǎochí tǐxíng yōuměi，tā duōniánlái yìzhí jiānchí zuò jiànshēncāo。
In order to keep an elegant figure, she has been doing body-shaping exercises for many years.
疾风吹劲草，越是困难的环境，我们越要坚持。
Jífēng chuī jìncǎo，yuèshì kùnnan de huánjìng，wǒmen yuèyào jiānchí。
Strength of character is tested in a crisis; the harder the environment is, the more determined we are.
苦行僧都有着坚韧的意志。
Kǔxíngsēng dōu yǒu zhe jiānrèn de yìzhì。
Ascetic monks all have tough wills.
若非朋友们患难匡扶，我的公司怎么能坚持得下来呢？
Ruòfēi péngyoumen huànnàn kuāngfú，wǒ de gōngsī zěnme néng jiānchí de xiàlái ne？
If not for the assistance of friends, how could my company have endured the hard times?
他坚信这门艺术自有来者承继。
Tā jiānxìn zhè mén yìshù zìyǒu láizhě chéngjì。
He is sure that future generations will inherit the art.
老爷子今年已经80了，还是坚持每天去遛早。
Lǎoyézi jīnnián yǐjing bāshí le，háishi jiānchí měitiān qù liùzǎo。
My father is already 80 years old this year, but he persists in taking a walk outside in the morning.
坚持四项基本原则是我国的立国之本。
Jiānchí sì xiàng jīběnyuánzé shì wǒguó de lìguó zhī běn。
Persisting in the four basic principles is the root of building our country.
以上所提到的两者我们都要坚决反对。
Yǐshàng suǒ tídào de liǎngzhě wǒmen dōuyào jiānjué fǎnduì。
We should set ourselves against the above-mentioned two opinions.
我坚持自己的职业操守，绝不会为美色所诱惑。
Wǒ jiānchí zìjǐ de zhíyè cāoshǒu，jué búhuì wéi měisè suǒ yòuhuò。
I stick to my professional virtues, and will never be allured by beautiful women.
这是一支靡坚不摧的王牌军队。
Zhè shì yìzhī míjiān bùcuī de wángpái jūnduì。
This is a perfect victory army.
他只要一拿定主意，就会像盘石般坚定不移。
Tā zhǐyào yì nádìngzhǔyì，jiùhuì xiàng pánshí bān jiāndìng bùyí。
Once he makes up his mind, he will stick to it firmly as a rock.
如果现在不能坚持下去，你岂不是前功尽弃了？
Rúguǒ xiànzài bùnéng jiānchí xiàqù，nǐ qǐbúshì qiángōng-jìnqì le？
Don\'t you waste all your previous efforts if you don\'t stick to it?
你要培养自己坚强的意志，不要成为弱者。
Nǐ yào péiyǎng zìjǐ jiānqiáng de yìzhì，bú yào chéngwéi ruòzhě。
You should cultivate yourself to be strong-minded. Don\'t become a weak person.
这座石桥已经有上百年的历史了，至今依然坚固。
Zhèzuò shíqiáo yǐjing yǒu shàngbǎi nián de lìshǐ le，zhìjīn yīrán jiāngù。
This stone bridge has a history of a hundred odd years, and is still secure today.
他虽屡次受挫，但宿志不改，始终坚持自己的信仰。
Tā suī lǚcì shòucuò，dàn sùzhì bùgǎi，shǐ zhōng jiānchí zìjǐ de xìnyǎng。

她反对缠脚，坚持要留天足。

She is an opponent of bound feet and believes that women should not have their feet bound.
我正在减肥，坚决不吃甜品。
Wǒ zhèngzài jiǎnféi，jiānjué bùchī tiánpǐn。
I\'m on a diet, so I don\'t eat desserts.
由于长期坚持体育锻炼，他看起来鹤发童颜。
Yóuyú chángqī jiānchí tǐyù duànliàn，tā kànqǐlái hèfātóngyán。
Thanks to his persistent physical exercise, he looks healthy, with white hair and a ruddy complexion.
我们要争取人权，坚决反对威权主义。

We should struggle for human rights, and oppose hegemony.

有效防治污染必须坚决消灭污染源。

Wèile jiǎnféi，tā měitiān wǎnshàng dōu jiānchí zhǐ hē xīzhōu ér bùchī zhīfáng hánliàng gāo de shíwù。
She persists in having gruel for supper instead of rich food in an attempt to lose weight.
必须修筑围堤，坚决防止污水下泄。

We must build banks to prevent the flood from flowing downward.
就算再冷的天，姐姐都坚持不穿线裤。

No matter how cold it is, my sister will not wear woolen trousers.
鲍勃写文章时总是坚持做到首尾相顾。

Bob finds it difficult to be consistent in his writing.

她一向心性坚强，任何困难都打不倒他。

[fig] 坚持某事

to be stung by one\'s conscience
受到良心的谴责
a stricken conscience
感到良心责备的
the voice of one\'s conscience
良心的呼声；心声
the worm of conscience
良心的谴责；隐痛
in all {or} good conscience
[frm] 凭良心
We can not make a fortune at the expense of morality.
我们不能昧着良心挣钱。
I urged them to listen to the voice of their individual conscience.
Wǒ ràng tāmen qù tīngtīng zìjǐ liángxīn de shēngyīn。
我让他们去听听自己良心的声音。
He decided that as a matter of conscience he had to speak for those people.
Cóng liángxīn jiǎodù chūfā， tā juédìng bìxū tì nàxiē rén shuōhuà。
从良心角度出发，他决定必须替那些人说话。
Often it is the still small voice which commands attention.
Yǐnqǐ wǒmen zhùyì de wǎngwǎng shì liángxīn de hūhuàn。
引起我们注意的往往是良心的呼唤。
Getting it off his conscience gave him some ease.
Liángxīn shàng de fùdān bèi jiěchú，zhè ràng tā sōng le yì kǒu qì。
良心上的负担被解除，这让他松了一口气。
The thought of her unhappiness pricked his conscience.
Yì xiǎngdào tā de yōuchóu，tā de liángxīn jiù gǎnjué xiàng shòudào zhēnzhā yíyàng。
一想到她的忧愁，他的良心就感觉像受到针扎一样。
The news eased my conscience.
Zhèxiē xiāoxi shǐ wǒ gǎndào liángxīn shāo ān。
这些消息使我感到良心稍安。
His conscience reproached him with the equivocal character of the union into which he had forced his son.
Tā yīn qiángpò zìjǐ érzi cānjiā xìngzhì kěyí de liánméng ér zāoshòu dào liángxīn de qiǎnzé。
他因强迫自己儿子参加性质可疑的联盟而遭受到良心的谴责。
My conscience told me to turn around before I made a mistake.
Wǒ de liángxīn gàosu wǒ，huítóushì\'àn。
我的良心告诉我，回头是岸。
He needed a salve for his conscience.
Tā xūyào liángxīnfāxiàn。
他需要良心发现。
Candidly, I think she doesn\'t have a conscience.
Tǎnbái shuō，wǒ rènwéi tā méi liángxīn。
坦白说，我认为她没良心。
to have a kind heart
有颗善良的心
She is so kind and warmhearted that everybody likes her.
她善良又热心，大家都很喜欢她。

一个高贵、心地善良的人，他对所有的人种抱有同情心。
This job asks a lot of patience and skill.

这份工作要求申请人具有很强的耐心和良好的技能。
This actor is famous not only for his talent but also for his kindness.
这位演员很出名，不仅因为演技好，而且因为他心地善良。
He is a man of conscience and compassion.
Tā shì yígè yǒu liángzhī hé tóngqíngxīn de rén。
他是一个有良知和同情心的人。
She has her heart in the right place.
Tā xīndì shànliáng。
她心地善良。

约翰是个心地善良的好小伙。
She is very kind at heart.
Tā xīndì hěn shànliáng。
她心地很善良。
Well-mannered pets need friendly homes.
举止良好的宠物需要能够悉心照料它们的主人。
The long-term results of cardiac transplantation are now excellent.
Xīnzàng yízhí de chángqī jiéguǒ xiànzài shì liánghǎo de。
心脏移植的长期结果现在是良好的。
重返故乡后，他感受良多。
Chóngfǎn gùxiāng hòu，tā gǎnshòuliángduō。
His return home left a deep impression on him.
良图。
to have designs on sb/sth
对某人/某事抱不良企图
Our enemies have designs against our defense systems.
Dírén duì wǒmen de fángyù xìtǒng yǒu bùliáng qǐtú。
敌人对我们的防御系统有不良企图。
He had designs against my life and honour.
Tā duì wǒ de shēngmìng hé róngyù yǒu bùliáng de qǐtú。
他对我的生命和荣誉有不良的企图。
Good intentions are not enough.
Jǐnyǒu liánghǎo de yìtú shì bú gòu de。
仅有良好的意图是不够的。
变沙漠为良田
biàn shāmò wéi liángtián 
turn the desert into arable land
昔日荒坡，今日良田。
Xīrì huānɡpō, jīnrì liánɡtián。 
The once barren hillsides are now good farmland.
良田
良田万顷。
沙漠变为良田
严禁挤占耕地﹑毁坏良田。
良田被毁令人痛心。
洪水吞没了良田。
泥石流淹埋了大片良田。
上千亩良田被洪水淹没。
They are looking for a good plot of land to grow potatoes.
他们想找一小块儿良田准备种土豆。
善良的人们
shànliáng de rénmen
good and honest people; people of goodwill
心地善良
xīndì shànliáng
kind-hearted
她心地善良，从来没有恶念。
Tā xīndì shànliáng，cónglái méiyǒu èniàn。
She is a kind girl at heart and never has a single evil intention.
他性格急暴但心地善良，是个大好人。
Tā xìnggé jíbào dàn xīndì shànliáng，shì gè dàhǎorén。
Although short-tempered, he is a good person who is full of kindness.
老大妈心地太善良了，让骗子有了可乘之机。
Lǎodàmā xīndì tài shànliáng le，ràng piànzi yǒu le kěchéng zhī jī。
Aunty is too kindhearted for the cheater to have a chance.
前世的你，一定是个善良的人。
Qiánshì de nǐ，yídìng shì gè shànliáng de rén。
You must have been kind-hearted in your previous incarnation.
善良的老夫妇将那个流浪儿收为义子。
Shànliáng de lǎofūfù jiāng nàge liúlàngér shōuwéi yìzǐ。
The kind-hearted old couple adopted the street urchin to be their adoptive son.
老婆婆像菩萨一样善良。
Lǎopópó xiàng púsà yíyàng shànliáng.
The old lady is as kind as a saint.
我们要善于从古代贤哲身上学习他们的优良品德。
Wǒmen yào shànyú cóng gǔdài xiánzhé shēnshàng xuéxí tāmen de yōuliáng pǐndé。
We must be good at learning from the virtues of past sages.

素性善良。

有一个非常善良的意大利年轻女孩来照顾我。
he was the kindest, most considerate man you could ever meet.
Tā shì nǐ néng yùdào de zuì shànliáng、zuì tǐtiē de rén。
他是你能遇到的最善良、最体贴的人。
He was kind and courteous to me, not a bit like his brother.
Tā duì wǒ shànliáng yǒulǐ，yìdiǎn yě bú xiàng tā dìdi。
他对我善良有礼，一点也不像他弟弟。
`I thank you also for your kindness, gallant hero!\'
Wǒ hái gǎnxiè nǐ de shànliáng，yǒnggǎn de yīngxióng。
我还感谢你的善良，勇敢的英雄。
The new novel is above all about the search for goodness.
Zhè bù xīn de xiǎoshuō zuì zhòngyào shì xiě guānyú xúnqiú shànliáng měihǎo de shìwù。
这部新的小说最重要是写关于寻求善良美好的事物。
Your generosity, your goodness, your pure love has enabled this possibility.

你的慷慨，你的善良，你纯真的爱使这个可能性变为可能。
She would never be able to repay the old man\'s kindness.
Tā yǒngyuǎn wúfǎ bàodá zhè wèi lǎorén de shànliáng。

我家良人外出，请改日再来吧。

My husband is out. Please come back some other day.
我乃一良人，因何抓我到官衙。
Wǒ nǎi yì liángrén,yīnhé zhuā wǒ dào guānyá.
I am a civilian. Why did you arrest me, and bring me to yamen?
善良的人们
shànliáng de rénmen
good and honest people; people of goodwill
前世的你，一定是个善良的人。
Qiánshì de nǐ，yídìng shì gè shànliáng de rén。
You must have been kind-hearted in your previous incarnation.
他们二人对视良久，一言不发。
Tāmen èr rén duìshì liángjiǔ，yīyán bùfā。
The two gazed at each other for a long time, without saying a word.
他性格急暴但心地善良，是个大好人。
Tā xìnggé jíbào dàn xīndì shànliáng，shì gè dàhǎorén。
Although short-tempered, he is a good person who is full of kindness.
现代人应该注意不能遗落先人的优良传统。
Xiàndàirén yīnggāi zhùyì bùnéng yíluò xiānrén de yōuliáng chuántǒng。
People living in modern times shouldn\'t throw away our ancestor\'s fine traditions.
奢侈浪费的不良现象真是让人看不惯。
Shēchǐ làngfèi de bùliáng xiàn xiàng zhēnshì ràng rén kànbúguàn。
Nobody can stand the bad phenomenon of luxury and waste.
这对即将分别的恋人彼此相顾，良久不发一言。
Zhè duì jíjiāng fēnbié de liànrén bǐcǐ xiānggù，liángjiǔ bùfā yìyán。
The lovers who are going to part look at each other without saying a word.
欺辱这些手无寸铁的平民，这些人真是丧尽天良。
Qīrǔ zhèxiē shǒuwú cùntiě de píngmín，zhèxiē rén zhēnshì sàngjìn tiānliáng。
They are utterly devoid of conscience, they even humiliated these defenseless civilians.
这些庄户人家的小孩也可以享受良好的教育。
Zhèxiē zhuānghù rénjiā de xiǎohái yě kěyǐ xiǎngshòu liánghǎo de jiàoyù。
Peasant children can enjoy a good education too.
一般来说，病人吃这种药都没有什么不良反应。
Yìbān láishuō，bìngrén chī zhèzhǒng yào dōu méiyǒu shénme bùliáng fǎnyìng。
Generally speaking, patients who took this medicine suffered no ill results.
今天是良辰吉日，让我们大家共同为这对新人祝福。
Jīntiān shì liángchén jírì，ràng wǒmen dàjiā gòngtóng wèi zhè duì xīnrén zhùfú。
Today is a happy, and auspicious day. Let\'s wish the new couple good luck together.

对某人/某事抱不良企图

Her litmus test for good breeding is whether you split infinitives.

病人对药物有不良反应。

考虑到她的年纪，她的健康状况是良好的。
our dearest wish
我们最良好的愿望
The chimney draws well.
烟囱通风良好。
in good form for the game
竞技状态良好
good manners
良好的礼貌
a car kept in repair
保养良好的汽车
a good sense of language
良好的语感
to show to good effect
表明有良好效果
a good site for a town
建造城镇的良好地段
He stood the trip quite well.
他旅行回来后感觉良好。
to offer one\'s best wishes
表示最良好的祝愿
Tolerance is a sign of breeding.
宽恕是有良好教养的表示。
Athletes train to be in condition
运动员训练以保持良好的竞技状态。
It\'s very important to have good personal relationships within our company.
在公司里保持良好的人际关系是很重要的。
This car is in perfect condition.
这辆车状况良好。
He is well schooled in history.
他受到了良好的历史学教育。
This set of tires really bites the road better than all others.
这种轮胎确实比其他种类的轮胎具有更良好的抓地性。
This car is old but in excellent condition.
这是辆旧车，但状况良好。
The motor coughed at the start, but worked perfectly in the end.
摩托启动时发出了咳嗽般的噗噗声，但是后来就运转良好了。
It\'s done over 120 000 miles, but still runs well.
车已经开了12万英里了，但仍运行良好。
Tom assured that the company is still doing all right.
汤姆保证说公司目前仍运行良好。
The newspaper industry is doing rather well.
报业发展态势良好。
She is well schooled in literature.
她在文学方面受过良好的教育。
to acquit o.s. well/badly
[frm] 表现良好/不好
in good/poor condition
状况良好/不好
the firm is doing well
这个公司业绩良好
to flatter o.s. (that...)
(对…)自我感觉良好
to get off to a flying start
开端良好
to be in good {or} top form
[体育] 处于良好的竞技状态{或}巅峰状态
to be on/off form
[体育] 竞技状态良好/不好
in good condition
状况良好地
in good nick
[BRIT] [inf] 状况良好
in (good) working order
运转(良好)
the team put up a good performance
该队表现良好
to have a good/poor record
有良好/不好的记录
in good/bad repair
维修良好/不善
to be on song
[BRIT] [sportsperson+] 处于良好竞技状态
best wishes
良好的祝愿
The new machine is working well.
新机器运行良好。
a hard/good worker
工作努力/良好的人
to have a good working relationship with sb
和某人有良好的工作关系

一根优质的室外天线具有良好的接受能力。

我们与许多大学建立良好的合作关系。
The material has good penetration and good water-resistance.
这种材料具有高度的渗透力及良好的防水性能。

希望我未来的伴侣有良好的修养，并是我生活和工作的指导与顾问。

电影和食品是文化输出的良好方式。

这次改革的成功是一个良好的基础。

凭借对英语的良好掌握，他通过了考试。

良好的声誉是我们的优势。

定期的社区聚会可以营造良好的邻里关系。

平坦的草地为我们提供了一个良好的足球比赛场所。

电脑处在这款软件的良好保护之下。

他们当然会给她一个良好服务的介绍信

良好的健康习惯可以延缓衰老。

举止良好的宠物需要能够悉心照料它们的主人。

这项合作将提供360个待遇良好的职位。

想成为舞蹈家，你必须打下良好的基础。

You must have a solid foundation to be a dancer.
这些灯箱广告制作精良。
Zhèxiē dēngxiāng guǎnggào zhìzuò jīngliáng。
These advertisements in lighted boxes are beautifully made.
他拿着这件古董，谛视良久。
Tā ná zhe zhèjiàn gǔdǒng，dìshì liángjiǔ。
He held this antique in hand and gazed at it for a long time.
他买了两方质地优良的端砚。
Tā mǎi le liǎng fāng zhìdì yōuliáng de duānyàn。
He bought two high quality inkstones.
他们二人对视良久，一言不发。
Tāmen èr rén duìshì liángjiǔ，yīyán bùfā。
The two gazed at each other for a long time, without saying a word.
她心地善良，从来没有恶念。
Tā xīndì shànliáng，cónglái méiyǒu èniàn。
She is a kind girl at heart and never has a single evil intention.
这些繁言碎语，其实有着妈妈的良苦用心。
Zhèxiē fányán suìyǔ，qíshí yǒuzhe māmɑ de liángkǔ yòngxīn。
Mother\'s nagging actually demonstrated her deep love.
这几天肥腻的东西吃得不少，他有点消化不良。
Zhè jǐtiān féinì de dōngxi chī de bùshǎo，tā yǒu diǎn xiāohuà bùliáng。

Huyang is one of the excellent sheep varieties, and is of high economic value.
他性格急暴但心地善良，是个大好人。
Tā xìnggé jíbào dàn xīndì shànliáng，shì gè dàhǎorén。
Although short-tempered, he is a good person who is full of kindness.
公司给我创造了良好的工作环境，使我工作起来犹如蛟龙得水。
Gōngsīgěi wǒ chuàngzào le liánghǎo de gōngzuò huánjìng，shǐ wǒ gōngzuò qǐlái yóurú jiāolóng déshuǐ。
The company offers me a good working environment, which enables me to display my talent.
要规范巡警的警容风纪，树立良好形象。

奢侈浪费的不良现象真是让人看不惯。

今天是良辰吉日，让我们大家共同为这对新人祝福。

你要明白我的良苦用心，我这都是为了你好啊。

Cashier\'s checks are as good as cash.
Yínháng zhīpiào gēn xiànjīn jùyǒu tóngyàng de xiàoyòng。
银行支票跟现金具有同样的效用。
They\'ll usually give you a checkbook or a bank card that you can use to draw out money against your credit limit.
他们通常会给你个支票簿或银行卡，你可以根据自己的信用额度取钱。
I had to co-sign his note at the bank.
Wǒ bìxū zài yínháng wèi tā de piàojù tígōng liánhé dānbǎo。
我必须在银行为他的票据提供联合担保。
The checks have been paid in and accounted for.

这些支票已经在银行兑现并报账了。
You must be 18 or above before your bank will issue a check guarantee card and checkbook as part of a current account package.
持卡人必须要年满18周岁，银行才可以发放银行担保卡和支票簿，来作为活期帐户方案的一部分。
Make sure you wait for the bank to confirm the check has cleared.
一定要等银行确认你的支票已兑现。
He cashed a check at the bank.
Tā cóng yínháng duìxiànle yìzhāng zhīpiào。
他从银行兑现了一张支票。
The bank cleared the cheque in three days.
银行在3天内兑现了支票。
I went to the bank to cancel a check I had written.
Wǒ qù yínháng bǎ yì zhāng wǒ céng kāijù de zhīpiào zuòfèi。
我去银行把一张我曾开具的支票作废。
If your bank returns your check without paying it, you may be charged a &quot;no sufficient funds&quot; fee.
如果银行返还给你没有兑现的支票，你可能就要支付“存款不足”的费用。
The bank will inform them today if the check has been cleared.

如果支票已经被兑现了的话，今天银行会通知他们的。
Payment may be made by cash and check but only accepted with a Bankers\' Card covering the total value of the check.
付款方式可以为现金付款和支票付款，但支付范围不能超过银行卡的金额总数。
The investment banker who handles a rights offering usually agrees to buy any shares not bought by shareholders.
Cāozòng pèigǔquán de tóuzī yínhángjiā tōngcháng tóngyì gòumǎi wèi bèi rènhé gǔdōng shōugòu de gǔpiào。

The bank has to verify your identity before you cash your check.

Bank security procedures can\'t stop all frauds, which may involve printing or altering checks.
银行的安全程序不能制止所有的欺诈行为，可能就会出现私自印制或改动支票的行为。

票价仍保持不变。

票价的上涨使得许多粉丝望而却步。
The price of the stock traded at a lower price.
Gǔpiàojiàgé zǒudī。
股票价格走低。
The director of the theatre company is considering changing the ticket prices.
Jùyuàn de jīnglǐ zhèngzài kǎolǜ biàndòng piàojià。
剧院的经理正在考虑变动票价。

Chéngkèmen bùnéng chéngshòu gènggāo de piàojià le。

不稳定的股票价格将会上下波动。

tì biéren mǎi huǒchēpiào 
buy a train ticket for sb.
贴邮票
tiē yóupiào 
stick on a stamp
这种支票，可以在全国范围内随时通兑或交换。
Zhè zhǒng zhīpiào，kěyǐ zài quánguó fànwéi nèi suíshí tōngduì huò jiāohuàn。
This kind of check can be cashed or exchanged at any time anywhere in the country.
我投了他一票。
Wǒ tóu le tā yí piào。
I cast (or gave) my vote for him.
投票赞成
tóupiào zànchénɡ 
vote for; vote in favour of
投票反对
tóupiào fǎnduì 
vote against
无记名投票
wújìmíngtóupiào 
secret ballot
等退票
děnɡ tuìpiào 
look for a returned (or unused) ticket
托收汇票
tuōshōu huìpiào 
bill for collection
外币汇票
wàibì huìpiào 
foreign currency bill
我对股票很外行。
Wǒ duì gǔpiào hěn wàiháng。
I\'m quite ignorant about stocks.
玩邮票
wán yóupiào 
make a hobby of collecting stamps
你想他能买到票吗？
Nǐ xiǎngtā néngmǎidào piào ma?
Do you think he can get the tickets?
他许过我一张票。
Tā xǔguò wǒ yì zhāngpiào。
He promised me a ticket.
无记名投票选举
wújìmíngtóupiào xuǎnjǔ
elect by secret ballot
济南以近的火车票
Jǐnán yǐjìn de huǒchēpiào 
train tickets up to Jinan
只售济南以远的车票。
Zhǐ shòu Jǐnán yǐyuǎn de chēpiào。
Only tickets for Jinan and beyond are available.
学生半价优待票
xuéshengbànjià yōudàipiào 
special half-price tickets for students
一套纪念邮票
yí tào jìniàn yóupiào 
a set of commemorative stamps
特种邮票
tèzhǒng yóupiào 
special stamps
这张车票三日内有效。
Zhè zhāngchēpiào sān rì nèi yǒuxiào。
This train ticket is good (or valid) for three days.
诱骗某人投赞成票
yòupiàn mǒu rén tóu zànchénɡpiào 
cajole sb. into voting in one\'s favour
预订火车票
yùdìnghuǒchēpiào 
book a train ticket
预售票
yùshòupiào 
advance purchase ticket; tickets open to booking
站票观众
zhànpiào guānzhòng
standee
本处只售站票。
Běnchù zhǐshòu zhànpiào。
Standing room only.
火车票又涨了。
Huǒchēpiào yòu zhǎng le。
Train fares are rising again.
对不起，你这张百元票子我找不开。
Duìbuqǐ，nǐ zhè zhāngbǎiyuán piàozi wǒ zhǎo bu kāi。
Sorry, I have no small change for your 100-yuan note.
开支票
kāi zhīpiào 
write a cheque
划线支票
huáxiàn zhīpiào 
crossed cheque
空头支票
kōngtóu zhīpiào 
rubber cheque
来人支票
láirén zhīpiào 
bearer cheque
保付支票
bǎofù zhīpiào 
certified cheque
旅行支票
lǚxíngzhīpiào 
traveller\'s cheque
这些邮票不值钱。
Zhèxiē yóupiào bùzhíqián。
These stamps are worthless.
一组邮票
yì zǔ yóupiào 
a set of stamps
你能给我们弄几张戏票吗？ ——我可没门儿。
Nǐ néng gěi wǒmen nòng jǐzhāng xìpiào ma? ——Wǒ kě méiménr。
Can you get us some tickets for the performance? —You\'re asking the wrong person.
全票一致通过
quánpiào yízhì tōngguò

língpiàor
notes of small denominations; change

shúpiàor
ransom a kidnapped person

wánrpiào
play a role in Beijing opera as an amateur

yí piào huò
a shipment of goods
一票买卖
yí piào mǎimài
a business transaction
一套邮票
yí tào yóupiào
a set of stamps
托收票据
tuōshōu piàojù
collection bill; short bill
识别真假钞票的方法之一是看它有没有安全线。
Shíbié zhēnjiǎ chāopiào de fāngfǎ zhīyī shì kàn tā yǒu méiyǒu ānquánxiàn。
One way to detect fake money is to look for the metal strip.
我有两张明晚芭蕾舞剧的票，给你一张。
Wǒ yǒu liǎng zhāng míngwǎn bālěiwǔjù de piào，gěi nǐ yì zhāng。
I have two ballet tickets for tomorrow evening. You can have one.
我谁也不想选，干脆投了个白票。
Wǒ shéi yě bùxiǎng xuǎn，gàncuì tóu le gè báipiào。
To me, no one was suitable, so I didn\'t cast a vote.
我不敢打保票这次自己一定能考好。
Wǒ bùgǎn dǎ bǎopiào zhècì zìjǐ yídìng néng kǎohǎo。
I\'m not a hundred percent sure that I\'m going to get a good mark in this exam.
如今，我国人民买布已不再用布票了。
Rújīn，wǒguó rénmín mǎi bùyǐ búzài yòng bùpiào le。
We no longer need a ticket to buy cloth nowadays.
这张藏书票印刷得非常精美。
Zhèzhāng cángshūpiào yìnshuā de fēicháng jīngměi。
This exlibris is in a delicately beautiful print.
他拆信的时候，发现了一枚珍贵的邮票。
Tā chāixìn de shíhou，fāxiàn le yì méi zhēnguì de yóupiào。
He found a precious stamp when he opened the letter.
股票的价格随着市场潮涨潮落。
Gǔpiào de jiàgé suí zhe shìchǎng cháozhǎng cháoluò。
The price of stock moves up and down with the market.
他是职业的股票炒手。
Tā shì zhíyè de gǔpiào chǎoshǒu。
He is a professional stock broker.
这个车组包括3个司机和六个售票员。
Zhège chēzǔ bāokuò sāngè sījī hé liùgè shòupiàoyuán。
The entire crew includes three drivers, and six conductors.
他研究了许多年的股票，现在都快成精了。
Tā yánjiū le xǔduō nián de gǔpiào，xiànzài dōu kuài chéngjīng le。
He is almost an expert on the stock market after many years\' research.
这个印刷厂现在的主要工作就是承印运动会的门票。
Zhège yìnshuāchǎng xiànzài de zhǔyào gōngzuò jiùshì chéngyìn yùndònghuì de ménpiào。
The press is undertaking the printing of tickets to the athletic meeting.
票友们经常在一起串戏自娱自乐。
Piàoyǒumen jīngcháng zài yìqǐ chuànxì zìyú zìlè。
Amateur performers always get together and take part in a professional performance as a way to amuse themselves.
今年春运火车票不涨价，给农民工和学生带来了实惠。
Jīnnián chūnyùn huǒchēpiào bùzhǎngjià，gěi nóngmíngōng hé xuésheng dàilái le shíhuì。
The price of train tickets does not go up during spring travel, which brings real benefits to farm workers and students.
奶奶把这几张大票封好，准备当压岁钱给我们。
Nǎinai bǎ zhèjǐzhāng dàpiào fēnghǎo，zhǔnbèi dāng yāsuìqián gěi wǒmen。
Grandma sealed the 100 Yuan notes in envelopes to give to the children as New Year\'s gifts.
解决党票问题只能靠自己的行动。
Jiějué dǎngpiào wèntí zhǐnéng kào zìjǐ de xíngdòng。
One can only solve the problem of party membership on their own.
底舱的票价更便宜一些。
Dǐcāng de piàojià gèng piányí yìxiē。
Tickets for the bottom cabins are cheaper.
他买彩票中了个一等奖，可算是发洋财喽！
Tā mǎi cǎipiào zhòng le gè　yìděngjiǎng，kě suàn　shì fāyángcái lou！
He made a big fortune after he won first prize in the lottery.
节日期间，返程车票特别不好买。
Jiérì qījiān，fǎnchéng chēpiào tèbié bùhǎo mǎi。
It is very hard to buy return tickets during festivals.
班级里的各种班干部岗位，早已根据投票结果分拨完毕。
Bānjí lǐ de gèzhǒng bāngànbùgǎngwèi，zǎoyǐ gēnjù tóupiào jiéguǒ fēnbō wánbì。
The class committee members are elected according to the results of the vote.
那天封寄信件的时候，她差点忘了贴邮票。
Nàtiān fēngjì xìnjiàn de shíhou，tā chàdiǎn wàng le tiē yóupiào。
She almost forgot to stick the stamp on the envelop when she went to mail the letter.
把那张支票装进我的公文包。
Bǎ nàzhāng zhīpiào zhuāngjìn wǒ de gōngwénbāo。
Put that check into my document bag.
购得的股票全都赔了，他很着急。
Gòudé de gǔpiào quándōu péi le，tā hěnzháojí。
He is very worried after having lost all the money he spent buying stocks.
股利的主要发放形式有现金股利、股票股利、财产股利和建业股利。
Gǔlì de zhǔyào fāfàng xíngshì yǒu xiànjīn gǔlì、gǔpiào gǔlì、cáichǎn gǔlì hé jiànyè gǔlì。
The main granting forms for dividends include cash dividends, stock dividends, property dividends and construction dividends.
这只股的股票价格跌得一塌糊涂。
Zhèzhī gǔ de gǔpiào jiàgé diē de yìtāhútú。
The price of this stock is slumping.
过去的游艺场都会发放红票给顾客。
Guòqù de yóuyìchǎng dōuhuì fāfàng hóngpiào gěi gùkè。
Entertainment places in the past used to give out free tickets to customers.
生活窘迫的他拿新衣服换了些红票。
Shēnghuó jiǒngpò de tā ná xīn yīfu huàn le xiē hóngpiào。
He was so poor that he had to exchange the new clothes for money.
现在的股票市场不稳定，投资者都很小心谨慎。
Xiànzài de gǔpiào shìchǎng bùwěndìng，tóuzīzhě dōu hěnxiǎoxīn jǐnshèn。
The stock markets are going wild and the investors are being prudent.
本次选举计票时间截止到明天晚上。
Běncì xuǎnjǔ jìpiào shíjiān jiézhǐ dào míngtiān wǎnshàng。
Polling in this election won\'t close until tomorrow night.
今天的选举由我来监票，我一定作到公平、公正。
Jīntiān de xuǎnjǔ yóu wǒ lái jiānpiào，wǒ yídìng zuòdào gōngpíng、gōngzhèng。
In today\'s election, I am in charge of monitoring balloting, I will make it fair.
他做监票绝对公正，大家尽管放心。
Tā zuò jiānpiào juéduì gōngzhèng，dàjiā jìnguǎn fàngxīn。
As a man scrutinizing balloting, he is just and honest, so don\'t worry.
我打算把积攒的一大把角票换成整元。
Wǒ dǎsuàn bǎ jīzǎn de yí dà bǎ jiǎopiào huànchéng zhěngyuán。
I intend to change banknotes of one, two, and five jiao denominations into banknotes in yuan.
金锭、银锭、银票曾是古人的货币。
Jīndìng、yíndìng、yínpiào céngshì gǔrén de huòbì。
The gold ingot, silver ingot and notes are ancient currencies.
本次航班经济舱的机票已全部售完。
Běncì hángbān jīngjìcāng de jīpiào yǐ quánbùshòuwán。
The economy class tickets for this flight are already sold out.
由于没买到火车票，我在同学家居停了两天。
Yóuyú méi mǎidào huǒchēpiào，wǒ zài tóngxué jiā jūtíng le liǎng tiān。
I stayed at my classmate\'s house for two days, for I had not been able to buy the ticket.
这份决议案还要通过投票才能最终定案。
Zhè fèn juéyì\'àn háiyào tōngguò tóupiào cáinéng zuì zhōng dìngàn。
This resolution shall undergo a ballot before its final version is determined.
喜欢集邮的小明很想得到一个军邮的邮票。
Xǐhuān jíyóu de Xiǎo Míng hěnxiǎng dédào yígè jūnyóu de yóupiào。
Xiaoming likes to collect stamps and he wants to get a stamp from the army postal service very much.
这只股票今天的开盘价是六元整。
Zhèzhī gǔpiào jīntiān de kāipánjià shì liù yuán zhěng。
The opening price of this stock today is only 6 yuan.
这个老太太在老龄大学里学京剧，在今年的票友大赛中还获了大奖。
Zhège lǎotàitài zài lǎolíng dàxué lǐ xué jīngjù，zài jīnnián de piàoyǒu dàsài zhōng hái huò le dàjiǎng。
The old lady learned Beijing opera at a university for senior people, and won a prize in an amateur performance contest this year.
今年我的股票赔钱了，生意又不好，里外里赔了不少钱。
Jīnnián wǒ de gǔpiào péiqián le，shēngyì yòu bùhǎo，lǐwàilǐ péi le bùshǎo qián。
This year I have suffered losses in stocks, and  business hasn\'t good either. In total, I have lost a lot of money.
除了这张大钞以外，我没有其他零票了。
Chúle zhèzhāng dàchāo yǐwài，wǒ méiyǒu qítā língpiào le。
I have no change except for this high denomination banknote.
我在开赛前匆匆买了几张马票。
Wǒ zài kāisài qián cōngcōng mǎi le jǐzhāng mǎpiào。
I bought several pari-mutuel tickets in a hurry before the race.
我打算填写一张卖单，卖出我手里的所有股票。
Wǒ dǎsuàn tiánxiě yìzhāng màidān，màichū wǒ shǒulǐ de suǒyǒu gǔpiào。
I am going to fill a voucher of sale and sell all my shares.
他唱戏的水平很高，不愧是一位名票！
Tā chàngxì de shuǐpíng hěngāo，bùkuì shì yíwèi míngpiào！
He has a very high level of singing, and deserves to be a popular amateur opera performing artist.
这部电影的所有票款收入将全部捐献给希望工程。
Zhèbù diànyǐng de suǒyǒu piàokuǎn shōurù jiāng quánbùjuānxiàn gěi xīwàng gōngchéng。
All the income of this movie will be donated to Project Hope.
我无法剖视大盘，所以股票交易一直很被动。
Wǒ wúfǎ pōushì dàpán，suǒyǐ gǔpiào jiāoyì yìzhí hěnbèidòng。
I\'ve been passive in the stock business all this time because I don’t know how to analyze the large cap.
普客的票价相对于普快较便宜。
Pǔkè de piàojià xiāngduìyú pǔkuài jiào piányí。
The ticket price of the slow train is lower than that of the fast train.
为了缩短路上所花的时间，我一般不买普客票。
Wèile suōduǎn lùshàng suǒ huā de shíjiān，wǒ yìbān bùmǎi pǔkè piào。
To reduce time wasted on the journey, I usually don\'t take the slow train.
我今天买了一套普通邮票。
Wǒ jīntiān mǎi le yítào pǔtōng yóupiào。
I have bought a set of postage stamps today
他的货币收藏品中，有几张是清代的钱票。
Tā de huòbì shōucángpǐn zhōng，yǒu jǐzhāng shì Qīngdài de qiánpiào。
There are some notes from the Qing dynasty among his money collection.
我们解救人质时一定要谨慎，以确保肉票安全！
Wǒmen jiějiù rénzhì shí yídìng yào jǐnshèn，yǐ quèbǎo ròupiào ānquán！
We should be careful when we rescue hostages so as to ensure their safety.
我好不容易才买到了一张软座的火车票。
Wǒ hǎo bùróngyì cái mǎidào le yìzhāng ruǎnzuò de huǒchēpiào。
It was not easy for me to buy a couch seat train ticket.
这部影片的票房收入尚可，观众的评价却一般。
Zhèbù yǐngpiàn de piàofáng shōurù shàngkě，guānzhòng de píngjià què yìbān。
Though the box-receipts of the film are quite high, the audience does not have a high opinion of it.
我们这次电话投票的截止时点是明天中午12点整。
Wǒmen zhècì diànhuà tóupiào de jiézhǐ shídiǎn shì míngtiān zhōng wǔ shí\'èrdiǎn zhěng。
The deadline of our telephone poll this time is tomorrow at 12 o\'clock noon.
对于购买火车票是否要搞实名制，目前还有争议。
Duìyú gòumǎi huǒchēpiào shìfǒu yào gǎo shímíngzhì，mùqián háiyǒu zhēngyì。
It is still debatable whether one should leave one\'s real name and show one\'s identification when buying train tickets.
在始发站上肯定能买到有座的票。
Zài shǐfāzhàn shàng kěndìng néng mǎidào yǒu zuò de piào。
One can definitely get seat tickets at the departure station.
从影院售票处排起的长队来看，这部电影非常叫座儿。
Cóng yǐngyuàn shòupiàochù páiqǐ de chángduì láikàn，zhèbù diànyǐng fēicháng jiàozuòr。
Judging from the long queue in front of the cinema\'s ticket office, this movie is a great draw.
本场演出票已售罄，要不您买下一场的？
Běnchǎng yǎnchūpiào yǐ shòuqìng，yàobùnín mǎi xiàyìchǎng de？
Tickets for this show have all sold out. What about buying one for the next show?
剧场门外的水牌上刚写出梅兰芳的演出预告，票就被抢购一空了。
Jùchǎng ménwài de shuǐpái shàng gāng xiěchū Méi Lánfāng de yǎnchū yùgào，piào jiù bèi qiǎnggòuyìkōng le。
The moment the announcement of Mei Lanfang\'s performance was written on the billboard outside the theater, tickets sold out in a rush.
税票是证明纳税的有力凭证。
Shuìpiào shì zhèngmíng nàshuì de yǒulì píngzhèng。
The tax bill is an effective proof of your having paid the tax.
由于没买着睡铺票，我只能坐十几个小时回家。
Yóuyú méi mǎizháo shuìpùpiào，wǒ zhǐnéng zuò shí jǐgè xiǎoshí huíjiā。
Since I didn\'t buy a berth ticket, I had to go home while sitting for a dozen hours.
我每月就是那么点死工资，哪有多余的钱买股票？
Wǒ měiyuè jiùshì nàme diǎn sǐ gōngzī，nǎyǒu duōyú de qián mǎi gǔpiào？
I only have a little fixed salary every month, so how can I have any more money to buy stock?
对于这种伪造票据逃漏税款的行为，我们要予以有力地打击。
Duìyú zhèzhǒng wěizào piàojù táolòu shuìkuǎn de xíngwéi，wǒmen yào yǔyǐ yǒulì de dǎjī。
We must fight against tax evasion relentlessly.
如果购买套票参观博物馆，就可以省很多钱。
Rúguǒ gòumǎi tàopiào cānguān bówùguǎn，jiù kěyǐ shěng hěnduō qián。
Buying sets of tickets to the museum can save you a lot of money.
这组纪念套票非常有收藏价值。
Zhè zǔ jìniàn tàopiào fēicháng yǒu shōucáng jiàzhí。
This set of stamps are of great collection value.
他使用各种非法手段来套取银行票据。
Tā shǐyòng gèzhǒng fēifǎ shǒuduàn lái tàoqǔ yínháng piàojù。
He used various illegal means to get bank receipts.
我收集了一套建国十周年发行的特种邮票。
Wǒ shōují le yítào jiànguó shí zhōunián fāxíng de tèzhǒng yóupiào。
I\'ve collected a set of special stamps issued on the tenth anniversary of the founding of the People\'s Republic of China.
这只股票盘中放出天量，发力上攻。
Zhèzhī gǔpiào pán zhōng fàngchū tiānliàng，fālì shànggōng。
This share has seen great trading volume and is now rising in value at a fantastic speed.
由于公司有重大信息公布，这只股票今天停板。
Yóuyú gōngsī yǒu zhòngdà xìnxī gōngbù，zhè zhī gǔpiào jīntiān tíngbǎn。
Because the company has major news to announce, its shares are suspended from trading today.
由于票房不佳，这部影片被提前停映了。
Yóuyú piàofáng bùjiā，zhèbù yǐngpiàn bèi tíqián tíngyìng le。
Failing to achieve box-office success, the film stopped being shown to audiences.
通观今年的股票市场，我们可以得出几点结论。
Tōngguān jīnnián de gǔpiào shìchǎng，wǒmen kěyǐ déchū jǐ diǎn jiélùn。
This year\'s stock market tells us the following things.
由于弄丢了三十万现金支票，他一时急得无所措手足。
Yóuyú nòngdiū le sānshí wàn xiànjīn zhīpiào，tā yìshí jí de wúsuǒcuò shǒuzú。
Having lost 300,000 worth of cash cheques, he is at a loss as to how to conduct himself.
我觉得这只股票目前正处在洗盘阶段。
Wǒ juédé zhèzhī gǔpiào mùqián zhèng chǔzài xǐpán jiēduàn。
I think this stock is in a dishwashing stage.
因为未带机票而躲过一劫，真是幸甚。
Yīnwéi wèi dài jīpiào ér duǒguò yìjié，zhēnshì xìngshèn。
It is really lucky to have escaped the disaster  because of forgetting to bring the plane ticket.
公交车现在都是自动验票了。
Gōngjiāochē xiànzài dōushì zìdòng yànpiào le。
Buses check tickets automatically now.
演唱会就要开始了，观众们拿着票在等待以次入场。
Yǎnchànghuì jiùyào kāishǐ le，guānzhòngmen ná zhe piào zài děngdài yǐcì rùchǎng。
The concert is going to begin, the audience are waiting to enter with their tickets.
经过三轮投票，杰克终于膺选校学生会主席。
Jīngguò sān lún tóupiào，Jiékè zhōng yú yīngxuǎn xiào xuéshenghuì zhǔxí。
After three rounds of voting, Jack was finally elected the president of the school\'s Student Union.
一张彩票悠悠荡荡地自半空中飘下来。
Yì zhāng cǎipiào yōuyōudàngdàng de zì bànkōng zhōng piāo xiàlái。
A piece of lottery ticket is floating about, down from the sky.
弟弟的邮集里放满了各式各样的邮票。
Dìdi de yóují lǐ fàngmǎn le gè shì gè yàng de yóupiào。
There are a variety of stamps in my brother\'s stamp-album.
奶奶到街上用三十块钱换几张油票儿。
Nǎinai dào jiēshàng yòng sānshí kuài qián huàn jǐzhāng yóupiàor。
Grandma went to the street and bought several cooking oil coupons with 30 yuan.
这家剧院设有鸳鸯座儿，只是票价太高。
Zhèjiā jùyuàn shèyǒu yuānyāngzuòr，zhǐshì piàojià tài gāo。
This theatre has love seats, only the tickets are too expensive.
想要送客上车就必须买一张月台票。
Xiǎngyào sòng kè shàngchē jiù bìxū mǎi yìzhāng yuètáipiào。
If you want to see people to the train, you have to buy a platform ticket.
近来公司股票的涨势有所减缓。
Jìnlái gōngsī gǔpiào de zhǎngshì yǒusuǒ jiǎnhuǎn。
Recently, the upward trend of the company\'s stock has slown to some extent.
最近一段时间股票总是处于跌势，他并未赚到什么钱。
Zuìjìn yíduànshíjiān gǔpiào zǒngshì chǔyú diēshì，tā bìngwèi zhuàndào shénme qián。
现在股票强势，他赚了很多钱呢。
Xiànzài gǔpiào qiángshì，tā zuàn le hěnduō qián ne。
在联合国安理会要作出某项决议时，非常任理事国是没有一票否决权的。
Zài liánhéguó ānlǐhuì yào zuòchū mǒu xiàng juéyì shí，fēichángrèn lǐshìguó shì méiyǒu yí piào fǒujuéquán de。
When the UNSC is making a decision, non-permanent member states do not have the right to veto with a single vote.

Zhèjiā bīnguǎn de fúwùtái dàishòu huǒchēpiào。
The information desk of this hotel offers a train ticket service.

Wèile biǎozhāng huàjùjiè yǒu tūchū gòngxiàn de yìshùjiā hé yōuxiù huàjù gōngzuòzhě，yóujú le fāxíng Zhōngguó huàjù dànchén yìbǎi zhōunián jìniàn yóupiào。

The election will adopt a secret ballot system.

Will the stock market crash again?
Gǔpiào shìchǎng huì zàicì bēngpán ma？
股票市场会再次崩盘吗？
The stock market is down today.
Gǔpiào shìchǎng jīntiān xiàdiē。
股票市场今天下跌。
The stock market plunged.
Gǔpiàoshìchǎng bàodiē。
股票市场暴跌。
The stock market fluctuates.
Gǔpiào shìchǎng bōdòng hěn dà。
股票市场波动很大。
The stock market drifted upward.
Gǔpiào shìchǎng zhújiàn shàngxíng。
股票市场逐渐上行。
The stock market collapsed.
Gǔpiào shìchǎng bēngkuì le。
股票市场崩溃了。
Stocks are still firm.
Gǔpiào shìchǎng réngrán jiāntǐng。
股票市场仍然坚挺。
He got a tip on the stock market.
Tā zài gǔpiàoshìchǎng shàng huòdéle yígè xiǎodàoxiāoxī。
他在股票市场上获得了一个小道消息。
If this trend continues it is not reasonable to expect the eventual collapse of the stock market.
Jiǎrú zhè qūshì chíxù xiàqù，gūjì gǔpiào shìchǎng huì zuìzhōng kuǎdiào。
假如这趋势持续下去，估计股票市场会最终垮掉。
Market runups are invariably followed by a correction.
Gǔpiào shìchǎng shàngzhǎng zhīhòu zǒngshì zài huíluò xiàlái。
股票市场上涨之后总是再回落下来。
We watched the stock market nervously.
Wǒmen jiāolǜ bù\'ān de guānzhùzhe gǔpiào shìchǎng de qíngkuàng。
我们焦虑不安地关注着股票市场的情况。
The new stock market was unhampered by tradition.
Xīn de gǔpiào shìchǎng méiyǒu bèi chuántǒng suǒ tuōlèi。
新的股票市场没有被传统所拖累。
The company went off the fast track when the stock market dropped.
Nàgè gōngsī zài gǔpiào shìchǎng xiàdiē shí shīqùle chénggōng de jiéjìng。
那个公司在股票市场下跌时失去了成功的捷径。
The stock market plummeted.
Gǔpiàoshìchǎng jídiē。
股票市场急跌。
I keep track of the stock market developments.
Wǒ yìzhí zài gēnzōng gǔpiào shìchǎng de fāzhǎn。
我一直在跟踪股票市场的发展。
We had better not trade stock anymore, the market is very volatile now.
我们最好不要买卖股票了，市场现在非常不稳定。
He undersold a large amount of industrial stocks and caused the market to fluctuate.
他大量抛售工业股票，引起了市场波动。
He had no reason for selling those stocks, considering the state of things.
就事情的情况来讲，他并没有在市场抛出这些股票的必要。

公开市场上发行公司股票可以带来新的资金。

He had no reason for selling those stocks, considering the state of things.
就事情的情况来讲，他并没有在市场抛出这些股票的必要。
The outstanding stock was sold out soon after launched.
这支股票发行后不久就被抢购一空。
I got a portion of the profits according to the shares I hold.
我凭借手中的股票获得了自己的红利。
His resolution to buy stocks didn\'t waiver during the strike.
所遭受的打击并没有使他放弃买股票的决心。
A corporation may purchase its own common stock or preferred stock and retire it by canceling the stock certificates.
公司可以购买自己已发行的普通股或有限股，并将其取消以收回股票。
There are a lot of variables in the stock market.
股票市场中有许多不确定因素。
We had better not trade stock anymore, the market is very volatile now.
我们最好不要买卖股票了，市场现在非常不稳定。
We will offer a competitive price to take the increasing market shares.
我们会出高价收购这些正在升值的股票。
This company\'s financials don\'t look so good.
这家公司的股票不被看好。
It is aimed at private clients dealing in individual stocks.
Tā de mùbiāo suǒdìng zài jìnxíng gèrén gǔpiàojiāoyì de sīrén kèhù。
它的目标锁定在进行个人股票交易的私人客户。
Most shares should be held for at least five months to have a decent return.
Dàduōshù gǔpiào yīng chíyǒu zhìshǎo 5 gè yuè yǐ huòqǔ zúgòu de huíbào。
大多数股票应持有至少5个月以获取足够的回报。
The stock market has declined by a few hundred points.
Gǔpiàoshìchǎng jiàngle jǐ gè bǎifēndiǎn。
股票市场降了几个百分点。
The price of the stock traded at a lower price.
Gǔpiàojiàgé zǒudī。
股票价格走低。
The stocks were downgraded based on their bad performance.
Yóuyú tāmen zāogāo de yèjì，gǔpiào biǎnzhí le。
由于他们糟糕的业绩，股票贬值了。
The stock market attained consecutive growth.
Gǔpiào shìchǎng shíxiànle liánxù de zēngzhǎng。
股票市场实现了连续的增长。
Stocks were overpriced and the crash brought the share prices back to a normal level.
Gǔjià yuánběn tài gāo le，zhè cì bàodiē bǎ gǔpiào dàihuíle zhèngcháng shuǐpíng。
股价原本太高了，这次暴跌把股票带回了正常水平。
What is the single most important factor when buying a stock for investment purposes?
Zài yǐ tóuzī wéi mùdì gòumǎi gǔpiào shí，xūyào kǎolǜ de zuì zhìguānzhòngyào de yīnsù shì shénme？

Gǔpiào jiàgé jìnyíbù shàngshēng de kōngjiān kànlái shì yǒuxiàn de。
股票价格进一步上升的空间看来是有限的。
The broker is said to have been promoting the stock to its clients.
Jùshuō，jīngjìrén yìzhí zài xiàng kèhù tuīxiāo gǔpiào。
据说，经纪人一直在向客户推销股票。
Mr Denny hopes to float the company on the Stock Exchange in December.
Dānní Xiānsheng xīwàng gōngsī gǔpiào shíèr yuè zài jiāoyìsuǒ shàngshì jiāoyì。
丹尼先生希望公司股票12月在交易所上市交易。
It\'s not so brilliant for any shareholders who sold at the float price.
Rènhé gǔdōng yǐ mùjí jiàgé chūshòu gǔpiào dōu hěn bù míngzhì。
任何股东以募集价格出售股票都很不明智。
The price of volatile stocks will fluctuate.
Bù wěndìng de gǔpiào jiàgé jiāng huì shàngxià bōdòng。
不稳定的股票价格将会上下波动。
There is bad blood between the options market\'s leading dealing firms and the stock exchange.
Zài qīquán shìchǎng jūyú lǐngdǎodìwèi de jiāoyì gōngsī hé gǔpiàojiāoyìsuǒ zhījiān jīyuàn hěn shēn。
在期权市场居于领导地位的交易公司和股票交易所之间积怨很深。
He is banking on his stocks to make him wealthy.
Tā zhǐwàng tā de gǔpiào néng ràng tā fācái。
他指望他的股票能让他发财。
His investment in those stocks has really paid off.
Tā duì nàxiē gǔpiào de tóuzī zhēn de yǒule huíbào。
他对那些股票的投资真的有了回报。
Speculators play the market in the hope of making a quick fortune.
Tóujīzhě mǎimai gǔpiào， qīwàng kuàisù huòdé cáifù。
投机者买卖股票，期望快速获得财富。
Seen from a number viewpoints, the success of the share sale is amazing.
Yǐ duō jiǎodù lái kàn，zhè zhī gǔpiào de chénggōng xiāoshòu lìngrénchēngqí。
以多角度来看，这支股票的成功销售令人称奇。
The figures sent shares down sharply.
Zhèxiē shùzì shǐ gǔpiào dàdiē。
这些数字使股票大跌。
This is one of the peculiarly dangerous months to speculate in stocks .
Zhè shì tóujī gǔpiào xiāngdāng wēixiǎn de yí gè yuèfèn。
这是投机股票相当危险的一个月份。

分析人员认为，股票市场面临技术性反弹。
Insiders said the company\'s stock was in play.
Nèibù rénshì chēng zhèjiā gōngsī de gǔpiào huóyuè。
内部人士称这家公司的股票活跃。
The stock market fell to a new low.
Gǔpiào shìchǎng diē zhì xīndī。
股票市场跌至新低。
Will the stock market crash again?
Gǔpiào shìchǎng huì zàicì bēngpán ma？

The stock market is down today.
Gǔpiào shìchǎng jīntiān xiàdiē。

The stock market collapsed.
Gǔpiào shìchǎng bēngkuì le。

Stocks are still firm.
Gǔpiào shìchǎng réngrán jiāntǐng。

He held a large block of the company\'s stock.
Tā chíyǒu gōngsī de dàliàng gǔpiào。
他持有公司的大量股票。
He bought 100 shares of ibm at the market price.

I transferred my stock holdings to my children.

When that became known the price of their stock went into free fall.
Dāng nà jiàn shì gōngzhīyúzhòng hòu，tāmen de gǔpiào jiàgé jiù zhíxiàn xiàdiē。
当那件事公之于众后，他们的股票价格就直线下跌。
He rejected stocks that didn\'t pay dividends because of their speculativeness.
Yóuyú tóujīxīnlǐ，tā jùjué gòumǎi bù fēnhóng de gǔpiào。
由于投机心理，他拒绝购买不分红的股票。
If this trend continues it is not reasonable to expect the eventual collapse of the stock market.

Gǔpiào shìchǎng shàngzhǎng zhīhòu zǒngshì zài huíluò xiàlái。

All my stocks are held in street name.

The company went off the fast track when the stock market dropped.

He knew the stock was a speculation when he bought it.

zhèxiē gǔpiào dédào 4 bèi rèngòu。

Gōngmín tóupiào zài liù yuèfèn jìnxíng。

庆幸的是，机场税已经包括在飞机票里了。

他弄丢了飞机票，需要再买一张。

飞机票花了我太多钱，我不得不减少旅行预算。
I\'m trying to book plane tickets for someone else.

最后我们拿到了飞往日本的低价机票。

8 votes for, 3 against, and 1 abstention
投票反对
tóupiào fǎnduì 
vote against
I voted against the proposal. It\'s not safe selling weapons to everybody.
我投了票反对这项提议，公开出售武器是不安全的。
283 votes in favour and 29 against
283票赞成，29票反对
A small minority voted against the motion.
一个小的少数党派投票反对这个提议。
The town was balloting against the mayor.
Zhège xiǎochéng tóupiào fǎnduì shìzhǎng。
这个小城投票反对市长。
In the past, the UK consistently voted against such duties.
Guòqù，Yīngguó yíguàn tóupiào fǎnduì zhèxiē guānshuì。
过去，英国一贯投票反对这些关税。
European had cast an unprecedented veto against new nuclear weapons.

欧洲人以前所未有的高投票率反对新式核武器。
to vote yes/no to sth
投票赞成/反对某事
to vote for/against sth
投票支持/反对某事
The two opposition parties together won 29 per cent of the vote.
两个反对党加起来赢得29%的选票。
开发票
kāi fāpiào
make an invoice
请您拿小票到收银台交款、并换取发票。
Qǐng nín ná xiǎopiào dào shōuyíntái jiāokuǎn、bìng huànqǔ fāpiào。
Now please go to pay the cashier with your sales check, and exchange it for an invoice.
滥发钞票
làn fā chāopiào
issue banknotes recklessly; inflate the paper currency

fāchū chuánpiào 
issue a summons

fāchū chuánpiào

发行股票
fāxínggǔpiào
issue stocks
他做股票生意发了大财。
Tā zuò gǔpiào shēngyì fā le dà cái。
He made a fortune buying and selling stocks.

fāxíng huòbì（zhàiquàn，gǔpiào）
issue currency (bonds, stocks)

Gǔlì de zhǔyào fāfàng xíngshì yǒu xiànjīn gǔlì、gǔpiào gǔlì、cáichǎn gǔlì hé jiànyè gǔlì。
The main granting forms for dividends include cash dividends, stock dividends, property dividends and construction dividends.

He made a big fortune after he won first prize in the lottery.

In order to commend those artists and excellent workers who have made distinguished contributions to modern drama, the post office issued a set of commemorative stamps for the 100th anniversary of the birth of modern Chinese drama.

给某人开物品发票

报销各种费用时，员工应提供发票。

我们通常以离岸价开发票。

issue a summons

issue a summons

如当事人对此发生争议，法院应对其认为符合法律规定的传票或类似的通知或命令加以确认。

to suffer insult on insult

xītú ménghùn guòguān 
try to wangle; try to get by under false pretences
他并不知道答案，全是瞎蒙上的。
Tā bìngbùzhīdào dá\'àn，quán shì xiāmēngshàng de。
He didn\'t really know the answers. He just made a lucky guess.
世界上多少人被他们的甜言蜜语所蒙蔽，而不知道他们笑里藏刀的可怕。
Shìjiè shàngduōshǎo rén bèi tāmen de tiányánmìyǔ suǒ méngbì，ér bùzhīdào tāmen xiàolǐcángdāo de kěpà。
Quite a number of people have been fooled by their flattering words, failing to see the murderous intent behind their smiles.

Chéngméng xiézhù，jǐnzhì xièchén。

这是蒙牛乳业荣誉出品的。
Zhè shì Měngniúrŭyè róngyùchūpǐn de。
他不懂行情，很容易挨蒙。
Tā bùdǒng hángqíng，hěnróngyì áiméng。
Not knowing the normal prices, he gets easily taken advantage of.

Nèiměng de cǎoyè zīyuán shífēn fēngfù。
Inner Mongolia is rich in meadow resources.

Thanks to the teacher\'s tender care, we would never let you down.

Chéngméng zhāodài，duōyǒu dǎrǎo。

突然遇到这么一件事，难怪他发蒙！
Tūrán yù dào zhème yíjiàn shì，nánguài tā fāmēng！
He became muddled after such an sudden incident.
他从小聪明，5岁发蒙。
Tā cóngxiǎo cōngming，wǔsuì fāmēng。
He was intelligent as a child, and was taught to read and write when he was five years old.
新娘子蒙着盖头走下花轿。
Xīnniángzi méng zhe gàitou zǒuxià huājiào。
The bride stepped down from the bridal sedan chair with a bridal veil covering her head.
虚假产品使一些消费者蒙受了经济损失，更有甚者，有的还能害死人。
Xūjiǎ chǎnpǐn shǐ yìxiē xiāofèizhě méngshòu le jīngjì sǔnshī，gèngyǒu shènzhě，yǒu de hái néng hàisǐ rén。
Fake products inflict economic losses on some consumers. Moreover, some of them can kill people.
古人称宇宙形成之前的混沌状况为鸿蒙。
Gǔrén chēng yǔzhòu xíngchéng zhīqián de hùndùn zhuàngkuàng wéi hóngméng。
Ancient people called the chaotic state before the formation of the universe the Great Vastness.
你不要被事情的假相所蒙敝，掉入坏人的陷阱里。
Nǐ búyào bèi shìqing de jiǎ xiàng suǒ méngbì，diàorù huàirén de xiànjǐng lǐ。
Keep yourself from being misled by the disguises of bad people, so you won\'t fall into their traps.
承蒙大家见爱，我再为大家献上一曲。
Chéngméng dàjiā jiànài，wǒ zài wèi dàjiā xiànshàng yìqǔ。
I am so flattered by you all that I would like to sing another song for you.
这位蒙古族跤手力大无穷。
Zhèwèi ménggǔzú jiāoshǒu lìdà wúqióng。

他坑蒙拐骗，无恶不做，迟早是要进监狱的！

Tā bèi dài le lǜtóujīn，hái méngzài gǔ lǐ ne！

别相信他，他是在蒙人呢。

大家都知道他这个人只会蒙事，没有什么真本事。

首都马上就要失守了，皇帝只能蒙尘出逃了。

他昨天一夜没睡，今天一直睡眼蒙眬。

shànyú cílìng

charities; good works; philanthropy

善事
shànshì
good deeds

Detectives are good at speculating the process of events.

他突然有一个想法，来改善他们客户之间的关系。
He welcomes suggestions on how to improve in this area.
Tā huānyíng rúhé gǎishàn zhè yī Dìqū de jiànyì。
他欢迎如何改善这一地区的建议。
We have tried to improve on the problems identified earlier.

我们已试图改善，争取早点发现问题。
We will press for progress on the environment.
Wǒmen huì dūncù huánjìng de gǎishàn。
我们会敦促环境的改善。
That baby put an idea into my head on how to improve diapers!

那个宝宝让我产生了改善尿布的奢望！

He wanted a better sex life.

他想改善性生活。

急剧转折
jíjù zhuǎnzhé 
abrupt turn
戏剧性的转折
xìjùxìng de zhuǎnzhé 
a dramatic turn
东北有句俗话：“宁舍三顿饭，不舍二人转”，充分表达了人们对这个地方剧种的喜爱。
Dōngběi yǒu jù súhuà:“Nìng shě sāndùn fàn，bú shě èrrénzhuǎn”，chōngfèn biǎodá le rénmen duì zhège dìfāngjùzhǒng de xǐ\'ài。
As the saying goes in Norheastern China, &quot;We\'d rather give up our three meals than our song and dance duets.&quot; Local people enjoy going to these kind of operas
矛盾急剧转化
吉剧脱胎于二人转。

过去那个路灯，道路便急剧转弯。

chǎnliàng jùzēng
a sharp increase in output

biān jùběn

Zhèyàng de diànshìjù zhēn jiào rén dǎo wèikǒu。
I\'ve no stomach for such TV dramas.
这孩子十分淘气，喜欢恶作剧。
Zhè háizi shífēn táoqì，xǐhuan èzuòjù。

别恶作剧了！
Bié èzuòjù le！

剧本是以主人公之死作为归结的。
Jùběn shì yǐ zhǔréngōngzhī sǐ zuòwéi guījié de。
The play ends with the hero\'s death.
观众喝倒彩，这位喜剧演员下了场。

Zhèbù diànshìjù shì húshuōbādào。

Tāmen dào jùyuàn shí，xì yǐjing kāichǎng le。

Jīngjù zuì hé wǒ de kǒuwèi。

The theatre is air-conditioned.

Zhège jù jùyǒu qiángliè de shēnghuó qìxī。

jīngjù de qiāngdiào

Zhège jùběn qíngjié hěn fùzá。

Tā rěn zhe jùtòng，jìxù gōngzuò。

Rénmín jùchǎngjīnwǎn shàngyǎn shénme jiémù?

京剧的上座率比若干地方戏低很多。

市场竞争日益加剧
shìchǎng jìngzhēng rì yì jiājù
increasingly intense market competition
这部电视连续剧开播后不久，收视率便跃居首位。
Zhèbù diànshì liánxùjù kāibō hòu bùjiǔ，shōushìlǜ biàn yuèjū shǒuwèi。
Shortly after the TV serial was first aired, it shot to the top of the ratings.
这个剧本收尾太没劲。
Zhège jùběn shōuwěi tài méi jìn。
The ending of the play is rather too tame.

dǎozhì wùjià jíjù xiàdiē

《现代戏剧选集》
《Xiàndài Xìjù Xuǎnjí》
An Anthology of Modern Drama

剧本
jùběn
drama; play
话剧
huàjù
modern drama; stage play
剧团
jùtuán
theatrical company; opera troupe; troupe
根据剧本要求，这个人物在这里一定要哭得凄凄哀哀。
Gēnjù jùběn yāoqiú，zhège rénwù zài zhèlǐ yídìng yào kū de qīqīāiāi。
The script says this character must bitterly cry here.
这是一出哀切动人的悲剧。
Zhè shì yì chū āiqiè dòngrén de bēijù。
This is a tragedy that sends people to tears.
我有两张明晚芭蕾舞剧的票，给你一张。
Wǒ yǒu liǎng zhāng míngwǎn bālěiwǔjù de piào，gěi nǐ yì zhāng。
I have two ballet tickets for tomorrow evening. You can have one.
板式的音乐体系在京剧得到规范化。
Bǎnshì de yīnyuè tǐxì zài jīngjù dédào guīfànhuà。
The traditional Chinese music system was standardized in Beijing opera .
他跟剧团里的叔叔学会了吹梆笛。
Tā gēn jùtuán lǐ de shūshu xuéhuì le chuī bāngdí。
He learned how to play bamboo flute from a man in a troupe.
这是她的保留剧目，老观众都爱看。
Zhè shì tā de bǎoliú jùmù，lǎoguānzhòng dōu àikàn。
This is her classical opera. Audiences like it.
他对这个剧本的宾白特别感兴趣。
Tā duì zhège jùběn de bīnbái tèbié gǎn xìngqù。
He is very interested in the spoken parts of the drama script.
电视台最近正在播出一部历史剧。
Diànshìtái zuìjìn zhèngzài bōchū yíbù lìshǐjù。
A new historical drama is being broadcasted on TV.
他参拍了多部电视连续剧。
Tā cānpāi le duō bùdiànshì liánxùjù。
He participated in making lots of TV dramas.
京剧表演中的唱念做打，他样样精通。
Jīngjù biǎoyǎn zhōng de chàngniàn zuòdǎ，tā yàngyàng jīngtōng。
He is good at all the singing, speaking, acting and acrobatic fighting in Beijing Opera.
潮剧主要流行于潮州汕头一带。
Cháojù zhǔyào liúxíng yú Cháozhōu Shàntóu yídài。
Chaozhou opera is popular mainly in the areas around Chaozhou and Shantou.
退休后他一直沉潜于京剧艺术的研究。
Tuìxiū hòu tā yìzhí chénqián yú jīngjù yìshù de yánjiū。
After retirement, he became absorbed in the research of Beijing Opera.
京剧的主要特点就是表演的程式化。
Jīngjù de zhǔyào tèdiǎn jiùshì biǎoyǎn de chéngshìhuà。
Stylized forms of performance is the main characteristic of the Beijing Opera.
他对于京剧艺术的迷恋已经到了痴狂的程度了。
Tā duìyú jīngjù yìshù de míliàn yǐjing dào le chīkuáng de chéngdù le。
He is crazy about Beijing Opera.
他在息影多年后重出江湖，准备参加一部喜剧的拍摄。
Tā zài xīyǐng duōnián hòu chóngchū jiānghú，zhǔnbèi cānjiā yíbù xǐjù de pāishè。
After having stopped acting for many years, he made his reappearance in a comic role.
有的京剧演员在没出科之前就已经小有名气了。
Yǒu de jīngjù yǎnyuán zài méi chūkē zhīqián jiù yǐjing xiǎoyǒu míngqì le。
Some Beijing opera actors have gained quite a reputation even before their graduation.
有出新编京剧叫作《雏凤凌空》。
Yǒu chū xīnbiān jīngjù jiàozuò《Chúfènglíngkōng》。
There is a newly edited opera called &quot; Young Phoenix Is High Up In the Air.&quot;
楚剧虽然在全国不是很流行，但在湖北一带是很受欢迎的。
Chǔjù suīrán zài quánguó búshì hěnliúxíng，dàn zài Húběi yídài shì hěn shòuhuānyíng de。
Chu Opera is not very popular across the country, but it is very popular in areas around Hubei province.
川剧是比较有代表性的四川地方戏。
Chuānjù shì bǐjiào yǒu dàibiǎoxìng de sìchuān dìfāngxì。
Sichuan Opera is a typical local opera in Sichuan Province.
以讹传讹造成的悲剧真是太多了。
Yǐéchuáné zàochéng de bēijù zhēnshì tài duō le。
There are really a great many tragedies caused by spreading false news.
古装电视剧里的床榻和现在的床有很大区别。
Gǔzhuāng diànshìjù lǐ de chuángtà hé xiànzài de chuáng yǒu hěndà qūbié。
The beds in TV costume dramas set in ancient times are very different from modern beds.
创编剧本需要同时具备文字功底和舞台经验。
Chuàngbiān jùběn xūyào tóngshí jùbèi wénzì gōngdǐ hé wǔtái jīngyàn。
Writing plays requires master of words and stage experience.
戏曲流派的创始人都有自己的代表剧目传世。
Xìqǔ liúpài de chuàngshǐrén dōu yǒu zìjǐ de dàibiǎo jùmù chuánshì。
All the founders of different opera schools have passed down their typical plays to the world.
著名京剧表演艺术家尚长荣先生创演的曹操的形象入木三分。
Zhùmíng jīngjù biǎoyǎn yìshùjiā Shàng Chángróng xiānshēng chuàngyǎn de Cáo Cāo de xíng xiàng rùmùsānfēn。
The famous performing artist of Beijing Opera, Mr. Shang Changrong, has created and performed a vivid portrayal of Caocao.
纯情少女遇上花心汉是电视剧中常用的情节。
Chúnqíng shàonǚ yùshàng huāxīn hàn shì diànshìjù zhōng chángyòng de qíngjié。
A maiden with a pure heart coming across playboys is commonly seen in TV series.
这部电视剧的主角是个山东大汉。
Zhèbù diànshìjù de zhǔjiǎo shì gè Shāndōng dàhàn。
A hefty man from shandong province plays the leading role in the TV show.
他给我讲了这部电影的剧情大旨。
Tā gěi wǒ jiǎng le zhèbù diànyǐng de jùqíng dàzhǐ。
He told me the film\'s plot.
这出傣剧反映了傣族的历史。
Zhèchū dǎijù fǎnyìngle dǎizú de lìshǐ。
Dai opera reflects the history of the Dai ethnic group.
近年来，很少有人愿意拍单本剧。
Jìnnián lái，hěnshǎo yǒurén yuànyì pāi dānběnjù。
In recent years, few people have wanted to film single-episode TV shows.
用灯影表演戏剧是皮影戏的雏形。
Yòng dēngyǐng biǎoyǎn xìjù shì píyǐngxì de chúxíng。
Shadow plays are performed by images formed by light on a large piece of canvas.
电视台正在播放一部讲述帝王将相故事的电视剧。
Diànshìtái zhèngzài bōfàng yíbù jiǎngshù dìwáng jiàng xiàng gùshì de diànshìjù。
The TV station is broadcasting a TV show about emperors and high-positioned officials.
这部电视连续剧总共有80集。
Zhèbù diànshì liánxùjù zǒnggòng yǒu bāshíjí。
This soap opera has 80 episodes altogether.
在这次戏曲调演中，涌现出了很多优秀剧目。
Zài zhècì xìqǔ diàoyǎn zhōng，yǒngxiàn chū le hěnduō yōuxiù jùmù。
Many excellent plays appeared in this period\'s selection of local operas.
演员在这个短剧中的表演非常到位。
Yǎnyuán zài zhège duǎnjù zhōng de biǎoyǎn fēicháng dàowèi。
The actors performed very well in this short play.
豫剧《花木兰》里唱道：“女子们哪一点儿不如儿男！”
Yùjù《Huāmùlán》lǐ chàngdào：“Nǚzǐmen nǎ yìdiǎn\'ér bùrú érnán！”
A line in the Henan opera Mulan goes like this, &quot;Who says women are any inferior to men?&quot;
东北有句俗话：“宁舍三顿饭，不舍二人转”，充分表达了人们对这个地方剧种的喜爱。
Dōngběi yǒu jù súhuà:“Nìng shě sāndùn fàn，bú shě èrrénzhuǎn”，chōngfèn biǎodá le rénmen duì zhège dìfāngjùzhǒng de xǐ\'ài。
As the saying goes in Norheastern China, &quot;We\'d rather give up our three meals than our song and dance duets.&quot; Local people enjoy going to these kind of operas
《天鹅湖》被奉为芭蕾舞剧的经典。
《Tiān\'éhú》bèi fèngwéi bālěiwǔjù de jīngdiǎn。
&quot;Swan Lake&quot; is honored as one of the classic ballets.
这部电视剧斧凿的痕迹过于明显。
Zhèbù diànshìjù fǔzáo de hénjì guòyú míngxiǎn。
The TV series looks artificial.
《白蛇传》是川剧的高腔戏。
《Báishéchuán》 shì chuānjù de gāoqiāngxì。
&quot;The Tale of the White Serpent&quot; is a high-pitched drama in Sichuan opera.
这部电视剧的拍摄工作告竣。
Zhèbù diànshìjù de pāishè gōngzuò gàojùn。
The TV series has been completed.
话剧演员需要有深厚的台词功力。
Huàjù yǎnyuán xūyào yǒu shēnhòu de táicí gōnglì。
Stage actors should have superb skills for delivering lines.
请您对这个剧本谈点看法吧，我们洗耳恭听。
Qǐng nín duì zhège jùběn tán diǎn kànfǎ ba，wǒmen xǐěrgōngtīng。
Would you please give your comments on this play. We are waiting to hear them with respect.
我躬逢梅兰芳艺术高峰的时代，他真不愧为京剧大师。
Wǒ gōngféng Méi Lánfāng yìshù gāofēng de shídài，tā zhēn búkuì wéi jīngjù dàshī。
I was present in person at the height of Meilanfang\'s art career. He really deserves to be called a master of Beijing Opera.
宋元时，勾栏瓦舍中演出的杂剧成为那个时代的民间文化的典型代表。
Sòng Yuán shí，gōulán wǎshè zhōng yǎnchū de zájù chéngwéi nàge shídài de mínjiān wénhuà de diǎnxíng dàibiǎo。
During the Song and Yuan Dynasties, Zaju staged in brothels was a typical representation of the folk culture of that time.
我刚写了一篇戏剧观后感寄给了杂志社。
Wǒ gāng xiě le yì piān xìjù guānhòugǎn jìgěi le zázhìshè。
I just finished an article about my impressions of the play and have mailed it to the periodical office.
中午的时候，他总会听上一会儿广播剧。
Zhōngwǔ de shíhou，tā zǒnghuì tīngshàng yíhuìr guǎngbōjù。
At noon, he always listens a while to radio plays.
闺门旦是京剧里的一个主要行当。
Guīméndàn shì jīngjù lǐ de yígè zhǔyào hángdāng。
Maiden dan (character role of an unmarried young girl) is a main character in Beijing opera.
今晚的歌剧演出华丽瑰异，引人入胜。
Jīnwǎn de gējù yǎnchū huálì guīyì，yǐnrén rùshèng。
The opera tonight was magnificent and enchanting.
桂剧《大儒还乡》的演出取得了巨大成功。
Guìjù《Dàrúhuánxiāng》 de yǎnchū qǔdé le jùdà chénggōng。
The performance of Guangxi Opera Return to his Native Place was a big success.
周信芳是海派京剧的代表人物之一。
Zhōu Xìnfāng shì hǎipài jīngjù de dàibiǎo rénwù zhīyī。
Zhou Xinfang is a representative of the Shanghai school of Beijing opera.
对于上次我致函中国剧协提出的问题，他们已经函复过了。
Duìyú shàngcì wǒ zhìhán Zhōngguó jùxié tíchū de wèntí，tāmen yǐjing hánfù guò le。
They have written me a letter, replying to the question I had written to Chinese Dramatists Association.
这个角色的身世在剧情的烘染下更加催人泪下了。
Zhège juésè de shēnshì zài jùqíng de hōngrǎn xià gèngjiā cuīrén lèixià le。
Ignited by instinct, the characters experiences were all the more moving.
《战长沙》是京剧中一出著名的红净戏。
《Zhànchángshā》 shì jīngjù zhōng yìchū zhùmíng de hóngjìngxì。
Zhanchangsha is a famous Peking opera featuring the role of Hongjing.
爷爷最爱看沪剧，还会唱几出。
Yéye zuì ài kàn hùjù，hái huì chàng jǐ chū。
Grandpa likes Huju Drama most, and he can even sing several.
作为一个老上海人，爷爷最爱看淮剧了。
Zuòwéi yígè lǎo Shànghǎirén，yéye zuì ài kàn huáijù le。
As an old person from Shanghai, Grandpa likes Huaiju Drama best.
奶奶喜欢听徽剧，高兴时还会唱上两句。

Grandma loved Hui Drama. She even sings one, or two sentences when she is happy.

Yīnwéi tūrán tíngdiàn，jùchǎng bùdébùhuíxì。
The theatre had to stop the play due to the sudden power cut.
这个剧本基本上通过了审核。
Zhège jùběn jīběnshàng tōngguò le shěnhé。
This script has basically passed examination.
洪水激剧上涨，淹没了附近的村庄。
Hóngshuǐ jījù shàngzhǎng，yānmò le fùjìn de cūnzhuāng。
The flood rapidly rose, submerging the neighboring villages.
我们吉林人都喜欢看吉剧，这是地方风俗。
Wǒmen Jílínrén dōu xǐhuan kàn jíjù，zhè shì dìfāng fēngsú。
It\'s a local custom that people in Jilin province all like watching Ji opera.
打击乐队运用了京剧锣鼓中擅长表现紧张、急促、激烈场面的“急急风”。
Dǎjīyuèduì yùnyòng le jīngjù luógǔ zhōng shàncháng biǎoxiàn jǐnzhāng、jícù、jīliè chǎngmiàn de“jíjífēng”。
The percussion band has used &quot;Ji Ji Feng&quot; (quick and lively beats) of Beijing opera that displays tense, pressing and violent situations well.
此次演出集萃了京剧界的各派名流。
Cǐcì yǎnchū jícuì le jīngjùjiè de gè pài míngliú。
Famous personalities in the Beijing opera circle have gathered together for this performance.
这部电视剧因内容真实而叫响全国。
Zhèbù diànshìjù yīn nèiróng zhēnshí ér jiàoxiǎng quánguó。
The TV series become known nation-wide as it exposes real situations.
这部热播剧要拍姐妹篇了。
Zhèbù rèbōjù yào pāi jiěmèipiān le。
This hit drama will have a sequel soon.
我非常喜欢看晋剧《打金枝》。
Wǒ fēicháng xǐhuan kàn jìnjù《Dǎjīnzhī》。
I like to watch the Shanxi opera &quot;Da Jin Zhi&quot;.
这个京剧花旦念的是京白不是韵白。

The actress speaks in a Beijing dialect in the opera rather than rhyming lines.
周信芳在京剧流派中是属于海派而不是京派。
Zhōu Xìnfāng zài jīngjù liúpài zhōng shì shǔyú hǎipài ér búshì jīngpài。
Zhou Xinfang performs in the Shanghai opera style rather than the Beijing opera style.
我们把这部电视剧的精要做成了片花。
Wǒmen bǎ zhèbù diànshìjù de jīngyào zuòchéng le piānhuā。
We made a feature drawn from the essentials of this TV drama.
他在京剧团唱净角，是个唱功了得的演员。
Tā zài jīngjùtuán chàng jìngjué，shì gè chànggōng liǎodé de yǎnyuán。
He plays a painted-face role in the Beijing opera and sings wonderfully.
他要给这部历史剧纠错。
Tā yào gěi zhèbù lìshǐjù jiūcuò。

Shāshìbǐyà de bēijù jǔshìwénmíng。
The tragedies written by Shakespeare are famous all around the world.
我正在观看普契尼的歌剧巨作《图兰多》。

Zhèbù huàjù zì shànggèyuè kāipái yǐlái，yǐjing páiliàn le xǔduō biàn le。
The stage play has been rehearsed many times since it was first rehearsed last month.

Some TV shows are full of exaggeration and lack trueness to life.
这个老太太在老龄大学里学京剧，在今年的票友大赛中还获了大奖。
Zhège lǎotàitài zài lǎolíng dàxué lǐ xué jīngjù，zài jīnnián de piàoyǒu dàsài zhōng hái huò le dàjiǎng。
The old lady learned Beijing opera at a university for senior people, and won a prize in an amateur performance contest this year.

Zhōngguó jīngjùyuàn de lǎo zhōng qīng sān dài de yǎnyuán dōu hěnchéngshú，suǒyǐ yǎnchū hěnshòu dàjiā huānyíng。
The young, middle-aged, and old actors of Chinese Peking Opera Theatre are all very mature.  Thus they are very popular among people.
梨园戏是非常古老的一个剧种，它孕育于福建泉州，流布于泉州、漳州和厦门三角地带。
Líyuánxì shì fēicháng gǔlǎo de yígè jùzhǒng，tā yùnyùyú Fújiàn Quánzhōu，liúbùyú Quánzhōu、Zhāngzhōu hé Xiàmén sānjiǎo dìdài。
Liyuan Opera is a very old type of drama. It was nurtured in Quanzhou, Fujian Province and spreaded in the triangular areas of Quanzhou, Zhangzhou, and Xiamen.
今天晚上上演的是一个历史剧。
Jīntiān wǎnshàng shàngyǎn de shì yígè lìshǐjù。

这个剧场的墙壁经过特殊处理，可以更好地拢音。

Violent crust movements always happen near the continental shelf.

Wǔtái shàng zhèngzài shàngyǎn de shì lǚjù。

Zhèpiān wénzhāng mànyì le jīngjù fāzhǎn de xiànzhuàng。

刚吃完饭不要进行剧烈运动，否则容易引发盲肠炎。

没事的时候我就喜欢看电视剧。
Méishì de shíhou wǒ jiù xǐhuan kàn diànshìjù。

他已经迷醉于京剧艺术多年了。
Tā yǐjing mízuìyú jīngjù yìshù duōnián le。
He has been fascinated by the art of Beijing opera for years.

The Miao ethnic group has their own type of traditional folk opera, which we call Miao opera.

Wǒmen tīng bùdǒng mǐnjù，kě duì nàxiē hǎokàn de fúshì huàzhuāng hěngǎn xìngqù。
We can not understand Fujian opera, but we are very interested in the beautiful clothes and cosmetics.
梅兰芳是京剧四大名旦之一。

Mei Lanfang is one of the four famous dans in Beijing opera.
剧本中的主人公就是以他为模特儿创作的！
Jùběn zhōng de zhǔréngōng jiùshì yǐ tā wéi mótèr chuàngzuò de！
He is the model for the protagonist in the play.
好友聚会时，她表演了一段京剧的南梆子唱段。

有人说南戏已经灭绝了，可是也有人说它依然生动地活在如今的瓯剧、昆曲中。

Some say that southern drama has been extinct, but others say that it still exists in the current Ou opera and Kunqu opera.
他在剧团的乐队里，是专门打铙钹的。

She plays the role of a tortured woman slave in the drama.
他的戏剧基本功不错，喷口有力、吐字清晰。

He has pretty good basic opera skills, he articulates forcefully and pronounces clearly.
今儿下午在海淀剧院有个《西游记评话》的演出。

She has learned Beijing opera since her childhood, specializing in qingyi.

Guided by a master, he sings perfect Beijing opera.
请大家遵守剧场秩序，按号入坐。
Qǐng dàjiā zūnshǒu jùchǎng zhìxù，ànhào rùzuò。
Please abide by the rules of the theater. Take your seat according to your seat number.

Ruǎnxián yǒu de shíhou yě bèi yòngyú jīngjù bànzòu。
Plucked stringed instruments are played as an accompaniment to Beijing opera sometimes.

Shàojù zuì shànyú biǎoxiàn bēizhuàng de qínggǎn。
Shao opera is good at expressing solemn and stirring emotions.
我最喜欢看那谁谁主演的电视剧了。
Wǒ zuì xǐhuan kàn nà shéi shéi zhǔyǎn de diànshìjù le。
I like soap operas starring those actors, you know who I mean.
戏剧里，元帅升帐点兵时都要发放令旗令箭。
Xìjù lǐ，yuánshuài shēngzhàng diǎnbīng shí dōuyào fāfàng lìngqí lìngjiàn。
In theatrical operas, whenever a marshal gathers and reviews his subordinates, flags or arrows used as a token of authority will be given out.
这两个剧种分属于不同的声腔体系。
Zhè liǎnggè jùzhǒng fēnshǔyú bùtóng de shēngqiāng tǐxì。
These two operas belong to different vocal systems.
我师爷是著名的京剧老生演员。
Wǒ shīyé shì zhùmíng de jīngjù lǎoshēng yǎnyuán。
The father of my teacher is a famous actor  playing elderly male characters in Beijing opera.
现在的剧本经常以设置悬念来吸引观众，而悬念经常是在时空变换上下功夫的。
Xiànzài de jùběn jīngcháng yǐ shèzhì xuánniàn lái xīyǐn guānzhòng，ér xuánniàn jīngcháng shì zài shíkōng biànhuàn shàng xià gōngfu de。
Today\'s plays often use suspense to attract audiences, and suspense is often created through changes in space and time.
从电视剧中我们经常能见到持手板朝见皇帝的大臣。
Cóng diànshìjù zhōng wǒmen jīngcháng néng jiàndào chí shǒubǎn cháojiàn huángdì de dàchén。
We can often see ministers holding a tablet when having an audience with an emperor in TV serials.
剧本中就是这么说的：窦娥受冤屈死，三桩誓愿件件应验。
Jùběn zhōng jiùshì zhème shuō de：Dòué shòuyuān qūsǐ，sān zhuāng shìyuàn jiànjiàn yìngyàn。
The play tells that Dou E died in injustice, but her wishes all came true.
剧场门外的水牌上刚写出梅兰芳的演出预告，票就被抢购一空了。
Jùchǎng ménwài de shuǐpái shàng gāng xiěchū Méi Lánfāng de yǎnchū yùgào，piào jiù bèi qiǎnggòuyìkōng le。
The moment the announcement of Mei Lanfang\'s performance was written on the billboard outside the theater, tickets sold out in a rush.
他在京剧院司职乐队鼓师。
Tā zài jīngjùyuàn sīzhí yuèduì gǔshī。
He acts as a band drum teacher in a Beijing opera theatre.
少女思春是很正常的事情，杜丽娘要是不怀春就没有《牡丹亭》这部盖世绝剧。
Shàonǚ sīchūn shì hěnzhèngcháng de shìqing，Dù Lìniáng yàoshì bùhuáichūn jiù méiyǒu《Mǔdāntíng》 zhèbù gàishì juéjù。
It is normal for a girl to yearn for love. There wouldn\'t have been the unrivalled play The Peony Pavilion but for Du Liniang\'s desire for love.
苏剧是由叙事体的滩簧说唱演变而来的。
Sūjù shì yóu xùshìtǐ de tānhuáng shuōchàng yǎnbiàn ér lái de。
Suzhou opera originated from the narrative genre of talking and singing accompanied by stringed and percussion instruments.
梅兰芳先生可称京剧界的泰山北斗。
Méi Lánfāng xiānshēng kě chēng jīngjùjiè de tàishān běidǒu。
Mr. Mei Lanfang can be called the foremost actor of Beijing Opera.
那个剧场的门是弹簧门。
Nàge jùchǎng de mén shì tánhuángmén。
The theatre has a swinging door.
我最喜欢看这种探案的电视剧了。
Wǒ zuì xǐhuan kàn zhèzhǒng tànàn de diànshìjù le。
I love such detective TV series the most.
这个恶作剧不知道是哪个淘气鬼搞的。
Zhège èzuòjù bùzhīdào shì nǎ gè táoqìguǐ gǎo de。
I don\'t know which mischievous imp has created this practical joke.
缓缓落下的帏幕表明舞台剧已经结束了。
Huǎnhuǎn luòxià de wěimù biǎomíng wǔtáijù yǐjing jiéshù le。
The gradually falling heavy curtain showed that the live theatre had ended.
暗红色的帷幔缓缓落下，音乐剧也演完了。
Ànhóngsè de wéimàn huǎnhuǎn luòxià，yīnyuèjù yě yǎnwán le。
The dark red heavy curtain is falling down slowly, the music show is over.
县里的剧团两天后将到我们镇举行文场表演。
Xiàn lǐ de jùtuán liǎngtiān hòu jiāng dào wǒmén zhèn jǔxíng wénchǎng biǎoyǎn。
The town troupe will come to our village, and give us a wenchang performance. Wenchang is a kind of ballad singing in which several people sing, and perform together.
姐姐年轻的时候是京剧团的著名武旦。
Jiějie niánqīng de shíhou shì jīngjùtuán de zhùmíng wǔdàn。
My sister was a famous opera acrobatic-fighting actress when she was young.
老王将担任这部话剧的舞台美术指导。
Lǎo wáng jiāng dānrèn zhèbù huàjù de wǔtái měishù zhǐdǎo。

加剧紧张局势

shìchǎng jìngzhēng rì yì jiājù

这名剧作家为这部电影编写了剧本。
The story is derived from a play by Shakespeare.
这个故事是根据莎士比亚的戏剧改编的。
She authored this play.
Tā biānxiěle zhè chū jù。
她编写了这出剧。
This story would lend itself well to serialization on television.
Zhège gùshi hěn shìhé gǎibiān wéi diànshìliánxùjù。
这个故事很适合改编为电视连续剧。
String up these songs and you\'ll have a musical.

把这些歌曲串起来，你就编写出一部音乐剧了。
The play is original; not an adaptation.
Zhè bù jù shì yuánchuàng de，búshì gǎibiān de。

Qù jīnghuá qiúxué shì gǔdài xǔduō xuézǐ de mèngxiǎng。
In ancient times, going to study in the capital was the dream of most scholars.
很多人梦想着自己可以中巨奖。
Hěnduōrén mèngxiǎng zhe zìjǐ kěyǐ zhòng jùjiǎng。
Many people dream of winning a huge prize.
成为空中小姐是多少姑娘的梦想呀！
Chéngwéi kōngzhōng xiǎojiě shì duōshǎo gūniang de mèngxiǎng ya！
Many girls dream of being stewardesses.
乘坐太空船遨游太空是小明童年的梦想。
Chéngzuò tàikōngchuán áoyóu tàikōng shì Xiǎo Míng tóngnián de mèngxiǎng。
It was Xiaoming\'s dream as a child to travel through space in a spacecraft.
小明从小就梦想着成为一个太空人。
Xiǎo Míng cóng xiǎo jiù mèngxiǎng zhe chéngwéi yígè tàikōngrén。
Since he was a little boy, Xiaoming has been dreaming of becoming an astronaut when he grows up.
建国勋业是一个男人的梦想。
Jiànguó xūnyè shì yígè nánrén de mèngxiǎng。

她的梦想就是去中欧读书。

Her dream is to study in the middle of Europe.

He achieved his dreams through hard work.
不奋斗就能成功，简直是梦想！
Bú fèndòu jiù néng chénggōng，jiǎnzhí shì mèngxiǎng！

《红楼梦》在中国文学史上占有重要位置。
《Hónglóumèng》zài Zhōngguó wénxuéshǐshàng zhànyǒu zhòngyào wèizhi。
A Dream of the Red Mansions occupies an important place in the history of Chinese literature.
《红楼梦》中，刘姥姥在大观园里是人们眼中的宝货。
《Hónglóumèng》zhōng，Liú lǎolao zài dàguānyuán lǐ shì rénmen yǎnzhōng de bǎohuò。
In &quot;A Dream of Red Mansions&quot;, Grandma Liu is a laughing stock in the eyes of many in the Grand Garden.
参校《红楼梦》是一件相当繁琐的事。
Cānxiào《Hónglóumèng》 shì yíjiàn xiāngdāng fánsuǒ de shì。
Checking the versions of Dream of the Red Chamber is a demanding task.
这部繁本《红楼梦》，是我最喜爱的一部书。
Zhèbù fánběn《Hónglóumèng》，shì wǒ zuì xǐ\'ài de yíbù shū。
This full edition of A Dream of the Red Mansion is one of my favorite books.
《红楼梦》（曹雪芹）第十七回：“一年三百六十日，风刀霜剑严相逼。”
《Hónglóumèng》（Cáo Xuěqín）dìshíqīhuí：“yìnián sānbǎi liùshírì，fēngdāo shuāngjiàn yánxiāngbī。”
&quot;I am surrounded by the knives of wind and swords of frost 360 days a year.&quot;--A Dream of the Red Chamber, chapter 17.
话说红楼梦中的十二金钗，个个都是天仙一样的人儿。
Huàshuō hónglóumèng zhōng de shíèr jīnchāi，gègè dōushì tiānxiān yíyàng de rénr。

A Dream of Red Mansions is a beautiful gemstone in the vast literature collection.
《红楼梦》里的平儿，是王熙凤的陪房丫环。

Ping\'er in the novel &quot;A Dream of the Red Mansions&quot;, is a maid servant brought by the bride from her parents\' home.

Mínjǐng de fǎnpá gōngzuò jì xīnkǔ yòu yǒu yídìng de wēixiǎnxìng。
The police\'s actions against thieves are both difficult and risky.
他是个民警，时常挂怀着自己辖区的孤寡老人。
Tā shì gè mínjǐng，shícháng guàhuái zhe zìjǐ xiáqū de gūguǎ lǎorén。
As a civilian policeman, he always thinks about the old people with no family that live in his district.
这个辖区的民警特别关心孤寡老人的寒暖，经常来看望他们，帮他们解决困难。
Zhège xiáqū de mínjǐng tèbié guānxīn gūguǎ lǎorén de hánnuǎn，jīngcháng lái kànwàng tāmen，bāng tāmen jiějué kùnnan。
The police in these districts are very concerned about the life of elderly without children.  They visit them frequently, and solve problems for them.
她嚎叫着把上门解决矛盾的民警赶了出去。
Tā háojiào zhe bǎ shàngmén jiějué máodùn de mínjǐng gǎn le chūqù。
She howled, and drove the police away when they came to solve the conflict.
无论遇到什么困难，你都可以求助于人民警察。
Wúlùn yùdào shénme kùnnan，nǐ dōu kěyǐ qiúzhùyú rénmín jǐngchá。
You can turn to the people\'s police for help, no matter what kind of trouble you are in.
当你到一个陌生的地方不认识路的时候，可以向民警问路。
Dāng nǐ dào yígè mòshēng de dìfāng bú rènshi lù de shíhou，kěyǐ xiàng mínjǐng wènlù。
When you are lost in an unknown place, you can ask the police for directions.
面对凶顽的歹徒，勇敢的民警毫不畏惧。
Miànduì xiōngwán de dǎitú，yǒnggǎn de mínjǐng háobú wèijù。
Facing the dangerous gangsters, the brave policemen were not frightened at all.
民警们毫不畏惧，勇敢地抓捕凶顽。
Mínjǐngmen háobú wèijù，yǒnggǎn de zhuābǔ xiōngwán。
The policemen had no fear, courageously running after the gangsters.
接到居民报案后，警察以偷窃嫌疑将他逮捕。

After a report from a local resident, the police arrested him on suspicion of theft.
警方把这个犯罪团伙一举摧毁，真是为民除害，大快人心。
Jǐngfāng bǎ zhège fànzuì tuánhuǒ yìjǔ cuīhuǐ，zhēnshì wèimín chúhài，dàkuài rénxīn。

The police are chasing an extremely vicious escaped criminal with all their resources.

We must take improvements to stream the forceline.

保持警觉
bǎochí jǐngjué
maintain vigilance
一人出门在外必须提高警觉。
Yì rén chūménzàiwài bìxū tígāo jǐngjué.
Anyone going out alone should be extra vigilant.
仓库里存着贵重货物，咱们晚上睡觉要警醒些。

警觉

警觉地注视着敌人的动静。

警觉性。
to view {or} regard sth with alarm
警觉地看待某事物
to alert sb to sth
使某人对某事警觉
on the alert (for sth)
(对某事)警觉

我喜欢警觉、忠诚并且活跃的狗。

My dad never misses a trick with our problems.

发出警告
fāchū jǐnggào
send out a warning
我警告你，你再这样就没你的好。
Wǒ jǐnggào nǐ，nǐ zài zhèyàngjiù méi nǐ de hǎo。
I\'m warning you, if you do that again there\'ll be trouble.
给予警告处分
jǐyǔ jǐnggào chǔfèn
give sb. a disciplinary warning
提出警告
tíchū jǐnggào 
give (or serve) a warning
无视我方的警告
wúshì wǒ fāng de jǐnggào 
in defiance of our warning
预先警告
yùxiān jǐnɡɡào 
forewarn
警告
jǐnggào
warn; caution; admonish

míngqiāng jǐnggào
fire a warning shot

他向地区检察官发出了警告。
It was a humorless wink; a wink of warning.
Zhè búshì yōumò de zhǎyǎn；zhè shì jǐnggào de zhǎyǎn。
这不是幽默的眨眼；这是警告的眨眼。
The flashings of pain were a warning.
Yízhènzhèn de cìtòng shì yí gè jǐnggào。
一阵阵的刺痛是一个警告。
The warning was to beware of surprises.
Nà xiàng jǐnggào de nèiróng shì xiǎoxīn yìwài jīngxǐ。
那项警告的内容是小心意外惊喜。
The US warned Beijing against taking retaliatory action.
Měiguó jǐnggào Zhōngguó búyào cǎiqǔ bàofù xíngdòng。
美国警告中国不要采取报复行动。
Issuing admonitions about the dollar is easy.
duì měiyuán fāchū jǐnggào shífēn róngyì。
对美元发出警告十分容易。
The policeman told him not to speed when driving in the city.
警察告诉他不要在城市里超速行驶。
She reported her husband to the police.
她向警方告发了自己的丈夫。
I figure the bastard sold me out to the cops.
我觉得那混蛋向警方告发了我。

他姐姐向警方告发了他。

The report from the police is receiving careful consideration.
Jǐngfāng de bàogào zhèng bèi zǐxì kǎolǜ。
警方的报告正被仔细考虑。
The police claimed the police car at the shooting scene had bullet holes from shots fired by the accused.
警察称，警车上的弹孔是被告造成的，他在枪击现场向警车开了枪。

一位警方的人士告诉记者，银行抢劫犯劫持了一名人质。
