但是警察局的报告对该证据作出了不同的解读。
He informed the commander of the police district of the situation.
Tā xiàng zhège jǐng qū de zhǎngguān tōnggàole zhège qíngkuàng。
他向这个警区的长官通告了这个情况。
They told us the police had surrounded the building.
Tāmen gàosu wǒmen jǐngchá yǐjīng bāowéile zhè dòng lóu。
他们告诉我们警察已经包围了这栋楼。
The defendant claimed he was set up by the police.
Gāi bèi gào shēng chēng ，tā shì bèi jǐngchá xiànhài de。
该被告声称，他是被警察陷害的。
The police must first order the respondent to stop the nuisance.
Jǐngchá bìxū shǒuxiān mìnglìng bèigào tíngzhǐ shānghài xíngwéi。
警察必须首先命令被告停止伤害行为。
The police and courts are required to give the accused due process.
Jǐngchá hé fǎyuàn dōu bìxū jǐyǔ bèigào fǎdìngchéngxù。
警察和法院都必须给予被告法定程序。
All police officers are required to fill out reports after a discharge of their weapons.

制式警服
zhìshì jǐngfú 
standard policeman\'s uniform
领花是军警制服领子上的标志。
Lǐnghuā shì jūnjǐng zhìfú lǐngzi shàng de biāozhì。
Collar badges are symbols on the collars of military police’s uniforms.
这位穿便服的警察身手骁健。

The police officer in his casual clothes is very brave.
值守在报警服务台前。
A uniformed officer handcuffed her and threw her in a squad car.
一个穿警服的警察拷上她，然后把她扔进了警车。
The police caved in to political pressure.
Jǐngchá qūfú yú zhèngzhì yālì。
警察屈服于政治压力。
He had previously seen service in the Oxford City Police.
Xiānqián tā céng bèi kànjiàn zài Niújīn Shì jǐngchájú fúyì。
先前他曾被看见在牛津市警察局服役。
The policeman downed the heavily armed suspect.
Jǐngchá zhìfú le quánfùwǔzhuāng de yífàn。
警察制服了全副武装的疑犯。
Uniformed policemen lined the President\'s route.

穿制服的警察站在总统要经过的道路的两旁。

The policemen were unable to get up for lack of uniforms，or to stay in bed for lack of beds.

由于制服不够，警察没法打扮自己；又由于床位不够无法休息。
People working for big organizations like the police and the postal service wear a uniform.
在大型单位工作的人，比如警察和邮电业服务人员，都需要穿统一的制服。
Police used a sternutatory to subdue the mob.
Jǐngchá shǐyòng cuītìjì zhìfú le bàotú。
警察使用催嚏剂制服了暴徒。
The orderly laid out the general\'s uniform.

It was not until the third time the police came to the scene that they caught the whole criminal group in action.

The Hong Kong Police seized a number of pornographic video tapes in a recent sweep.
警方正在这片树林查缉一名逃犯。

The police are searching the woods for an escaped criminal.
警方对全市的盗版图书进行了一次集中查缴。
Jǐngfāng duì quánshì de dàobǎn túshū jìnxíng le yícì jí zhōng chájiǎo。
The police are making a concentrated effort to confiscate pirated books across city.
警方查截一辆大货车，发现了很多走私物资。

The police detained a large truck and found many smuggled goods.
警方正在对附近的区域进行查控。

The police are keeping the surrounding area under surveillance.
如发现违禁货物，警方有权查扣。

警方查抄了很多盗版图书。
Jǐngfāng cháchāo le hěnduō dàobǎn túshū。
The police confiscated many pirated books.
这批非法物资已经被警方抄没了。
Zhè pī fēifǎ wùzī yǐjing bèi jǐngfāng chāomò le。
This batch of illegal goods has been confiscated by the police.
警方决心彻查这批假药的来源。
Jǐngfāng juéxīn chèchá zhè pī jiǎyào de láiyuán。
The police are determined to thoroughly investigate the source of the counterfeit medicine.
警方正在调查他吃赃的事情。
Jǐngfāng zhèngzài diàochá tā chīzhāng de shìqing。
The police are investigating his bribery case.
警方把这个犯罪团伙一举摧毁，真是为民除害，大快人心。

警方拘捕了这些聚众闹事的刁棍。

警方施放了毒气弹，把劫匪逼出了屋子。

The police used poisonous gas to force the robbers out of the house.
警方已经封堵了边境线上的各个路口，严防罪犯逃往市外。
Jǐngfāng yǐjing fēngdǔ le biānjìngxiàn shàng de gègè lùkǒu，yánfáng zuìfàn táowǎng shìwài。
The police have blocked all the roads of the border to prevent the criminals from running away to another city.
为了坚决打击偷渡犯罪，警方建立了严密的海上封锁线。

警方发现了销售盗版光盘的黑线。

警方在他的家里发现了大量贿金。

The police asked these troublemakers to make a statement of repentance.
这伙抢银行的狂徒已经被警方擒获了。

今天警方第三次提讯了这个嫌犯。

The police interrogated the suspected criminal for the third time today.

The police arrested one principal criminal and two accomplices.
警方精心布置，一举捣毁了这个传销窝点。

经过侦察，警方认为小王是这个案子最大的嫌疑人。

After investigation, the police are sure that Xiao Wang is the most likely suspect in the case.
警方去取证了，经过多方了解还是一无所获。

只要能够为警方提供有价值的信息，都有奖。

他作为知情人，给警方提供了很多破案线索。

As an insider, he has provided the police with many valuable sources for solving cases.
警方一直在监听罪犯。

The police are continuously monitoring criminals.

wúshì wǒ fāng de jǐnggào

当你到一个陌生的地方不认识路的时候，可以向民警问路。

The actress abused the policeman who gave her a parking ticket.

这名女演员破口大骂那个给她开了停车违章罚款单的警察。
Even though he only gave the thief a ride in his car, the police arrested him for being an accessory to the crime.
Suīrán tā jǐnjǐn shì yòng zìjǐ de chē sòngle xiǎotōu yì chéng，dàn jǐngchá háishì yǐ cóngfàn de míngyì dàibǔle tā。
虽然他仅仅是用自己的车送了小偷一程，但警察还是以从犯的名义逮捕了他。
Police say a car containing three men drew up outside the house in Hudson Street.
Jǐngchá shuō nà liàng zàiyǒu sān gè rén de chēzi zài Hādéxùnjiē de fángzi chù tíngle xiàlái。
警察说那辆载有三个人的车子在哈德逊街的房子处停了下来。
Police have confiscated a gun after shots were fired at a family in their car.
Dāng yǒu rén cháo zuòzài chēnèi de yìjiārén shèjī zhīhòu，jǐngfāng mòshōule yì bǎ qiāng。
当有人朝坐在车内的一家人射击之后，警方没收了一把枪。
I called the cops to see if they could send a patrol car out just to check it out.
Wǒ dǎ diànhuà gěi jǐngchá，kàn tāmen néngfǒu pài yí liàng xúnluóchē guòqù kànkàn。
我打电话给警察，看他们能否派一辆巡逻车过去看看。
They drove north out of the city, the guard, with his ever-present shadow, at the wheel.
Jǐngwèi hé tā tiēshēn de dādàng kòngzhìzhe kāichē，cóng běimiàn chū chéng le。
警卫和他贴身的搭档控制着开车，从北面出城了。
If you race on the roads the police may try to book you for dangerous driving.
Rúguǒ nǐ zài mǎlù shàng biāochē，jiù kěnéng yīn zhèzhǒng wēixiǎn jiàshǐ xíngwéi bèi jǐngchá jìlùzài\'àn。
如果你在马路上飚车，就可能因这种危险驾驶行为被警察记录在案。
Stolen valuables ranging from jewellery to model trains have been put on display by police.
Jǐngchá zhǎnshìle bèi dào de guìzhòngwùpǐn，cóng zhūbǎo dào móxíng huǒchē dōu yǒu。
警察展示了被盗的贵重物品，从珠宝到模型火车都有。
昨天警察局门口竟发生了一起枪战。
Zuótiān jǐngchájú ménkǒu jìng fāshēng le yì qǐ qiāngzhàn。
There was a gun battle in front of the doorway of the police station yesterday.
叔叔是市公安局刑事警察大队的大队长。
Shūshu shì shì gōng\'ānjú xíngshì jǐngchá dàduì de dàduìzhǎng。
Uncle is chief of the criminal police of the city police bureau.
the police department
警察局
wanted by the police
警察局通缉的(人)
At the police station the burglar denied all responsibility in the crime.
窃贼在警察局拒不承担罪责。
At the police station I saw plenty of pictures but nobody was answering the description.
我在警察局看了很多照片，但没有一个人与描述相符。
They took him to the police station.
他们把他带到了警察局。
After the robbery, the chief of police came to ask some questions.
劫案之后，警察局长过来问了些问题。
You should go due north to find the police station.
你朝正北方向走就能找到警察局。
The thieves had been shot on the order of a local police captain.
Zhèxiē xiǎotōu bèi yí wèi dāngdì jǐngchá júzhǎng xiàlìng qiāngshā le。
这些小偷被一位当地警察局长下令枪杀了。
He must have powerful connections in the police.
Tā yídìng zài jǐngchájú yǒu hěn qiáng de guānxi。
他一定在警察局有很强的关系。
His former associate sold him out to the police.
Tā yǐqián de tóngshì chūmàile tā，jiāng tā sòngjìnle jǐngchájú。
他以前的同事出卖了他，将他送进了警察局。
This police station provided the setting for the famous television series
Jǐngchájú wèi zhè bù zhùmíng de diànshìjù tígōngle gùshi chǎngjǐng。
警察局为这部著名的电视剧提供了故事场景。
The officers saw the girls soliciting and brought them to a police station.
Guānyuánmen kànzhe nǚhái men lākè，jiù bǎ tāmen dàidàole jǐngchájú。
官员们看着女孩们拉客，就把她们带到了警察局。
Yet the police reports suggest a different interpretation of the evidence.
Dànshì jǐngchájú de bàogào duì gāi zhèngjù zuòchūle bùtóng de jiědú。
但是警察局的报告对该证据作出了不同的解读。
He tried to flee from the police in a stolen car.
Tā qǐtú jiàshǐ yí liàng tōulái de chē cóng jǐngchájú táozǒu。
他企图驾驶一辆偷来的车从警察局逃走。
Dennis is locked up in a police cell for fraud.
Dānnísī yīnwèi qīzhà xíngwéi bèi guānyā lǐ jǐngchájú lǐ。
丹尼斯因为欺诈行为被关押里警察局里。
The criminal was pulled in the station.
Zuìfàn bèi jūliú jìn le Jǐngchájú。
罪犯被拘留进了警察局。
The mafia boss wanted to put the fear of God into the police chief.
Hēishǒudǎng lǎobǎn xiǎng xiàxià jǐngchá júzhǎng。
黑手党老板想吓吓警察局长。
My father retired from the police service in December.
Wǒ fùqīn shí\'èr yuè cóng jǐngchájú tuìxiū le。
我父亲十二月从警察局退休了。
He had previously seen service in the Oxford City Police.
Xiānqián tā céng bèi kànjiàn zài Niújīn Shì jǐngchájú fúyì。
先前他曾被看见在牛津市警察局服役。
Instead of walking him round the beat，he should have taken him straight to the police station.
Tā bù yīnggāi bǎ tā dàidào xúnluóqū，érshì yīnggāi zhíjiē sòngdào jǐngchájú。
他不应该把他带到巡逻区，而是应该直接送到警察局。
The police decided that the crime was an inside job.
Jǐngchájú pàndìng nà qǐ fànzuì shì jiānshǒu-zìdào。
警察局判定那起犯罪是监守自盗。
a police station
警察分局
The commissioner made visitations to all the precinct stations.
Nà wèi zhuānyuán shìchále suǒyǒu jǐngjú。
那位专员视察了所有警局。
谁记住那位勇治歹徒的警察的警号了？
Shéi jìzhù nà wèi yǒngzhì dǎitú de jǐngchá de jǐnghào le？
Who can remember the police ID of the policeman who caught the gangster?
这位老警察的警龄已有30年。
Zhèwèi lǎojǐngchá de jǐnglíng yǐ yǒu sānshí nián。
This old policeman has worked as a policeman for 30 years.
警察鸣枪警告。
Jǐngchá míngqiāng jǐnggào.
The police fired a warning shot.
巡逻的警察都佩戴了电警棍。
Xúnluó de jǐngchá dōu pèidài le diànjǐnggùn。
Patrolling policemen are all equipped with electric sticks.
警察用枪比着罪犯。
Jǐngchá yòng qiāng bǐ zhe zuìfàn。
The policeman pointed his gun at the criminal.
便衣警察
biànyī jǐngchá 
plainclothes policeman
警察火速赶到现场。
Jǐngchá huǒsù gǎndào xiànchǎng。
The police rushed to the scene.
缉毒警察
jīdú jǐngchá 
narcotics agent; narcocop
警察即刻出发，火速赶到出事现场。
Jǐngchá jíkè chūfā，huǒsù gǎndào chūshì xiànchǎng。
The police left immediately, and rushed to the scene of the accident.
警察找不到任何人作见证。
Jǐngchá zhǎo bu dào rènhé rén zuò jiànzhèng。
The police could find no eyewitnesses.
警察在车站戒严，搜捕逃犯。
Jǐngchá zài chēzhàn jièyán，sōubǔ táofàn。
The police cordoned off the railway station to search for the escape prisoner.
小偷往街上跑，警察在后面紧追。
Xiǎotōu wǎngjiē shàngpǎo，jǐngchá zài hòumiàn jǐn zhuī。
The thief ran down the street with a policeman in hot pursuit.
女警察
nǚ jǐnɡchá
policewoman
他的牌证表明他是个警察。
Tā de páizhèngbiǎomíngtā shì gè jǐngchá。
The badge he wears shows he is a policeman.
塑造一个女警察的英雄形象
sùzào yígè nǚ jǐngchá de yīngxióng xíng xiàng
portray a heroic policewoman
警察跟踪追击，罪犯无处逃遁。
Jǐngchá gēnzōng zhuījī，zuìfàn wúchù táodùn。
Being hotly pursued by the police, the criminal could find no refuge.
在岗警察
zàigǎngjǐngchá
policeman on duty
惯于侦看神色的警察
guànyú zhēnkàn shénsè de jǐngchá 
policeman on the watch for suspicious signs
这个把风的小偷见到警察来了撒腿就跑，扔下同伙不管了。
Zhège bǎfēng de xiǎotōu jiàndào jǐngchá lái le sātuǐ jiù pǎo，rēngxià tónghuǒ bùguǎn le。
The thief\'s accomplise ran away at the sight of the police, abandoning his watch and his friend.
警察盯着站在背眼处的那几个人已经好久了。
Jǐngchá dīng zhe zhàn zài bèiyǎnchù de nà jǐgè rén yǐjing hǎojiǔ le。
The policeman has watched the men who stood in the hidden corners for quite a while.
警察在犯罪嫌疑人身上搜出了勃朗宁。
Jǐngchá zài fànzuì xiányírén shēnshàng sōuchū le bólǎngníng。
The police found a Browing from the suspect.
警察将不法之徒当场抓获。
Jǐngchá jiāng bùfǎ zhī tú dāngchǎng zhuāhuò。
The police arrested the lawbreaker.
罪犯在踩点时就已经被警察注意上了。
Zuìfàn zài cǎidiǎn shí jiù yǐjing bèi jǐngchá zhùyì shàng le。
The law breaker was spotted by the police when he was casing the site.
被警察带走的时候，他甚至没有面露惭色。
Bèi jǐngchá dàizǒu de shíhou，tā shènzhì méiyǒu miànlòu cánsè。
There wasn\'t even a look of shame on his face when he was taken away by the police.
这位英勇的人民警察惨遭歹徒的杀害。
Zhèwèi yīngyǒng de rénmín jǐngchá cǎnzāo dǎitú de shāhài。
This brave policeman was cruelly murdered by the scoundrels.
每天晚上都有很多警察在全市的大街小巷进行查巡。
Měitiān wǎnshàng dōu yǒu hěnduō jǐngchá zài quánshì de dàjiē xiǎo xiàng jìnxíng cháxún。
Every night, many policemen patrol the streets and alleys of the city.
警察及时地击毙了持枪歹徒，确保了人质的安全。
Jǐngchá jíshí de jībì le chíqiāng dǎitú，quèbǎo le rénzhì de ānquán。
In time the police killed the gunmen, and secured the safety of the hostage.
警察叱令劫匪放下手中的枪。
Jǐngchá chìlìng jiéfěi fàngxià shǒu zhōng de qiāng。
Police yelled at the robbers, ordering them to put down their guns.
警察在毒贩出货的时候将他们抓获。
Jǐngchá zài dúfàn chūhuò de shíhou jiāng tāmen zhuāhuò。
The police arrested the drug dealers in the act.
警察一眼就识破了他们串谋作伪证的伎俩。
Jǐngchá yìyǎn jiù shípò le tāmen chuànmóu zuò wěizhèng de jìliǎng。
The police immediately saw through their trick of collaborating to give false testimony.
警察一举查抄了这个赌点。
Jǐngchá yìjǔ cháchāo le zhège dǔdiǎn。
The police demolished the illegal gambling den during a raid.
警察没收了所有的赌资和赌具。
Jǐngchá mòshōu le suǒyǒu de dǔzī hé dǔjù。
The police confiscated all the gambling money and gambling equipment.
小偷故技重施，被守候在一旁的便衣警察抓了个正着。
Xiǎotōu gùjì chóngshī，bèi shǒuhòu zài yìpáng de biànyī jǐngchá zhuā le gè zhèngzháo。
When trying the same old trick, the thief was caught by the plainclothes policeman waiting at the side.
在警察赶来前，他成功地毁证。
Zài jǐngchá gǎnlái qián，tā chénggōng de huǐzhèng。
He successfully destroyed the evidence before the police arrived.
警察抓他时他非常后悔，但已是江心补漏，为时已晚。
Jǐngchá zhuā tā shí tā fēicháng hòuhuǐ，dàn yǐshì jiāngxīn bǔlòu，wéishí yǐwǎn。
He felt deeply regretful when he was arrested by the police, but it was too late for him to mend his ways.
交通岛上的警察正在指挥交通。
Jiāotōngdǎo shàng de jǐngchá zhèngzài zhǐhuī jiāotōng。
The policeman is commanding traffic on the traffic island.
交通警察正在突击检查违规车辆。
Jiāotōng jǐngchá zhèngzài tūjī jiǎnchá wéiguī chēliàng。
Traffic policemen are having a surprise inspection of cars that violate traffic regulations.
这张照片展现出了这位女警察娇柔的一面。
Zhèzhāng zhàopiàn zhǎnxiànchū le zhèwèi nǚjǐngchá jiāoróu de yí miàn。
This photo reveals the gentle side of the policewoman.
警察在他们的老窝中发现了十几支手枪和几百发子弹。
Jǐngchá zài tāmen de lǎowō zhōng fāxiàn le shí jǐ zhī shǒuqiāng hé jǐ bǎi fā zǐdàn。
The police found more than ten guns, and several hundred bullets in their nest.
这个小偷已经是第5次被警察抓住了，真是累教不改。
Zhège xiǎotōu yǐjing shì dìwǔcì bèi jǐngchá zhuāzhù le，zhēnshì lěijiào bùgǎi。
This thief has been caught by the police five times. What a person who refuses to mend his ways, despite  repeated punishment.
警察一声喝斥，吓得犯罪分子落荒而逃。
Jǐngchá yìshēng hēchì，xià de fànzuìfènzǐ luòhuāng ér táo。
The criminals fled in panic after the shout of the police.
在警察赶到之前，他已经跟歹徒扭扯到了一起。
Zài jǐngchá gǎndào zhīqián，tā yǐjing gēn dǎitú niǔchědào le yìqǐ。
He scuffled with the gangster before the police arrived.
站在那条平交公路上的警察，是我儿时的伙伴。
Zhànzài nà tiáo píngjiāo gōnglù shàng de jǐngchá，shì wǒ érshí de huǒbàn。
The policeman standing at the crossroads is my childhood friend.
机智的警察在匪徒掏枪的瞬间将其扑倒，避免了伤亡。
Jīzhì de jǐngchá zài fěitú tāoqiāng de shùnjiān jiāng qí pūdǎo，bìmiǎn le shāngwáng。
The wise policeman threw himself at the gangster and knocked him down just as he was pulling out the gun, avoiding injuries and deaths.
昨天警察局门口竟发生了一起枪战。
Zuótiān jǐngchájú ménkǒu jìng fāshēng le yì qǐ qiāngzhàn。
There was a gun battle in front of the doorway of the police station yesterday.
尽管逃犯再三躲藏，最终还是被警察擒获。
Jìnguǎn táofàn zàisān duǒcáng，zuìzhōng háishi bèi jǐngchá qínhuò。
Though hiding again and again, the escaped criminal was eventually arrested by the police.
无论遇到什么困难，你都可以求助于人民警察。
Wúlùn yùdào shénme kùnnan，nǐ dōu kěyǐ qiúzhùyú rénmín jǐngchá。
You can turn to the people\'s police for help, no matter what kind of trouble you are in.
这几个犯罪分子还算老实，警察一到，他们就束手就擒了。
Zhè jǐgè fànzuìfènzǐ hái suàn lǎoshi，jǐngchá yídào，tāmen jiù shùshǒujiùqín le。
These criminals were somewhat docile. Once the policemen came, they allowed themselves to be seized without putting up a fight.
小偷刚刚把钱包偷到手就被警察逮住了，真是螳螂捕蝉，黄雀在后呀！
Xiǎotōu gānggāng bǎ qiánbāo tōu dàoshǒu jiù bèi jǐngchá dǎizhù le，zhēnshì tángláng bǔchán，huángquè zàihòu ya！
No sooner had the thief stolen the wallet, than he was caught by the police. As the saying goes: coveting the gains ahead, unaware of danger behind.
这名警察因玩忽职守罪被判了刑。
Zhè míng jǐngchá yīn wánhū zhíshǒuzuì bèi pàn le xíng。
This policeman was punished for his dereliction of duty.
警察从他的旅行包里搜出了违禁品。
Jǐngchá cóng tā de lǚxíngbāo lǐ sōuchū le wéijìnpǐn。
The police have discovered out some contraband goods in his traveling bag.
这位穿便服的警察身手骁健。
Zhèwèi chuān biànfú de jǐngchá shēnshǒu xiāojiàn。
The police officer in his casual clothes is very brave.
小偷正为偷到手机而得意，却没想到斜刺里杀出两个警察。
Xiǎotōu zhèng wèi tōudào shǒujī ér déyì，què méi xiǎngdào xiécì lǐ shāchū liǎnggè jǐngchá。
The thief was feeling glad about stealing a mobile phone when he was caught by two policemen.
警校毕业后他就当了一名刑事警察。
Jǐngxiào bìyè hòu tā jiù dāng le yìmíng xíngshì jǐngchá。
He became a criminal policeman after graduating from the Police Academy.
警察正在调查小张凶死的原因。
Jǐngchá zhèngzài diàochá Xiǎo Zhāng xiōngsǐ de yuányīn。
The police are investigating the cause of Xiao Zhang\'s violent death.
警察在寻究事情的起因，大家都沉默。
Jǐngchá zài xún jiū shìqing de qǐyīn，dàjiā dōu chénmò。
When the police inquired about the cause of the matter, everyone remained silent.
你别寻事，告诉你警察就在附近。
Nǐ bié xúnshì，gàosù nǐ jǐngchá jiùzài fùjìn。
Do not look for trouble. The police are around.
在旧社会他做过巡捕，相当于现代的警察。
Zài jiù shèhuì tā zuòguò xúnbǔ，xiāngdāngyú xiàndài de jǐngchá。
What he did in the old society is something like the policeman at modern times.
你居然在警察眼皮底下偷东西，好大的胆子。
Nǐ jūrán zài jǐngchá yǎnpí dǐxià tōu dōngxi，hǎo dà de dǎnzi。
You\'re so audacious, you steal in front of the eyes of the police.
警察展开撒网式侦查，凶手无处隐遁。
Jǐngchá zhǎnkāi sāwǎngshì zhēnchá，xiōngshǒu wúchǔ yǐndùn。
The police are conducting a drag net investigation, so the murderer has no place to hide.
他驾车超速了，从反光镜里可以看到警察在后面追他。
Tā jiàchē chāosù le，cóng fǎnguāngjìng lǐ kěyǐ kàndào jǐngchá zài hòumiàn zhuī tā。
He can see that the police are right after him due to his speeding.
叔叔是市公安局刑事警察大队的大队长。
Shūshu shì shì gōng\'ānjú xíngshì jǐngchá dàduì de dàduìzhǎng。
Uncle is chief of the criminal police of the city police bureau.
警察在他的书包里检查出大量的麻醉品。
Jǐngchá zài tāde shūbāo lǐ jiǎncháchū dàliàng de mázuìpǐn。
The police found plenty of drugs in his schoolbag.
抢匪是逃不掉的，武装警察已经封锁了道路。
Qiǎngfěi shì táo búdiào de，Wǔzhuāngjǐngchá yǐjīng fēngsuǒle dàolù。

接到居民报案后，警察以偷窃嫌疑将他逮捕。

Wǒ shìtú jiào jǐngchá shí，tā wēixié wǒ。
我试图叫警察时，他威胁我。
He is in the custody of police.
Tā zhèngzài jǐngchá de kānguǎn zhī xià。
他正在警察的看管之下。
The plaza is teeming with undercover policemen.
Zhège guǎngchǎng shàng bùmǎnle biànyījǐngchá。
这个广场上布满了便衣警察。
It is a matter for the police.
Zhè shì jǐngchá de shì。
这是警察的事。
The police attempted to stop the thief.
Nàgè jǐngchá shìtú zǔzhǐ dàozéi。
那个警察试图阻止盗贼。
The burglars escaped before the police showed up.
Qièzéi zài jǐngchá dàolái zhīqián yǐjīng liūzǒu le。
窃贼在警察到来之前已经溜走了。
The police confiscated the stolen artwork.
Jǐngchá mòshōule bèi dào yìshùpǐn。
警察没收了被盗艺术品。
The actress abused the policeman who gave her a parking ticket.
Zhè míng nǚyǎnyuán pòkǒudàmà nàgè gěi tā kāile tíngchē wéizhāng fákuǎndān de jǐngchá。
这名女演员破口大骂那个给她开了停车违章罚款单的警察。
I won\'t let the police search her basement.
Wǒ búhuì ràng jǐngchá sōuchá tā de dìxiàshì。
我不会让警察搜查她的地下室。
The police took steps to reduce crime.
Jǐngchá cǎiqǔ xíngdòng lái jiǎnshǎo fànzuì。
警察采取行动来减少犯罪。
Giving a police officer a free meal may be against the law，but it seems to be a picayune infraction.
Wèi měi míng jǐngchá tígōng yí dùn miǎnfèi cān kěnéng wéifǎnfǎlǜ，dàn zhè sìhū yě búshì yánzhòng de wéiguī。
为每名警察提供一顿免费餐可能违反法律，但这似乎也不是严重的违规。
The police decided that the crime was an inside job.
Jǐngchájú pàndìng nà qǐ fànzuì shì jiānshǒu-zìdào。
警察局判定那起犯罪是监守自盗。
They found out that some policemen were in league with the criminals.
Tāmen fāxiàn mǒu xiē jǐngchá hé fànzuì tónghuǒ lángbèiwéijiān。
他们发现某些警察和犯罪同伙狼狈为奸。
Policemen stood at intervals along the curbside.
Lùbiān shàng gé yí duàn jiù zhànzhe yí gè jǐngchá。
路边上隔一段就站着一个警察。
The police were too busy to chase the pelters.
Jǐngchá tài mángle，méiyǒu zhuīgǎn tóuzhàdànzhě。
警察太忙了，没有追赶投炸弹者。
All the clues led the police into blind alleys.
Suǒyǒu zhèxiē xiànsuǒ shǐ jǐngchá xiànrù sǐhútòng。
所有这些线索使警察陷入死胡同。
Policeman patrolled the streets ahorseback.
Jǐngchá qízhe mǎ zài jiēshàng xúnluó。
警察骑着马在街上巡逻。
The police around here are not motorized and patrol the streets on horseback.

这里的警察不开汽车，而是骑马在街区巡逻。
The police made casts of the footprints in the soft earth outside the window.

警察对窗户外松软土地上的脚印做了印模。
A circle of policement stood dumbfounded by her denial of having seen the accident.

周围的警察被她否认看到事故现场的行为惊呆了。
He tried to smooth over his contretemps with the policeman.
Tā shìtú xiāochú tā yǔ jǐngchá zhījiān de chōngtū hé wùhuì。
他试图消除他与警察之间的冲突和误会。
The police are proverbially inquisitive.
Zhòngsuǒzhōuzhī，jǐngchá xǐhuan zhuīgēnjiūdǐ。
众所周知，警察喜欢追根究底。
The police are now back at square one after having arrested and released 27 men.
Jǐngchá dàibǔ bìng suíhòu shìfàngle 27 rén hòu，yòu huídàole yuándì。
警察逮捕并随后释放了27人后，又回到了原地。
He spoke in the clipped clinical monotones typical of police testimony.
Tā jiǎnghuà jiǎnduǎn ér kèguān，wánquán shì yì zhǒng diǎnxíng de jǐngchá zuòzhèng de yàngzi。
他讲话简短而客观，完全是一种典型的警察作证的样子。
The policeman answered politely,&quot;now look here, lady…&quot;.
Jǐngchá yǒu lǐmào de huídá shuō ：“zhè wèi nǚshì，kànkàn zhèli ……”

Police are the major line of defense against crime.

Two policemen were foully murdered.

zhíqín jiāotōngjǐng
policeman on point duty
制式警服
zhìshì jǐngfú 
standard policeman\'s uniform
警戒
jǐngjiè
warn; admonish
警告
jǐnggào
warn; caution; admonish
火警
huǒjǐng
fire alarm
这个把风的小偷见到警察来了撒腿就跑，扔下同伙不管了。
Zhège bǎfēng de xiǎotōu jiàndào jǐngchá lái le sātuǐ jiù pǎo，rēngxià tónghuǒ bùguǎn le。
The thief\'s accomplise ran away at the sight of the police, abandoning his watch and his friend.
英国伦敦的白厅都有特警站岗。
Yīngguó Lúndūn de báitīng dōu yǒu tèjǐng zhàngǎng。
All administrative organs in the UK are guarded by special police.
警察盯着站在背眼处的那几个人已经好久了。
Jǐngchá dīng zhe zhàn zài bèiyǎnchù de nà jǐgè rén yǐjing hǎojiǔ le。
The policeman has watched the men who stood in the hidden corners for quite a while.
门口的警卫人员笔俉的站在哨位上。
Ménkǒu de jǐngwèi rényuán bǐwù de zhàn zài shàowèi shàng。
The guards stand erect on their sentry duty in the doorway.
警察在犯罪嫌疑人身上搜出了勃朗宁。
Jǐngchá zài fànzuì xiányírén shēnshàng sōuchū le bólǎngníng。
The police found a Browing from the suspect.
警察将不法之徒当场抓获。
Jǐngchá jiāng bùfǎ zhī tú dāngchǎng zhuāhuò。
The police arrested the lawbreaker.
罪犯在踩点时就已经被警察注意上了。
Zuìfàn zài cǎidiǎn shí jiù yǐjing bèi jǐngchá zhùyì shàng le。
The law breaker was spotted by the police when he was casing the site.
被警察带走的时候，他甚至没有面露惭色。
Bèi jǐngchá dàizǒu de shíhou，tā shènzhì méiyǒu miànlòu cánsè。
There wasn\'t even a look of shame on his face when he was taken away by the police.
这位英勇的人民警察惨遭歹徒的杀害。
Zhèwèi yīngyǒng de rénmín jǐngchá cǎnzāo dǎitú de shāhài。
This brave policeman was cruelly murdered by the scoundrels.
警方正在这片树林查缉一名逃犯。
Jǐngfāng zhèngzài zhèpiàn shùlín chájī yìmíng táofàn。
The police are searching the woods for an escaped criminal.
警方对全市的盗版图书进行了一次集中查缴。
Jǐngfāng duì quánshì de dàobǎn túshū jìnxíng le yícì jí zhōng chájiǎo。
The police are making a concentrated effort to confiscate pirated books across city.
警方查截一辆大货车，发现了很多走私物资。
Jǐngfāng chájié yí liàng dàhuòchē，fāxiàn le hěnduō zǒusī wùzī。
The police detained a large truck and found many smuggled goods.
警方正在对附近的区域进行查控。
Jǐngfāng zhèngzài duì fùjìn de qūyù jìnxíng chákòng。
The police are keeping the surrounding area under surveillance.
如发现违禁货物，警方有权查扣。
Rú fāxiàn wéijìn huòwù，jǐngfāng yǒu quán chákòu。
The police have the right to confiscate any forbidden objects they find.
每天晚上都有很多警察在全市的大街小巷进行查巡。
Měitiān wǎnshàng dōu yǒu hěnduō jǐngchá zài quánshì de dàjiē xiǎo xiàng jìnxíng cháxún。
Every night, many policemen patrol the streets and alleys of the city.
警方查抄了很多盗版图书。
Jǐngfāng cháchāo le hěnduō dàobǎn túshū。
The police confiscated many pirated books.
这批非法物资已经被警方抄没了。
Zhè pī fēifǎ wùzī yǐjing bèi jǐngfāng chāomò le。
This batch of illegal goods has been confiscated by the police.
警方决心彻查这批假药的来源。
Jǐngfāng juéxīn chèchá zhè pī jiǎyào de láiyuán。
The police are determined to thoroughly investigate the source of the counterfeit medicine.
对这件事情的严肃查办，可以起到惩一警百的作用。
Duì zhèjiàn shìqing de yánsù chábàn，kěyǐ qǐdào chéngyījǐngbǎi de zuòyòng。
The severe punishment is a warning to others.
警方正在调查他吃赃的事情。
Jǐngfāng zhèngzài diàochá tā chīzhāng de shìqing。
The police are investigating his bribery case.
警察及时地击毙了持枪歹徒，确保了人质的安全。
Jǐngchá jíshí de jībì le chíqiāng dǎitú，quèbǎo le rénzhì de ānquán。
In time the police killed the gunmen, and secured the safety of the hostage.
警察叱令劫匪放下手中的枪。
Jǐngchá chìlìng jiéfěi fàngxià shǒu zhōng de qiāng。
Police yelled at the robbers, ordering them to put down their guns.
警察在毒贩出货的时候将他们抓获。
Jǐngchá zài dúfàn chūhuò de shíhou jiāng tāmen zhuāhuò。
The police arrested the drug dealers in the act.
警方把这个犯罪团伙一举摧毁，真是为民除害，大快人心。
Jǐngfāng bǎ zhège fànzuì tuánhuǒ yìjǔ cuīhuǐ，zhēnshì wèimín chúhài，dàkuài rénxīn。
The police was able to remove the criminal organization in one clear sweep, clearing the way for progress in the community.
警察一眼就识破了他们串谋作伪证的伎俩。
Jǐngchá yìyǎn jiù shípò le tāmen chuànmóu zuò wěizhèng de jìliǎng。
The police immediately saw through their trick of collaborating to give false testimony.
交警在当路执行公务。
Jiāojǐng zài dānglù zhíxíng gōngwù。
The traffic police are working on the street.
警方没收了这些盗录的音像制品。
Jǐngfāng mòshōu le zhèxiē dàolù de yīn xiàng zhìpǐn。
The police confiscated these pirate videos.
犯罪分子盗运的这批货已被警方截获。
Fànzuì fènzǐ dàoyùn de zhè pī huò yǐ bèi jǐngfāng jiéhuò。
The goods illegally transported by criminals have been intercepted by the police.
这个警示牌提示司机，此路段要保持低速行驶。
Zhège jǐngshìpái tíshì sījī，cǐ lùduàn yào bǎochí dīsù xíngshǐ。
This caution sign reminds drivers to keep a slow speed.
警方取缔了这家印刷盗版图书的地下工厂。
Jǐngfāng qǔdì le zhè jiā yìnshuā dàobǎn túshū de dìxià gōngchǎng。
The police have banned this illegal factory that printed pirated books.
警方拘捕了这些聚众闹事的刁棍。
Jǐngfāng jūbǔ le zhèxiē jùzhòng nàoshì de diāogùn。
The police have arrested these artful rascals who gathered together to make trouble.
我是一个督察警，每天都要上街巡逻。
Wǒ shì yígè dūchájǐng，měitiān dōuyào shàngjiē xúnluó。
I\'m a police inspector and I go patrolling every day in the streets.
警方施放了毒气弹，把劫匪逼出了屋子。
Jǐngfāng shīfàng le dúqìdàn，bǎ jiéfěi bī chū le wūzi。
The police used poisonous gas to force the robbers out of the house.
警察一举查抄了这个赌点。
Jǐngchá yìjǔ cháchāo le zhège dǔdiǎn。
The police demolished the illegal gambling den during a raid.
警察没收了所有的赌资和赌具。
Jǐngchá mòshōu le suǒyǒu de dǔzī hé dǔjù。
The police confiscated all the gambling money and gambling equipment.
小张违章停车，交警给他开了个罚单。
Xiǎo Zhāng wéizhāng tíngchē，jiāojǐng gěi tā kāi le gè fádān。
Xiao Zhang parked his car illegally. As a result he was issued a notice for payment of fine by the police.
民警的反扒工作既辛苦又有一定的危险性。
Mínjǐng de fǎnpá gōngzuò jì xīnkǔ yòu yǒu yídìng de wēixiǎnxìng。
The police\'s actions against thieves are both difficult and risky.
警方已经封堵了边境线上的各个路口，严防罪犯逃往市外。
Jǐngfāng yǐjing fēngdǔ le biānjìngxiàn shàng de gègè lùkǒu，yánfáng zuìfàn táowǎng shìwài。
The police have blocked all the roads of the border to prevent the criminals from running away to another city.
为了坚决打击偷渡犯罪，警方建立了严密的海上封锁线。
Wèile jiānjué dǎjī tōudù fànzuì，jǐngfāng jiànlì le yánmì de hǎishàng fēngsuǒ xiàn。
In order to strike a blow at the smugglers, the police established a naval blockade.
小偷故技重施，被守候在一旁的便衣警察抓了个正着。
Xiǎotōu gùjì chóngshī，bèi shǒuhòu zài yìpáng de biànyī jǐngchá zhuā le gè zhèngzháo。
When trying the same old trick, the thief was caught by the plainclothes policeman waiting at the side.
他是个民警，时常挂怀着自己辖区的孤寡老人。
Tā shì gè mínjǐng，shícháng guàhuái zhe zìjǐ xiáqū de gūguǎ lǎorén。
As a civilian policeman, he always thinks about the old people with no family that live in his district.
这个辖区的民警特别关心孤寡老人的寒暖，经常来看望他们，帮他们解决困难。
Zhège xiáqū de mínjǐng tèbié guānxīn gūguǎ lǎorén de hánnuǎn，jīngcháng lái kànwàng tāmen，bāng tāmen jiějué kùnnan。
The police in these districts are very concerned about the life of elderly without children.  They visit them frequently, and solve problems for them.
她嚎叫着把上门解决矛盾的民警赶了出去。
Tā háojiào zhe bǎ shàngmén jiějué máodùn de mínjǐng gǎn le chūqù。
She howled, and drove the police away when they came to solve the conflict.
一个办理假证的黑窝被警方端掉。
Yígè bànlǐ jiǎzhèng de hēiwō bèi jǐngfāng duāndiào。
A lair of illegal activities conducting forged documents was destroyed by the police.
警方发现了销售盗版光盘的黑线。
Jǐngfāng fāxiàn le xiāoshòu dàobǎn guāngpán de hēixiàn。
The police found black thread of selling pirated compact disks.
户籍警说要来他家检查户籍。
Hùjíjǐng shuō yào lái tā jiā jiǎnchá hùjí。
The police officer responsible for residence registration administration said he would come to his home to check their registered permanent residence.
本市的交警和司机进行了一次换位体验。
Běnshì de jiāojǐng hé sījī jìnxíng le yícì huànwèi tǐyàn。
The police, and drivers in the city have gained a lot driving experience.
我们要加强警备，防止敌人回窜。
Wǒmen yào jiāqiáng jǐngbèi，fángzhǐ dírén huícuàn。
We must reinforce the guard to prevent the enemy from coming back.
在警察赶来前，他成功地毁证。
Zài jǐngchá gǎnlái qián，tā chénggōng de huǐzhèng。
He successfully destroyed the evidence before the police arrived.
警方在他的家里发现了大量贿金。
Jǐngfāng zài tā de jiā lǐ fāxiàn le dàliàng huìjīn。
The police found a great deal of bribe money at his home.
警方这次搜查缉获了大量的毒品。
Jǐngfāng zhècì sōuchá jīhuò le dàliàng de dúpǐn。
The police have seized a great deal of drugs this time.
警方这次缉凶行动非常成功。
Jǐngfāng zhècì jīxiōng xíngdòng fēicháng chénggōng。
The policemen successfully arrested the criminals this time.
为了方便抓捕和寄押犯罪嫌疑人，警方采取了有效的措施。
Wèile fāngbiàn zhuābǔ hé jìyā fànzuì xiányírén，jǐngfāng cǎiqǔ le yǒuxiào de cuòshī。
In order to arrest and temporarily imprison criminal suspects, the police have taken effective measures.
交警要求违反了交通规则的驾驶员出示驾驶证。
Jiāojǐng yāoqiú wéifǎn le jiāotōng guīzé de jiàshǐyuán chūshì jiàshǐzhèng。
The police demanded the driver who had violated traffic regulations show them his license.
警察抓他时他非常后悔，但已是江心补漏，为时已晚。
Jǐngchá zhuā tā shí tā fēicháng hòuhuǐ，dàn yǐshì jiāngxīn bǔlòu，wéishí yǐwǎn。
He felt deeply regretful when he was arrested by the police, but it was too late for him to mend his ways.
交通岛上的警察正在指挥交通。
Jiāotōngdǎo shàng de jǐngchá zhèngzài zhǐhuī jiāotōng。
The policeman is commanding traffic on the traffic island.
交通警察正在突击检查违规车辆。
Jiāotōng jǐngchá zhèngzài tūjī jiǎnchá wéiguī chēliàng。
Traffic policemen are having a surprise inspection of cars that violate traffic regulations.
这张照片展现出了这位女警察娇柔的一面。
Zhèzhāng zhàopiàn zhǎnxiànchū le zhèwèi nǚjǐngchá jiāoróu de yí miàn。
This photo reveals the gentle side of the policewoman.
一名少年因截劫路人被警方拘留。
Yì míng shàonián yīn jiéjié lùrén bèi jǐngfāng jūliú。
A young boy was arrested by the police for robbing passengers.
交警紧追不舍，终于将肇事司机抓获。
Jiāojǐng jǐnzhuī bùshě，zhōng yú jiāng zhàoshì sījī zhuāhuò。
The traffic police chased the driver who had caused the accident, and finally caught him.
这起抢劫案警方已经着手调查。
Zhè qǐ qiǎngjiéàn jǐngfāng yǐjing zháoshǒu diàochá。
The police began to investigate the robbery case.
警风端正才能保一方平安。
Jǐngfēng duānzhèng cáinéng bǎo yìfāng píngān。
Only with decent policemen can the security of the community be safeguarded.
我们把猫的叫声误听成是警号了。
Wǒmen bǎ māo de jiàoshēng wùtīng chéng shì jǐnghào le。
We took the mew of a cat as a sound of warning.
连日的降水使这条河流水位直逼警戒水位线。
Liánrì de jiàngshuǐ shǐ zhètiáo héliú shuǐwèi zhíbī jǐngjiè shuǐwèixiàn。
The precipitaion of recent days has raised the water level almost to the warning line.
我军已直逼敌军的警戒线。
Wǒ jūn yǐ zhíbī díjūn de jǐngjièxiàn。
We are heading to our enemy\'s front line.
在办案现场闲杂人等不得越过警戒线。
Zài bànàn xiànchǎng xiánzárénděng bùdé yuèguò jǐngjièxiàn。
People without fixed duties mustn\'t walk past the crime scene\'s police cordon.
本市的气温已超过警戒线。
Běnshì de qìwēn yǐ chāoguò jǐngjièxiàn。
The temperature of our city exceeds the warning point.
他因考试作弊而受到处分，且处分必须留档以示警诫。
Tā yīn kǎoshì zuòbì ér shòudào chǔfèn，qiě chǔfèn bìxū liúdàng yǐshì jǐngjiè。
He was punished for cheating on his exams and got a black mark on his record to warn other people.
这个社区是警民共建社区。
Zhège shèqū shì jǐngmín gòngjiàn shèqū。
The police as well the residents of the community work together for socialist ideological and ethical progress.
这本书真是句句都是警世言，哲学意味浓厚。
Zhèběnshū zhēnshì jùjù dōushì jǐngshìyán，zhéxué yìwèi nónghòu。
This book is full of epigrams and is very philosophical.
狼狗的警惕性很高，任何风吹草动都躲不过它的眼睛。
Lánggǒu de jǐngtìxìng hěngāo，rènhé fēngchuī cǎodòng dōu duǒbúguò tā de yǎnjīng。
The demi-wolf is very alert - nothing can escape its eyes.
公安局最近购买了一批警械。
Gōngānjú zuìjìn gòumǎi le yì pī jǐngxiè。
The police bureau just bought some truncheons.
未成年人犯罪令人警省，发人深思。
Wèichéngniánrén fànzuì lìngrén jǐngxǐng，fārén shēnsī。
Juvenile delinquency should make us reflect on the current situation.
这起生产事故令公司的安全部门警醒，应该加强设备的安全检查。
Zhè qǐ shēngchǎn shìgù lìng gōngsī de ānquán bùmén jǐngxǐng，yīnggāi jiāqiáng shèbèi de ānquán jiǎnchá。
This accident warns the security department of the company to be alert and improve security inspection on equipment.
仓库里存着贵重货物，咱们晚上睡觉要警醒些。
Cāngkù lǐ cúnzhe guìzhòng huòwù，zánmen wǎnshàng shuìjiào yào jǐngxǐng xiē。
We must be alert when we sleep and watch over the valuable goods in the garage.
这个小男孩特别向往警营的生活。
Zhège xiǎonánhái tèbié xiàng wǎng jǐngyíng de shēnghuó。
This little boy dreams of being a police officer.
这句警语有很强的指导作用，要牢记在心。
Zhè jù jǐngyǔ yǒu hěnqiáng de zhǐdǎo zuòyòng，yào láojì zài xīn。
We must bear in mind this instructive epigram.
这几名警员多次立功，受到上级的表彰。
Zhè jǐ míng jǐngyuán duōcì lìgōng，shòudào shàngjí de biǎozhāng。
These police officers made a lot of contributions and were praised by their leaders.
一般人都不知道我们国家有多少警种。
Yìbānrén dōu bùzhīdào wǒmen guójiā yǒu duōshǎo jǐngzhǒng。
Most people do not know how  many kinds of police officers we have.
交警在究诘这起交通事故的真相。
Jiāojǐng zài jiūjié zhè qǐ jiāotōng shìgù de zhēn xiàng。
The traffic police are trying to find out the truth behind this accident.
收到警报后救生筏立刻赶到了出事水域。
Shōudào jǐngbào hòu jiùshēngfá lìkè gǎndào le chūshì shuǐyù。
The lifeboat hurried to the accident scene immediately after receiving the alarm.
警方将强制拘传这几名犯罪嫌疑人。
Jǐngfāng jiāng qiángzhì jūchuán zhè jǐ míng fànzuì xiányírén。
The police will summon the suspects for questioning.
这名盗窃犯在接受警方的拘审。
Zhè míng dàoqièfàn zài jiēshòu jǐngfāng de jūshěn。
The thief was arrested and questioned.
拒毒、防毒需要警民携手，全民参与！
Jùdú、fángdú xūyào jǐngmín xiéshǒu，quánmín cānyǔ！
All the people should join hands with the police and participate in the actions of rejecting and eliminating drugs.
警方责令这些聚众闹事者具结悔过。
Jǐngfāng zélìng zhèxiē jùzhòng nàoshìzhě jùjié huǐguò。
The police asked these troublemakers to make a statement of repentance.
军警和百姓齐出动，终于扑灭了这场森林大火。
Jūnjǐng hé bǎixìng qí chūdòng，zhōng yú pūmiè le zhèchǎng sēnlín dàhuǒ。
With cooperation between the armed police and civilians, this forest fire was finally put out.
他酒后驾车，交警依法扣缴了他的驾照。
Tā jiǔhòu jiàchē，jiāojǐng yīfǎ kòujiǎo le tā de jiàzhào。
His driver\'s license was withheld by police for a drunk-driving offence.
这伙抢银行的狂徒已经被警方擒获了。
Zhè huǒ qiǎng yínháng de kuángtú yǐjing bèi jǐngfāng qínhuò le。
The ferocious robbers who robbed the bank have been caught by the police.
这一片的矿警很负责任！
Zhè yípiàn de kuàngjǐng hěnfù zérèn！
The mining police in this area are responsible.
警方已经窥破敌人的全盘计划了！
Jǐngfāng yǐjing kuīpò dírén de quánpán jìhuà le！
The police have seen through the enemy\'s plan.
警察在他们的老窝中发现了十几支手枪和几百发子弹。
Jǐngchá zài tāmen de lǎowō zhōng fāxiàn le shí jǐ zhī shǒuqiāng hé jǐ bǎi fā zǐdàn。
The police found more than ten guns, and several hundred bullets in their nest.
这个小偷已经是第5次被警察抓住了，真是累教不改。
Zhège xiǎotōu yǐjing shì dìwǔcì bèi jǐngchá zhuāzhù le，zhēnshì lěijiào bùgǎi。
This thief has been caught by the police five times. What a person who refuses to mend his ways, despite  repeated punishment.
春运期间火车乘警要对火车上的旅客的身份进行例行检查。
Chūnyùn qījiān huǒchē chéngjǐng yào duì huǒchē shàng de lǚkè de shēnfèn jìnxíng lìxíng jiǎnchá。
During the Spring Festival period, the train police should make routine checks regarding the identity of  the passengers.
领花是军警制服领子上的标志。
Lǐnghuā shì jūnjǐng zhìfú lǐngzi shàng de biāozhì。
Collar badges are symbols on the collars of military police’s uniforms.
警方已经通缉这个流贼很久了。
Jǐngfāng yǐjing tōngjī zhège liúzéi hěnjiǔ le。
The police have listed the roving bandit as a wanted man for a long time.
警方为了围捕逃犯，设置了路卡。
Jǐngfāng wèi le wéibǔ táofàn，shèzhì le lùkǎ。
In order to round up the escaped prisoner, the police set many road booths.
门口的警卫要求我出示路条。
Ménkǒu de jǐngwè yāoqiú wǒ chūshì lùtiáo。
The guard at the gate requests I show my pass.
警车一来，违法者就乱作一团了。
Jǐngchē yìlái，wéifǎzhě jiù luànzuò yìtuán le。
Law-breakers were in great disorder when the police car came.
警察一声喝斥，吓得犯罪分子落荒而逃。
Jǐngchá yìshēng hēchì，xià de fànzuìfènzǐ luòhuāng ér táo。
The criminals fled in panic after the shout of the police.
警方查获了一批毛货大衣。
Jǐngfāng cháhuò le yì pī máohuò dàyī。
The police tracked down and seized a batch of woolen overcoats.
交警通知说她没事，只是乘坐的大客车被撞了。
Jiāojǐng tōngzhī shuō tā méishì，zhǐshì chéngzuò de dàkèchē bèi zhuàng le。
The traffic police informed us that she was all right, but that the bus she took had been hit.
警方设计了一条秘计才顺利地把他逮捕。
Jǐngfāng shèjì le yìtiáo mìjì cái shùnlì de bǎ tā dǎibǔ。
The police finally arrested him by designing a secret plot.
刑警侦察员都有一双明锐的眼睛。
Xíngjǐng zhēncháyuán dōu yǒu yì shuāng míngruì de yǎnjīng。
All criminal police scouts have sharp eyes.
在警察赶到之前，他已经跟歹徒扭扯到了一起。
Zài jǐngchá gǎndào zhīqián，tā yǐjing gēn dǎitú niǔchědào le yìqǐ。
He scuffled with the gangster before the police arrived.
站在那条平交公路上的警察，是我儿时的伙伴。
Zhànzài nà tiáo píngjiāo gōnglù shàng de jǐngchá，shì wǒ érshí de huǒbàn。
The policeman standing at the crossroads is my childhood friend.
机智的警察在匪徒掏枪的瞬间将其扑倒，避免了伤亡。
Jīzhì de jǐngchá zài fěitú tāoqiāng de shùnjiān jiāng qí pūdǎo，bìmiǎn le shāngwáng。
The wise policeman threw himself at the gangster and knocked him down just as he was pulling out the gun, avoiding injuries and deaths.
昨天警察局门口竟发生了一起枪战。
Zuótiān jǐngchájú ménkǒu jìng fāshēng le yì qǐ qiāngzhàn。
There was a gun battle in front of the doorway of the police station yesterday.
尽管逃犯再三躲藏，最终还是被警察擒获。
Jìnguǎn táofàn zàisān duǒcáng，zuìzhōng háishi bèi jǐngchá qínhuò。
Though hiding again and again, the escaped criminal was eventually arrested by the police.
警方在爆炸现场发现了燃烧瓶的残骸。
Jǐngfāng zài bàozhà xiànchǎng fāxiàn le ránshāopíng de cánhái。
The police found debris from the Molotov cocktail at the site of the explosion.
无论遇到什么困难，你都可以求助于人民警察。
Wúlùn yùdào shénme kùnnan，nǐ dōu kěyǐ qiúzhùyú rénmín jǐngchá。
You can turn to the people\'s police for help, no matter what kind of trouble you are in.
这个流氓犯罪团伙终于被警方芟夷了。
Zhège liúmáng fànzuì tuánhuǒ zhōng yú bèi jǐngfāng shānyí le。
The criminal gang of hooligans has finally been eliminated by the police.
为了尽快抓获那个流窜犯，警方再次提高了赏格。
Wèile jǐnkuài zhuāhuò nàge liúcuànfàn，jǐngfāng zài cì tígāo le shǎnggé。
In order to arrest the criminal on the run as soon as possible, the police increased the reward offered.
你一定要提高警惕，千万不要上贼船呀！
Nǐ yí dìng yào tígāo jǐngtì，qiānwàn bùyào shàng zéichuán ya ！
You should sharpen your vigilance, and not board a pirate ship.
每个银行储蓄所里都设有自动报警装置。
Měigè yínháng chǔxùsuǒ lǐ dōu shèyǒu zìdòng bàojǐng zhuāngzhì。
Every savings bank is installed with an automatic warning device.
这几个犯罪分子还算老实，警察一到，他们就束手就擒了。
Zhè jǐgè fànzuìfènzǐ hái suàn lǎoshi，jǐngchá yídào，tāmen jiù shùshǒujiùqín le。
These criminals were somewhat docile. Once the policemen came, they allowed themselves to be seized without putting up a fight.
她巧妙地甩脱了尾随她的小流氓，然后报了警。
Tā qiǎomiào de shuǎituō le wěisuítā de xiǎoliúmáng，ránhòu bào le jǐng。
She cleverly got rid of the rogues who followed her, and called the police.
对于他的死搅蛮缠，我们真是拿没有办法了，只能报警。
Duìyú tā de sǐjiǎo mánchán，wǒmen zhēnshì ná méiyǒu bànfǎ le，zhǐnéng bàojǐng。
We really couldn\'t handle his unreasonable harassment, so we called the police.
面对歹徒，他总能表现出泰然自若的神情，充分体现出一位老刑警的冷静与睿智。
Miànduì dǎitú，tā zǒng néng biǎoxiàn chū tàiránzìruò de shénqíng，chōngfèn tǐxiàn chū yíwèi lǎoxíngjǐng de lěngjìng yǔ ruìzhì。
He is calm and fearless when faced with a gangster, displaying the soberness and wisdom of a long-time criminal policeman.
小偷刚刚把钱包偷到手就被警察逮住了，真是螳螂捕蝉，黄雀在后呀！
Xiǎotōu gānggāng bǎ qiánbāo tōu dàoshǒu jiù bèi jǐngchá dǎizhù le，zhēnshì tángláng bǔchán，huángquè zàihòu ya！
No sooner had the thief stolen the wallet, than he was caught by the police. As the saying goes: coveting the gains ahead, unaware of danger behind.
今天警方第三次提讯了这个嫌犯。
Jīntiān jǐngfāng dìsān cì tíxùn le zhège xiánfàn。
The police interrogated the suspected criminal for the third time today.
警方一举拘捕了一名主犯和两名同案犯。
Jǐngfāng yìjǔ jūbǔ le yìmíng zhǔfàn hé liǎngmíng tóngànfàn。
The police arrested one principal criminal and two accomplices.
这名警察因玩忽职守罪被判了刑。
Zhè míng jǐngchá yīn wánhū zhíshǒuzuì bèi pàn le xíng。
This policeman was punished for his dereliction of duty.
警察从他的旅行包里搜出了违禁品。
Jǐngchá cóng tā de lǚxíngbāo lǐ sōuchū le wéijìnpǐn。
The police have discovered out some contraband goods in his traveling bag.
由于汽车尾牌破损严重，他被交警拦了下来。
Yóuyú qìchē wěipái pòsǔn yánzhòng，tā bèi jiāojǐng lán le xiàlái。
Since the tailboard of the car was seriously broken, he was stopped by the traffic policeman.
当你到一个陌生的地方不认识路的时候，可以向民警问路。
Dāng nǐ dào yígè mòshēng de dìfāng bú rènshi lù de shíhou，kěyǐ xiàng mínjǐng wènlù。
When you are lost in an unknown place, you can ask the police for directions.
警方精心布置，一举捣毁了这个传销窝点。
Jǐngfāng jīngxīn bùzhì，yìjǔ dǎohuǐ le zhège chuánxiāo wōdiǎn。
The police planned carefully, and crashed the multi-level marketing hideout.
去年，哥哥光荣地成为武警部队的一名战士。
Qùnián，gēge guāngróng de chéngwéi wǔjǐng bùduì de yìmíng zhànshì。
Last year, my brother joined the armed police and became an honorable soldier.
经过侦察，警方认为小王是这个案子最大的嫌疑人。
Jīngguò zhēnchá，jǐngfāng rènwéi Xiǎo Wáng shì zhè gè ànzi zuìdà de xiányírén。
After investigation, the police are sure that Xiao Wang is the most likely suspect in the case.
这位穿便服的警察身手骁健。
Zhèwèi chuān biànfú de jǐngchá shēnshǒu xiāojiàn。
The police officer in his casual clothes is very brave.
武警消防支队的战士们下午将来教我们使用消防栓。
Wǔjǐng xiāofáng zhīduì de zhànshìmen xiàwǔ jiāng lái jiāo wǒmen shǐyòng xiāofángshuān。
The firefighters of the military police will come to teach us how to use a fire hydrant this afternoon.
小偷正为偷到手机而得意，却没想到斜刺里杀出两个警察。
Xiǎotōu zhèng wèi tōudào shǒujī ér déyì，què méi xiǎngdào xiécì lǐ shāchū liǎnggè jǐngchá。
The thief was feeling glad about stealing a mobile phone when he was caught by two policemen.
经过刑警们几天几夜的紧张侦察，凶案已经破获。
Jīngguò xíngjǐngmen jǐtiān jǐ yè de jǐnzhāng zhēnchá，xiōngàn yǐjing pòhuò。
After several days and nights\' investigation by the criminal police, the murder case was uncovered.
警察正在调查小张凶死的原因。
Jǐngchá zhèngzài diàochá Xiǎo Zhāng xiōngsǐ de yuányīn。
The police are investigating the cause of Xiao Zhang\'s violent death.
面对凶顽的歹徒，勇敢的民警毫不畏惧。
Miànduì xiōngwán de dǎitú，yǒnggǎn de mínjǐng háobú wèijù。
Facing the dangerous gangsters, the brave policemen were not frightened at all.
民警们毫不畏惧，勇敢地抓捕凶顽。
Mínjǐngmen háobú wèijù，yǒnggǎn de zhuābǔ xiōngwán。
The policemen had no fear, courageously running after the gangsters.
警察在寻究事情的起因，大家都沉默。
Jǐngchá zài xún jiū shìqing de qǐyīn，dàjiā dōu chénmò。
When the police inquired about the cause of the matter, everyone remained silent.
你别寻事，告诉你警察就在附近。
Nǐ bié xúnshì，gàosù nǐ jǐngchá jiùzài fùjìn。
Do not look for trouble. The police are around.
在旧社会他做过巡捕，相当于现代的警察。
Zài jiù shèhuì tā zuòguò xúnbǔ，xiāngdāngyú xiàndài de jǐngchá。
What he did in the old society is something like the policeman at modern times.
运钞车天天有警卫押车，就是怕出意外。
Yùnchāochē tiāntiān yǒu jǐngwèi yāchē，jiùshì pà chū yìwài。
The cash trunk is protected by guards every day in case of any accident.
警卫押护罪犯，结果还是途中被劫持了。
Jǐngwèi yāhù zuìfàn，jiéguǒ háishi tú zhōng bèi jiéchí le。
Though there were guards escorting the criminal, he was saved by others on the way.
你居然在警察眼皮底下偷东西，好大的胆子。
Nǐ jūrán zài jǐngchá yǎnpí dǐxià tōu dōngxi，hǎo dà de dǎnzi。
You\'re so audacious, you steal in front of the eyes of the police.
警方去取证了，经过多方了解还是一无所获。
Jǐngfāng qù qǔzhèng le，jīngguò duōfāng liǎojiě háishi yīwú suǒhuò。
The police went out to collect evidence, but they still failed to gain anything after investigation.
警察展开撒网式侦查，凶手无处隐遁。
Jǐngchá zhǎnkāi sāwǎngshì zhēnchá，xiōngshǒu wúchǔ yǐndùn。
The police are conducting a drag net investigation, so the murderer has no place to hide.
只要能够为警方提供有价值的信息，都有奖。
Zhǐyào nénggòu wèi jǐngfāng tígòng yǒu jiàzhí de xìnxī，dōu yǒu jiǎng。
Anyone that provides valuable information to the police will be rewarded.
交通部增派300名交警疏导交通。
Jiāotōngbùzēngpai sānbǎimíng jiāojǐng shūdǎo jiāotōng。
The Ministry of Communications sent 300 more traffic police to direct the traffic.
干警缴获了歹徒用来行凶的折刀。
Gànjǐng jiǎohuò le dǎitú yònglái xíngxiōng de zhédāo。
The policmen seized the folding knife that was used by the scoundrels.
他作为知情人，给警方提供了很多破案线索。
Tā zuòwéi zhīqíngrén，gěi jǐngfāng tígōng le hěnduō pòàn xiànsuǒ。
As an insider, he has provided the police with many valuable sources for solving cases.
警员全力追堵这名穷凶极恶的逃犯。
Jǐngyuán quánlì zhuīdǔ zhè míng qióngxiōng jíè de táofàn。
The police are chasing an extremely vicious escaped criminal with all their resources.
这堂生动的警示课教会了小学生面对危险该怎样自保。
Zhè táng shēngdòng de jǐngshìkè jiāohuì le xiǎoxuésheng miànduì wēixiǎn gāi zěnyàng zìbǎo。
This vivid warning demonstration class teaches primary students how to protect themselves from danger.
歹徒手持自动步枪绑架人质，被公安干警拿下。
Dǎitú shǒuchí zìdòng bùqiāng bǎngjià rénzhì，bèi gōng\'ān gànjǐng náxià。
The bandit who kidnapped the hostage with an automatic rifle was seized by police.
看到前方发生警匪枪战，他赶快走避躲藏。
Kàndào qiánfāng fāshēng jǐngfěi qiāngzhàn，tā gǎnkuài zǒubì duǒcáng。
Seeing the gun fight between the police and the bandits, he immediately ran away and hid.
他驾车超速了，从反光镜里可以看到警察在后面追他。
Tā jiàchē chāosù le，cóng fǎnguāngjìng lǐ kěyǐ kàndào jǐngchá zài hòumiàn zhuī tā。
He can see that the police are right after him due to his speeding.
交警在教孩子们识别交通标志。
Jiāojǐng zài jiāo háizimen shíbié jiāotōng biāozhì。
Traffic policemen are teaching children how to recognize traffic signs.
生物学家在研究动物警戒色的起源问题。
Shēngwùxuéjiā zài yánjiū dòngwù jǐngjièsè de qǐyuán wèntí。
The biologists are studying the origin of the animals\'warning coloration.
叔叔是市公安局刑事警察大队的大队长。
Shūshu shì shì gōng\'ānjú xíngshì jǐngchá dàduì de dàduìzhǎng。
Uncle is chief of the criminal police of the city police bureau.
警务人员凭直接经验得知案情的危险和紧迫。
Jǐngwù rényuán píng zhíjiē jīngyàn dézhī ànqíng de wēixiǎn hé jǐnpò。
The policemen realized the danger, and urgency of this case based on their direct experience.
警察在他的书包里检查出大量的麻醉品。
Jǐngchá zài tāde shūbāo lǐ jiǎncháchū dàliàng de mázuìpǐn。
The police found plenty of drugs in his schoolbag.
抢匪是逃不掉的，武装警察已经封锁了道路。
Qiǎngfěi shì táo búdiào de，Wǔzhuāngjǐngchá yǐjīng fēngsuǒle dàolù。
The police have already blocked the roads, so the robbers will not get away.
警察挨门搜查。
Jǐngchá āimén sōuchá。
The police conducted a house-to-house search.
保持警惕
bǎochí jǐngtì
stay vigilant
接到居民报案后，警察以偷窃嫌疑将他逮捕。
Jiēdào jūmín bào\'àn hòu，jǐngchá yǐ tōuqièxiányí jiāng tā dàibǔ。
After a report from a local resident, the police arrested him on suspicion of theft.
丢失信用卡要向警察报失。
Diūshī xìnyòngkǎ yào xiàng jǐngchá bàoshī。
If you lose a credit card you should report it to the police.
当警察要达到一定的身高标准。
Dāng jǐngchá yàodádào yídìngde shēngāobiāozhǔn。
In order to be a policeman you have to meet certain height requirements.
这些人行为不轨引起了警察的注意。
Zhèxiērén xíngwéibùguǐ yǐnqǐle jǐngcháde zhùyì。
The irregular conduct of these people has attracted the attention of the police.
警察正在查问嫌疑犯。
Jǐngchá zhèngzài cháwèn xiányífàn。
The police are interrogating the suspect right now.
警察仔细地检查了小包。
Jǐngchá zǐxìde jiǎnchále xiǎobāo。
The police officer closely inspected the bag.
防暴警察
fángbàojǐngchá
riot police
尽管很危险，警察们还是冲了进去。
Jǐnguǎn hěnwēixiǎn，jǐngchámen háishì chōnglejìnqù。
In spite of the danger, the police still rushed on in.
荷枪实弹的警察在巡逻。
Hèqiāngshídànde jǐngchá zài xúnluó。
Armed police are on the beat.
警车呼啸而过。
Jǐngchē hūxiào\'érguò。
The police car whistled past.
值夜班要加倍警惕。
Zhíyèbān yào jiābèi jǐngtì.
The night shift has to be doubly vigilant.
警方一直在监听罪犯。
Jǐngfāng yìzhí zài jiāntīng zuìfàn.
The police are continuously monitoring criminals.
警惕
jǐngtì
on the alert
报警
bàojǐng
raise the alarm
巡警
xúnjǐng
an officer on the beat
便衣警察
biànyī jǐngchá 
plain-clothes police
放松警戒
fàngsōng jǐngjiè
let one\'s guard down
采取警戒措施
cǎiqǔ jǐngjiè cuòshī
take precautionary measures
保持警觉
bǎochí jǐngjué
maintain vigilance
一人出门在外必须提高警觉。
Yì rén chūménzàiwài bìxū tígāo jǐngjué.
Anyone going out alone should be extra vigilant.
每天有4000警力上街巡逻。
Měitiān yǒu sìqiān jǐnglì shàngjiē xúnluó.
Every day 4, 000 police patrol the streets.
鸣枪警告
míngqiāng jǐnggào
fire a warning shot
警察正在搜索逃犯呢。
Jǐngchá zhèngzài sōusuǒ táofàn ne.
The police are hunting down the escaped convict.
这事给我们敲了警钟。
Zhè shì gěi wǒmen qiāolejǐngzhōng.
This rang alarm bells with us.
警车全速前进。
Jǐngchē quánsù qiánjìn.
The police car is driving at full speed.
走私案涉及海关和警方。
Zǒusī\'àn shèjí Hǎiguān hé jǐngfāng。
The smuggling case involves Customs and the police.
报警器输出信号。
Bàojǐngqì shūchū xìnhào。
The alarm emits a signal.
他试图逃避警方的搜捕。
Tā shìtú táobì jǐngfāng de sōubǔ。
He attempted to avoid the hunt organised by the police.
警察拦截住一辆可疑车辆进行搜查。
Jǐngchá lánjié zhù yíliàng kěyí chēliàng jìnxíng sōuchá。
The police stopped a suspicious vehicle and carried out a search.
这批勇猛的缉毒警令毒品贩子闻风丧胆。

Wǒ fāxiàn zìjǐ de duìmiàn shì gè kuíwú de jǐngchá。
我发现自己的对面是个魁梧的警察。
Wakefulness, watchfulness, and bellicosity make a good hunter.
Bù mián 、bǎochí jǐngjué hé hàodòu kěyǐ zàojiù yígè hǎo lièshǒu。
不眠、保持警觉和好斗可以造就一个好猎手。
There was a conspiracy of silence about police brutality.
Yǒuguān jǐngchá de cánbào xíngwéi，cúnzài yí fèn bǎochí jiānmò de mìmì yuēdìng。
有关警察的残暴行为，存在一份保持缄默的秘密约定。
They felt--at any rate Jim felt--relieved though still wary.
Jǐnguǎn háiyào bǎochí jǐngjué，dàn tāmen háishì juéde——zhìshǎo shì Jímǔ juéde——qīngsōng le yìxiē。
尽管还要保持警觉，但他们还是觉得——至少是吉姆觉得——轻松了一些。
The police nabbed the suspected criminals.
Jǐngchá zhuāzhùle yífàn。
警察抓住了疑犯。
The police frisked everyone at the airport.
Jǐngchá zài Jīchǎng duì měi gè rén sōushēn。
警察在机场对每个人搜身。
He keeps a weather eye open for trouble.
Tā bǎochízhe duì kùnnan de jǐngjué。
他保持着对困难的警觉。
He sent a heads-up to the district attorney.
Tā xiàng dìqū jiǎncháguān fāchūle jǐnggào。
他向地区检察官发出了警告。
The alarm clangored throughout the building.
Jǐngbàoshēng dīnglínglíng xiǎngchè jiànzhùwù。
警报声叮铃铃响彻建筑物。
We had to spell out our names for the police officer.
Wǒmen bùdébù xiàng zhè wèi jǐngguān pīnxiě wǒmen de míngzi。
我们不得不向这位警官拼写我们的名字。
They used scanners to monitor police radio channels.
Tāmen shǐyòng sǎomiáoyí lái jiāncè jǐngyòng wúxiàndiàn píndào。

His oily smoothness concealed his guilt from the police.
Tā de yuánhuá shǐ jǐngchá méiyǒu shípò tā de zuìxíng。
他的圆滑使警察没有识破他的罪行。
His only recourse was the police.
Tā wéiyī de qiúzhù duìxiàng shì jǐngchá。

It was a humorless wink; a wink of warning.

We must stand sentinel to protect ourselves.
Wǒmen bìxū shíkè jǐngtì bǎohù wǒmen zìjǐ。

He was strong-armed by the policemen.
Tā bèi jǐngchá shībào。
他被警察施暴。
I was manhandled by the police.

一阵阵的刺痛是一个警告。
We hightailed it when we saw the police walking in.

Police used a sternutatory to subdue the mob.

像小羊一般温顺

艾伦是个温顺，胆小，拘谨的人。
The tame students obeyed their teacher.

The parents were comfortable with allowing their baby to play with the gentle dog.
Jiāzhǎng fàngxīn ràng zìjǐ de háizi gēn wēnshùn de gǒu yìqǐ wánshuǎ。

She became so tame it was impossible to release her back into the wild.

她变得如此的温顺，已不可能把她放回野外了。
She is as gentle as a lamb.
Tā jiùxiàng xiǎo yáng yíyàng wēnshùn。
她就像小羊一样温顺。
We have to be as gentle as a dove，take advice from everyone，and somehow cope when that advice contradicts other advice we are getting.

我们要像鸽子那样温顺，接受每一个人的意见，当某些意见与我们所得到的其他建议相矛盾时，也要想办法应对。
He felt he had taken his only child like a lamb to the slaughter.
Tā juéde xiànzài zìjǐ dàizhe zhè wéiyī de háizi，jiùxiàng bǎ yì zhī wēnshùn de miányáng sòngrù túzǎichǎng yìbān。
他觉得现在自己带着这唯一的孩子，就像把一只温顺的绵羊送入屠宰场一般。
The princess was powerless: when he beckoned to her，she went to him like a lamb.
Gōngzhǔ fēicháng ruǎnruò：tā yì zhāoshǒu，tā biàn shífēn wēnshùn de pǎodào le tā gēnqián。
公主非常软弱：他一招手，她便十分温顺地跑到了他跟前。
She was one of the tamest and most abject creatures imaginable with no will or power to act but as directed.
Tā shì nǐ néng xiǎngxiàng de zuì wēnshùn zuì kělián de rénqún zhōng de yì yuán——méiyǒu yìyuàn、 yě méiyǒu nénglì qù zuò，zhǐnéng tīngcóng biérén de ānpái。
她是你能想象的最温顺最可怜的人群中的一员——没有意愿、也没有能力去做，只能听从别人的安排。

文理通顺
wénlǐ tōngshùn 
coherent writing

字句通顺
zìjù tōngshùn

shùnyìng shìjiè zhī cháoliú 
adapt oneself to (or go along with) world trends
顺应历史发展的潮流
shùnyìng lìshǐ fāzhǎn de cháoliú
conform to the historical trend of the times; go with the tide of historical development
顺应时代的变化
shùnyìng shídài de biànhuà

shēn chǔ shùnjìng
